eng: [, Dear Chancellor Merkel,, colleagues: 　　 Hamburg is known as the "World Bridge City". I am very happy to be here with you, to discuss building a bridge of cooperation, and to promote common prosperity. First of all, I would like to express my heartfelt thanks to the warm and thoughtful reception of Prime Minister Merkel and Germany. , 　　 At present, the world economy is showing a good momentum. Relevant international organizations predict that the world economy is expected to grow by 3.5% this year. This is the best economic situation in recent years. Such a situation is inseparable from the efforts of the G20. At the same time, the deep-seated problems in the world economy have not been resolved, and they still face many unstable and uncertain factors. In the face of challenges, the Hangzhou Summit proposed the G20 plan: to build an innovative, dynamic, joint and inclusive world economy. The Hamburg Summit takes "Shaping a Linked World" as its theme, which is in line with the Hangzhou Summit. We must work together to turn these ideas into action. Here, I would like to make a few comments. , 　　 First, we must adhere to the general direction of building an open world economy. This is an important experience of the G20 in dealing with the international financial crisis and an important way to promote world economic growth. An important reason why international organizations are currently raising their expectations for world economic growth is that international trade is expected to grow by 2.4% and global investment by 5%. We must stick to the path of open development and mutual benefit and win-win results, and jointly make the world economy a bigger cake. As the world’s major economies, we should also be able to play a leading role, support the multilateral trading system, act in accordance with jointly formulated rules, and find win-win solutions to meet common challenges through consultation. , 　　 Second, we must work together to find new impetus for world economic growth. This motivation comes first from innovation. Research shows that 95% of the global industry and commerce are closely related to the Internet, and the world economy is undergoing a digital transformation. We must strengthen cooperation in the field of digital economy and new industrial revolution and jointly create new technologies, new industries, new models and new products. This motivation also comes from better solving development problems and implementing the 2030 sustainable development agenda. This is beneficial to developing countries and will also bring market and investment opportunities to developed countries. Everyone is a winner. The Hangzhou Summit reached an important consensus on innovation and development. The momentum of cooperation was continued in the German year. The next step is to continue to deepen and solidify. , 　　 Third, we must work together to make the world's economic growth more inclusive. At present, the development of the world economy is still uneven, and the challenges of technological advancement for employment are becoming increasingly prominent. The World Economic Forum predicts that by 2020, artificial intelligence will replace more than 5 million jobs worldwide. An important mission of the G20 is to deal with the contradictions of fairness and efficiency, capital and labor, technology and employment in line with the concept of inclusive growth determined by the Hangzhou Summit. It is necessary to continue to combine economic policies and social policies organically to solve the challenges brought about by industrial upgrading and the mismatch of knowledge and skills to make income distribution more fair and reasonable. The G20 should pay more attention to exchanges and cooperation in education and training, employment and entrepreneurship, and distribution mechanisms. The completion of these tasks is also conducive to the healthy development of economic globalization. , 　　 Fourth, we must continue to improve global economic governance. Since the outbreak of the international financial crisis, the G20 has achieved positive results in strengthening macro-policy coordination, reforming international financial institutions, improving international financial supervision, and combating tax avoidance, and has made important contributions to stabilizing financial markets and promoting economic recovery. The next step is to continue our efforts in the above areas, especially to strengthen macro policy communication, prevent financial market risks, develop inclusive finance and green finance, and promote the financial industry to better serve the development of the real economy. , 　　 Not long ago, China successfully held the “Belt and Road” International Cooperation Summit Forum. In the spirit of consultation, co-construction and sharing, all parties to the meeting have achieved fruitful results in promoting policy communication, facility connectivity, trade flow, capital and financial connectivity, and people-to-people communication, and strive to create new governance concepts, new cooperation platforms, and new development momentum. This is highly consistent with the purpose of the G20. , 　　 German proverb says that one person’s effort is addition, and one team’s effort is multiplication. Let us work together to promote linked growth, promote common prosperity, and continue to move towards the goal of building a community of human destiny! ,   thank you all. , 　　 (Xinhua News Agency, Hamburg, Germany, July 7th), 　　 "People's Daily" (July 08, 2017, 02 edition),]
eng_title: Xi Jinping: Adhere to Openness and Inclusion and Promote Linked Growth
source-date: 来源：人民网－人民日报          发布时间：2017-07-08
text: [, 尊敬的默克尔总理，, 各位同事：, 　　汉堡被誉为“世界桥城”。很高兴同大家在这里相聚，共商架设合作之桥、促进共同繁荣大计。首先，我谨对默克尔总理及德方的热情周到接待，表示衷心感谢。, 　　当前，世界经济出现向好势头，有关国际组织预计，今年世界经济有望增长3.5%。这是近年来最好的经济形势。有这样的局面，同二十国集团的努力分不开。同时，世界经济中的深层次问题尚未解决，仍然面临诸多不稳定不确定因素。, 　　面对挑战，杭州峰会提出了二十国集团方案：建设创新、活力、联动、包容的世界经济。汉堡峰会把“塑造联动世界”作为主题，同杭州峰会一脉相承。我们要共同努力，把这些理念化为行动。这里，我愿谈几点意见。, 　　第一，我们要坚持建设开放型世界经济大方向。这是二十国集团应对国际金融危机的重要经验，也是推动世界经济增长的重要路径。国际组织当前调高世界经济增长预期，一个重要原因就是预计国际贸易增长2.4%、全球投资增加5%。我们要坚持走开放发展、互利共赢之路，共同做大世界经济的蛋糕。作为世界主要经济体，我们应该也能够发挥领导作用，支持多边贸易体制，按照共同制定的规则办事，通过协商为应对共同挑战找到共赢的解决方案。, 　　第二，我们要共同为世界经济增长发掘新动力。这个动力首先来自创新。研究表明，全球95%的工商业同互联网密切相关，世界经济正在向数字化转型。我们要在数字经济和新工业革命领域加强合作，共同打造新技术、新产业、新模式、新产品。这个动力也来自更好解决发展问题，落实2030年可持续发展议程。这对发展中国家有利，也将为发达国家带来市场和投资机遇，大家都是赢家。杭州峰会就创新和发展达成重要共识，有关合作势头在德国年得以延续，下一步要不断走深、走实。, 　　第三，我们要携手使世界经济增长更加包容。当前，世界经济发展仍不平衡，技术进步对就业的挑战日益突出。世界经济论坛预计，到2020年，人工智能将取代全球逾500万个工作岗位。二十国集团的一项重要使命，就是本着杭州峰会确定的包容增长理念，处理好公平和效率、资本和劳动、技术和就业的矛盾。要继续把经济政策和社会政策有机结合起来，解决产业升级、知识和技能错配带来的挑战，使收入分配更加公平合理。二十国集团应该更加重视在教育培训、就业创业、分配机制上交流合作。这些工作做好了，也有利于经济全球化健康发展。, 　　第四，我们要继续完善全球经济治理。国际金融危机爆发以来，二十国集团在加强宏观政策协调、改革国际金融机构、完善国际金融监管、打击避税等方面取得积极成果，为稳定金融市场、促进经济复苏作出了重要贡献。下一步，我们要在上述领域继续努力，特别是要加强宏观政策沟通，防范金融市场风险，发展普惠金融、绿色金融，推动金融业更好服务实体经济发展。, 　　不久前，中国成功举办“一带一路”国际合作高峰论坛。与会各方本着共商、共建、共享精神，在促进政策沟通、设施联通、贸易畅通、资金融通、民心相通上取得丰硕成果，努力打造治理新理念、合作新平台、发展新动力。这同二十国集团的宗旨高度契合。, 　　德国谚语说，一个人的努力是加法，一个团队的努力是乘法。让我们携手合作，推动联动增长，促进共同繁荣，不断向着构建人类命运共同体的目标迈进！, 　　谢谢大家。, 　　（新华社德国汉堡7月7日电）, 　　《 人民日报 》（ 2017年07月08日 02 版）, ]
title: 习近平：坚持开放包容 推动联动增长

eng: [, Xi Jinping's congratulatory letter to the 2017 BRICS Ministers of Health Conference and Traditional Medicine High-level Meeting. On the occasion of the BRICS Ministers of Health Conference and Traditional Medicine High-level Meeting, I would like to represent the Chinese government and the Chinese people. In the name of an individual, express warm congratulations to the conference! We sincerely welcome all ministers of health, government representatives, international organizations, experts and scholars and other guests present at the meeting! , Diseases know no borders. To address shared public health challenges, BRICS countries have established a high-level dialogue mechanism to promote BRICS health cooperation. I believe that this session will promote the exchange of experience and consensus among BRICS countries and relevant countries, and work together to meet global health challenges. Traditional medicine is an important carrier of excellent traditional culture, and it plays an important role in promoting mutual learning among civilizations and safeguarding people's health. Traditional Chinese medicine is one of the outstanding representatives, and it is widely recognized by the people of many countries for its unique advantages in disease prevention, treatment and rehabilitation. , Achieving health for all is our common vision. I hope that all parties will make full use of the BRICS Health Ministers' Meeting and the High-level Meeting Mechanism of Traditional Medicine to deepen exchanges and cooperation in the field of health and health, promote the mutual learning of traditional medicine among all parties, and work together to meet public health challenges and contribute to the protection of people's health. , I wish the meeting a complete success! , President of the People's Republic of China, Xi Jinping, July 6, 2017, (Xinhua News Agency, Tianjin, July 6th), the BRICS Health Ministers' Meeting and the High-level Meeting of Traditional Medicine opened in Tianjin on the morning of the 6th. President Xi Jinping sent a congratulatory letter to congratulate the meeting. , Xi Jinping pointed out that the disease knows no borders. To address shared public health challenges, BRICS countries have established a high-level dialogue mechanism to promote BRICS health cooperation. I believe that this session will promote the exchange of experience and consensus among BRICS countries and relevant countries, and work together to meet global health challenges. Traditional medicine is an important carrier of excellent traditional culture, and it plays an important role in promoting mutual learning among civilizations and safeguarding people's health. Traditional Chinese medicine is one of the outstanding representatives, and it is widely recognized by the people of many countries for its unique advantages in disease prevention, treatment and rehabilitation. , Xi Jinping emphasized that the realization of health for all is our common vision. I hope that all parties will make full use of the BRICS Health Ministers' Meeting and the High-level Meeting Mechanism of Traditional Medicine to deepen exchanges and cooperation in the field of health and health, promote the mutual learning of traditional medicine among all parties, and work together to meet public health challenges and contribute to the protection of people's health. At the opening ceremony, Vice Premier Liu Yandong read Xi Jinping's congratulatory letter and delivered a keynote speech. She pointed out that health cooperation is an important part of cultural exchanges among BRICS countries. As the rotating presidency of the BRICS countries in 2017 and the host of the conference, the Chinese government looks forward to working with partners committed to BRICS health cooperation and the development of traditional medicine to build a consensus of cooperation, plan a blueprint for cooperation, and promote the development of human health. , BRICS Ministers of Health, Ministers of Traditional Medicine and high-level representatives, representatives of relevant international organizations such as the World Health Organization, and representatives of domestic related fields attended the meeting. (Xinhua News Agency, Tianjin, July 6th), "People's Daily" (July 07, 2017, 01 edition),]
eng_title: Xi Jinping sent a letter to congratulate the BRICS Ministers of Health meeting and the high-level meeting on traditional medicine

text: [, 习近平致2017年金砖国家卫生部长会暨传统医药高级别会议的贺信, 值此金砖国家卫生部长会暨传统医药高级别会议召开之际，我谨代表中国政府和中国人民，并以我个人的名义，向会议的召开表示热烈的祝贺！向出席会议的各国卫生部长及政府代表、国际组织代表、专家学者等各方嘉宾，表示诚挚的欢迎！, 疾病无国界。为应对共有的公共卫生挑战，金砖国家已经建立高级别对话机制，推进金砖国家卫生合作。我相信，本届会议将促进金砖国家和各有关国家交流经验、凝聚共识，携手应对全球卫生挑战。传统医药是优秀传统文化的重要载体，在促进文明互鉴、维护人民健康等方面发挥着重要作用。中医药是其中的杰出代表，以其在疾病预防、治疗、康复等方面的独特优势受到许多国家民众广泛认可。, 实现人人享有健康是我们共同的美好愿景。我希望各方充分利用金砖国家卫生部长会暨传统医药高级别会议机制，深化卫生健康领域交流合作，推进各方传统医药互学互鉴，携手应对公共卫生挑战，为保障人民健康作出贡献。, 预祝会议圆满成功！, 中华人民共和国主席 习近平 , 2017年7月6日 , （新华社天津7月6日电） , 金砖国家卫生部长会暨传统医药高级别会议6日上午在天津开幕。国家主席习近平发来贺信，对会议召开表示祝贺。, 习近平指出，疾病无国界。为应对共有的公共卫生挑战，金砖国家已经建立高级别对话机制，推进金砖国家卫生合作。我相信，本届会议将促进金砖国家和各有关国家交流经验、凝聚共识，携手应对全球卫生挑战。传统医药是优秀传统文化的重要载体，在促进文明互鉴、维护人民健康等方面发挥着重要作用。中医药是其中的杰出代表，以其在疾病预防、治疗、康复等方面的独特优势受到许多国家民众广泛认可。, 习近平强调，实现人人享有健康是我们共同的美好愿景。我希望各方充分利用金砖国家卫生部长会暨传统医药高级别会议机制，深化卫生健康领域交流合作，推进各方传统医药互学互鉴，携手应对公共卫生挑战，为保障人民健康作出贡献。, 国务院副总理刘延东在开幕式上宣读了习近平的贺信并发表主旨演讲。她指出，卫生合作是金砖国家人文交流的重要内容。作为2017年金砖国家轮值主席国以及大会东道主，中国政府期待同致力于金砖国家卫生合作和传统医药发展的伙伴们一道，凝聚合作共识，规划合作蓝图，推动人类健康事业发展。, 金砖国家卫生部长、传统医药部长及高级别代表，世界卫生组织等有关国际组织代表，国内相关领域代表等参加会议。（新华社天津7月6日电）, 《 人民日报 》（ 2017年07月07日 01 版）, ]
title: 习近平致信祝贺金砖国家卫生部长会暨传统医药高级别会议召开

eng: [, On May 14, Chinese President Xi Jinping held a banquet in the Great Hall of the People in Beijing, welcoming the heads and guests of foreign delegations attending the "Belt and Road" International Cooperation Summit Forum. Xi Jinping delivered a speech and warmly welcomed the distinguished guests on behalf of the Chinese government and people.　　 Xinhua News Agency reporter Liu Weibing, heads of state, heads of government, heads of international organizations, guests, ladies and gentlemen, friends: Good evening, everyone! On behalf of the Chinese government and people, on behalf of my wife, and in my own name, I would like to extend a warm welcome to everyone at the Belt and Road Forum for International Cooperation! , Many of the friends here are not new to Beijing, and have left many memories here. Beijing is the ancient capital of thousands of years and has witnessed the vicissitudes of history. Beijing is also a modern new city, with the development of China constantly showing new styles. Beijing is even more an international metropolis, where different civilizations from the east and the west meet and blend together from time to time. In Beijing, you can visit the ancient Forbidden City, the Great Wall, and the Temple of Heaven, as well as visit the modernist Bird's Nest, Water Cube, and National Grand Theater. You can hear traditional Chinese opera and crosstalk, as well as appreciate ballet and symphony from the West. You will meet young Chinese who are trendy in clothes and walking through world-famous stores, and you can also meet foreign friends who speak fluent Chinese and wander in the old Hutong. , Watching the sea in a drop of water, looking at the world in a grain of sand. Beijing has become a cosmopolitan city from a small historical city, revealing the truth to us: human beings live in a common homeland and share a common destiny, and human history has always developed in the encounter and knowledge of different peoples and different cultures. . , More than 2000 years ago, our predecessors, with the simple desire of friendly exchanges, opened up the ancient Silk Road and opened the era of great exchanges in the history of human civilization. Today, we inherit the spirit of the ancient Silk Road and discuss the construction of the “Belt and Road”, which is the continuation of the historical trend and the right choice for the future. The construction of the “Belt and Road” bears our desire for civilization exchanges, will continue to serve as the messenger of civilization communication, promote various civilizations to learn from each other, and make human civilization more colorful. The construction of the “Belt and Road” bears our expectation for peace and tranquility, and will become a bond that brings closer relations between countries, allowing people of all countries to help each other, respect and trust each other, and jointly build a harmonious home and a peaceful world. The construction of the “Belt and Road” carries our pursuit of common development and will help countries break through development bottlenecks, narrow development gaps, share development achievements, and build a development community that connects suffering and common destiny. The construction of the “Belt and Road” carries our longing for a better life, and will consolidate the dreams of each country and common people into a common aspiration, let ideals become reality, and make people happy and healthy. Today, the high-level meeting of the "Belt and Road" International Cooperation Summit Forum was successfully held. Everyone discussed enthusiastically and achieved fruitful results. Tomorrow, we will hold a round table summit on the shore of Yanqi Lake and jointly plan the "Belt and Road" construction cooperation plan. The "Belt and Road" construction is standing at a new starting point and starting a new journey. , We are on a path full of hope. I believe that as long as we move towards each other, heart to heart, without retreating, without stopping, we can finally usher in the day when roads are connected, beautiful and common. I believe that our cause will be as old as the ancient Silk Road and will be descended from the future. , Now, I propose that everyone toast together to build a better future for the “Belt and Road”, to develop and prosper for all countries, for the success of this summit forum, for the health of guests and families, cheers! (People's Daily, Beijing, May 14th), "People's Daily" (May 15, 2017, 02 edition),]
eng_title: Xi Jinping's toast at the welcome banquet of the "Belt and Road" International Cooperation Summit Forum
source-date: 来源：人民网－人民日报          发布时间：2017-05-15
text: [, 5月14日，国家主席习近平在北京人民大会堂举行宴会，欢迎出席“一带一路”国际合作高峰论坛的外方代表团团长及嘉宾。习近平发表致辞，代表中国政府和人民热烈欢迎各位贵宾的到来。　　新华社记者 刘卫兵摄, 各位国家元首，政府首脑，国际组织负责人，, 各位来宾，, 女士们，先生们，朋友们：, 大家晚上好！我谨代表中国政府和人民，代表我夫人，并以我个人名义，对大家出席“一带一路”国际合作高峰论坛表示热烈欢迎！, 在座的很多朋友对北京并不陌生，也在这里留下了许多回忆。北京是千年古都，见证了历史的沧桑变迁。北京也是一座现代新城，随着中国发展不断展现新的风貌。北京更是一座国际化大都市，东西方不同文明时时刻刻在这里相遇和交融。, 在北京，你可以游览古老的故宫、长城、天坛，也可以参观现代派的鸟巢、水立方、国家大剧院。你能听到中国传统的京剧和相声，也能欣赏来自西方的芭蕾舞和交响乐。你会碰到衣着新潮、穿行在世界名品商店里的中国青年，也能遇见操着流利汉语、在老胡同里徜徉的外国友人。, 一滴水里观沧海，一粒沙中看世界。北京从历史上的小城，成为今天的国际化大都市，向我们揭示了一个道理：人类生活在共同的家园，拥有共同的命运，人类历史始终在不同民族、不同文化的相遇相知中向前发展。, 2000多年前，我们的先辈们就是怀着友好交往的朴素愿望，开辟了古丝绸之路，开启了人类文明史上的大交流时代。, 今天，我们传承古丝绸之路精神，共商“一带一路”建设，是历史潮流的沿续，也是面向未来的正确抉择。, “一带一路”建设承载着我们对文明交流的渴望，将继续担当文明沟通的使者，推动各种文明互学互鉴，让人类文明更加绚烂多彩。, “一带一路”建设承载着我们对和平安宁的期盼，将成为拉近国家间关系的纽带，让各国人民守望相助，各国互尊互信，共同打造和谐家园，建设和平世界。, “一带一路”建设承载着我们对共同发展的追求，将帮助各国打破发展瓶颈，缩小发展差距，共享发展成果，打造甘苦与共、命运相连的发展共同体。, “一带一路”建设承载着我们对美好生活的向往，将把每个国家、每个百姓的梦想凝结为共同愿望，让理想变为现实，让人民幸福安康。, 今天，“一带一路”国际合作高峰论坛高级别会议成功举行，大家讨论热烈、成果丰硕。明天，我们将在雁栖湖畔举行圆桌峰会，共同规划“一带一路”建设合作大计。“一带一路”建设正站在新的起点上，开启新的征程。, 我们正走在一条充满希望的道路上。我相信，只要我们相向而行，心连心，不后退，不停步，我们终能迎来路路相连、美美与共的那一天。我相信，我们的事业会像古丝绸之路一样流传久远、泽被后代。, 现在，我提议，大家共同举杯，, 为“一带一路”建设美好未来，, 为各国发展繁荣，, 为这次高峰论坛圆满成功，, 为各位嘉宾和家人健康，, 干杯！（人民网北京5月14日电） , 《 人民日报 》（ 2017年05月15日 02 版）, ]
title: 习近平在“一带一路”国际合作高峰论坛欢迎宴会上的祝酒辞

eng: [, November 13, on the occasion of a state visit to the Lao People’s Democratic Republic, the General Secretary of the CPC Central Committee and President Xi Jinping published in Lao People’s Daily, Bat Liao Pao, and Vientiane Times the title “Building Together The signed article of China-Laos Strategic Destiny Community. The article is as follows:, Working together to build a strategically destiny community between China and Laos, Xi Jinping, General Secretary of the CPC Central Committee and President of the People’s Republic of China, at the invitation of General Secretary of the Central Committee of the Lao People’s Revolutionary Party and State Chairman Benyan Volaji, I am about to The People’s Democratic Republic conducts state visits. I have visited Laos twice. The warm and friendly Lao people, the magnificent Vientiane Pagoda Luang, and the beautiful Mekong River left a deep and beautiful impression on me. I look forward to having a friendly relationship with new and old friends in Laos, seeking common development, and forging a better future for bilateral relations. China and Laos are socialist friendships with similar ideals and beliefs, the same social system and similar development paths. Since the establishment of diplomatic relations more than half a century ago, the relations between the two parties and two countries have withstood the test of changes in the times and international changes, and they have written touching stories. Mao Zedong, Zhou Enlai and Kaishan Fengweihan and other leaders of the older generation of the two countries have taken a close look at each other, forming a profound fighting friendship and laying a solid foundation for the friendship between generations. The descendants of the important Laotian leader Guining Benchena have studied in China for many years. They have left a youthful footprint in China and have also become witnesses, inheritors and promoters of traditional friendship between China and Laos. In the 1960s and 1970s, the Chinese military and civilians actively supported the cause of national independence and liberation of Laos. More than 200 Chinese martyrs stayed in this hot spot where they fought, building a monument of indelible friendship between China and Laos. In the new era, the friendship between China and Laos has been strengthened for a long time and a new vitality has been radiated. The comprehensive strategic cooperative partnership between the two countries is constantly expanding. High-level exchanges have become increasingly close, inter-party exchanges have continued to deepen, and political mutual trust has become more stable. There is an old saying in China, "Public friends are friends, and comrades are friends." This is a true portrayal of China-Laos relations. As like-minded good neighbors, good friends, good comrades, and good partners, China and Laos are exploring socialist theory and practical innovation, comprehensively promoting economic, political, cultural, and social construction, and accelerating the process of modernization. ,Mutual support. China-Laos relations can be called a model of good-neighborly friendship and comprehensive cooperation between China and neighboring countries. , China-Laos development strategy integration has accelerated. The “Belt and Road” initiative proposed by China is highly compatible with Laos’ strategy of “changing the landlocked country into a landlocked country”, China’s “13th Five-Year Plan” and the “eighth five-year” plan for social development in Laos, and the development philosophy of the two countries is similar. Last year, the China-Laos Railway, the flagship project of pragmatic cooperation between the two countries, started construction on all lines, and the transportation artery carrying the development dream of the Lao people is gradually becoming a reality. The construction of the Mohan-Moding Economic Cooperation Zone and the Vientiane Seseta Comprehensive Development Zone has made gratifying progress. A number of enterprises and institutions have signed up to settle in, which will help Laos achieve industrial upgrading, attract foreign investment, promote employment, and promote the development of SMEs. , China-Laos pragmatic cooperation enters the fast lane. China has become the largest investor in Laos and the second largest trading partner. From January to September this year, the bilateral trade volume reached US$2.1 billion, a year-on-year increase of 25.1%. China's direct investment in Laos totaled more than US$6.1 billion, driving the development of local industries such as hydropower, minerals, and service trade. China has actively promoted the implementation of a number of livelihood assistance projects, such as hospitals, highways, and schools, to help the Lao people improve their living standards and quality. The Nanlek Hydropower Station, constructed by Chinese companies, is performing well and has played an important role in the economic construction and social development of Laos. Laos’ exports to China continue to expand, and agricultural products such as rice, coffee, bananas, and watermelons are increasingly popular with Chinese consumers. , Middle-aged and elderly cultural exchanges are increasingly active. In the first half of this year, 400,000 Chinese tourists went to Laos for sightseeing. More and more Lao people go to China to do business and travel, and the number of Lao students studying in China with Chinese government scholarship ranks first among ASEAN countries. China's "Peace Train" and "Mekong Bright Travel" medical service activities have won wide acclaim from the Lao people. Nearly 100 young volunteers in Shanghai, China have successively gone to Laos for network technology, physical education, etc. One of the volunteers has been the head coach of the Lao National Men's Basketball Team. The documentary "The Story of Time" co-produced by China and Laos has been broadcast on the Internet for millions of times, deeply shaking the hearts of the people of both countries. A rock song "Belt and Road" created and sung by Lao friends was popular on the Internet, and won a large number of netizens to like and comment. In the great journey of building socialism with its own characteristics, China and Laos "have the same intentions and harmony". Last month, the Communist Party of China successfully held the 19th National Congress. This conference formulated the overall policy and actions for the future development of the Chinese party and countryLast month, the Communist Party of China successfully convened the 19th National Congress. This conference formulated the overall policy and action plan for the future development of the Chinese party and the country. The conference draws on the grandeur of China’s construction and development from now to the middle of this century Blueprint. By 2020, a moderately prosperous society will be fully built; from 2020 to 2035, socialist modernization will be basically achieved; from 2035 to the middle of this century, China will be built into a prosperous, powerful, democratic, civilized, harmonious, and beautiful socialist modern power. We have Ability and confidence to lead the Chinese people towards the Chinese dream of realizing the great rejuvenation of the Chinese nation. Under the leadership of the Lao People’s Revolutionary Party, the Lao society is harmonious and stable, the economy is booming, and the country is changing with each passing day. It is being determined by the Lao Party’s 10th National Congress The goal is to promote comprehensive innovation. The same mission and common dream, just like the Lancang-Mekong River running through the old and the old, firmly link our future and closely connect our destiny., ——We need to strengthen our strategy Communicate and build a community of shared destiny of mutual respect and trust. Both China and Laos must inherit and carry forward the friendly traditions of the two countries, firmly grasp the correct direction of the development of bilateral relations, deepen political mutual trust, learn from each other’s theory and practical experience of advancing reform and exploring socialist construction, Close contacts between political parties, governments, legislative bodies, and localities to expand the breadth and depth of China-Laos comprehensive strategic partnership of cooperation. The two countries should continue to support each other on issues involving each other’s core interests and major concerns, and determine foreign policy based on the merits of the matter. To jointly safeguard the rights and interests of developing countries., ——We must deepen strategic integration and build a community of mutual help and destiny. China supports Laos to take advantage of its unique location and achieve green and sustainable development. The China-Laos Railway is an important component of the Pan-Asian Railway Network Partly, it has great strategic and practical significance to Laos. The two sides should strengthen overall coordination and strive to complete the opening to traffic as soon as possible, so that Laos can communicate with neighboring countries and the world. We must promote the construction and operation of major projects such as economic cooperation zones, satellites, and hydropower stations. The Lao people benefit more and benefit early. ——We need to expand pragmatic cooperation to create a mutually beneficial community of destiny. China and Laos are linked by mountains and rivers, and their economies complement each other. Laos’ natural endowment is superior, its economy is developing rapidly, and it is advancing industrialization and modernization. The key stage of the process. China has rich experience and advantages in capital, technology, equipment, etc. Both sides should constantly explore cooperation potential, innovate cooperation models, expand pragmatic cooperation in the fields of power interconnection, finance, energy and other fields, and promote Laos’ agriculture and water conservancy. The construction of infrastructures such as transportation, communications, and communications has brought tangible benefits to the people of the two countries. ——We want to expand cultural exchanges and build a community of shared future with mutual learning. We must strengthen culture, science and technology, youth, localities, etc. Exchanges and cooperation in the field have allowed the friendship between China and Laos to spread. We welcome more Lao friends to study, travel and work in China and become messengers to inherit and carry forward the traditional friendship between China and Laos. China will actively support Laos in hosting the 2018 Tourism Year and encourage more Chinese tourists come to Laos for sightseeing and experience the unique charm of Laos' history and culture., Both China and Laos An important member of the Cangjiang-Mekong cooperation mechanism. Since the Lancang-Mekong Cooperation Mechanism was officially launched in 2016, it has achieved fruitful results, reflecting the "Lan-Mei Speed" and "Lan-Mei Efficiency", and cultivated the Lan-Mei culture of treating each other as equals, sincerely helping each other, and being close to one family. Laos will serve as co-chair of the Lancang-Mekong cooperation next year. China is willing to work with Laos to promote the Lancang-Mekong cooperation to achieve more results, implement the early harvest projects proposed by the Laos, drive the development of the subregion, and bring more benefits to the people of the countries in the region. , Lao people often say that "a wood stick can't burn into a fire, and a wooden stick can't be fenced." The Chinese say "all will come together", "all people gather firewood and the flames are high." I firmly believe that as long as China and Laos trust and cooperate with each other, a better tomorrow will be created for the relationship between the two countries. (Xinhua News Agency, Beijing, November 13th),]
eng_title: Xi Jinping publishes signed articles in Lao media
source-date: 来源：新华社          发布时间：2017-11-13
text: [, 11月13日，在对老挝人民民主共和国进行国事访问之际，中共中央总书记、国家主席习近平在老挝《人民报》、《巴特寮报》、《万象时报》发表题为《携手打造中老具有战略意义的命运共同体》的署名文章。文章如下：, 携手打造中老具有战略意义的命运共同体, 中共中央总书记、中华人民共和国主席 习近平, 应老挝人民革命党中央委员会总书记、国家主席本扬·沃拉吉邀请，我即将对老挝人民民主共和国进行国事访问。我曾两次到访老挝，热情友善的老挝人民、金碧辉煌的万象塔銮、风光旖旎的湄公河畔给我留下深刻而美好的印象。我期待同老挝的新老朋友们畅叙友谊，共谋发展，共辟两国关系美好未来。, 中老是理想信念相通、社会制度相同、发展道路相近的社会主义友邦。建交半个多世纪以来，两党两国关系经受住了时代变迁和国际风云变幻的考验，书写了动人的佳话。毛泽东、周恩来和凯山·丰威汉等两国老一辈领导人肝胆相照，结下了深厚战斗情谊，为中老世代友好奠定了坚实基础。老挝重要领导人贵宁·奔舍那的后人曾在中国求学多年，他们在中国留下了青春的足迹，也成为中老传统友谊的见证者、传承者、推动者。上世纪六七十年代，中国军民积极支援老挝民族独立和解放事业，200多位中国烈士长眠于这片他们战斗过的热土，用生命筑起了中老友好永不磨灭的丰碑。, 进入新时期，中老友好历久弥坚，焕发出新的蓬勃生机。两国全面战略合作伙伴关系不断拓展。高层往来日益密切，党际交流持续深化，政治互信愈加稳固。中国有句古话，“同门曰朋，同志曰友”，这是中老关系的真实写照。作为志同道合的好邻居、好朋友、好同志、好伙伴，中老在探索社会主义理论和实践创新，全面推进经济、政治、文化、社会等各方面建设，加快推进现代化的进程中始终平等相待，相互扶持。中老关系堪称中国同周边国家睦邻友好、全面合作的典范。, 中老发展战略对接加速。中国提出的“一带一路”倡议同老挝“变陆锁国为陆联国”战略、中国的“十三五”规划同老挝社会发展“八五”规划高度契合，两国发展理念相似。去年，两国务实合作旗舰项目——中老铁路全线开工，承载着老挝人民发展梦想的交通大动脉正逐步变为现实。磨憨－磨丁经济合作区和万象赛色塔综合开发区建设进展喜人，多家企业和机构签约入驻，将助力老挝实现产业升级、吸引外资、促进就业、带动中小企业发展。, 中老务实合作驶入快车道。中国已经成为老挝第一大投资国、第二大贸易伙伴。今年1月至9月，双边贸易额21亿美元、同比增长25.1%。中国对老挝直接投资累计超过61亿美元，带动当地水电、矿产、服务贸易等行业发展。中国积极推动医院、公路、学校等一批民生援助项目落地，助力老挝人民提高生活水平和质量。中国企业承建的南累克水电站运行良好，为老挝经济建设和社会发展发挥了重要作用。老挝对华出口不断扩大，老挝大米、咖啡、香蕉、西瓜等农产品日益受到中国消费者喜爱。, 中老人文交流日益活跃。今年上半年，40万中国游客赴老挝旅游观光。越来越多的老挝人赴华经商、旅游，获得中国政府奖学金的老挝在华留学生人数居东盟各国之首。中国“和平列车”、“湄公河光明行”医疗服务活动赢得老挝人民广泛赞誉。中国上海近百名青年志愿者先后赴老挝从事网络技术、体育教学等工作，其中一名志愿者就任老挝国家男篮主教练。中老合拍的纪录片《光阴的故事》网络总播放量达数百万次，深深撼动两国民众心灵。一首由老挝友人创作并演唱的摇滚歌曲《一带一路》在网络热播，赢得大量网友点赞评论。, 在建设有本国特色社会主义的伟大征程中，中老两国“志同而气和”。上个月，中国共产党成功召开第十九次全国代表大会。这次大会制定了中国党和国家未来发展的总体方针和行动纲领。大会绘制了从现在到本世纪中叶中国建设发展的宏伟蓝图。到2020年，将全面建成小康社会；从2020年到2035年，基本实现社会主义现代化；从2035年到本世纪中叶，把中国建设成为富强民主文明和谐美丽的社会主义现代化强国。我们有能力、有信心带领中国人民朝着实现中华民族伟大复兴的中国梦迈进。在老挝人民革命党领导下，老挝社会和谐稳定，经济蓬勃发展，国家日新月异，正向着老挝党第十次全国代表大会确定的目标推进全面革新事业。同样的使命，共同的梦想，恰似纵贯中老的澜沧江－湄公河水，把我们的前途牢牢相系，将我们的命运紧紧相连。, ——我们要加强战略沟通，打造互尊互信的命运共同体。中老双方要继承和发扬两国友好传统，牢牢把握双边关系发展的正确方向，深化政治互信，借鉴彼此推进改革、探索社会主义建设的理论和实践经验，密切政党、政府、立法机构、地方交往，拓展中老全面战略合作伙伴关系的广度和深度。两国应该在涉及彼此核心利益和重大关切的问题上继续相互支持，根据事情的是非曲直确定外交政策，共同维护发展中国家权益。, ——我们要深化战略对接，打造互帮互助的命运共同体。中国支持老挝发挥独特区位优势，实现绿色可持续发展。中老铁路作为泛亚铁路网的重要组成部分，对老挝具有重大战略和现实意义。双方要加强统筹协调，争取早日建成通车，让老挝同周边国家乃至世界互联互通。我们要推进经济合作区、卫星、水电站等重大项目建设和运营，让老挝人民多受益、早受益。, ——我们要拓展务实合作，打造互惠互利的命运共同体。中老两国山水相连、经济互补。老挝自然禀赋优越，经济快速发展，正处在推进工业化、现代化进程的关键阶段。中国在资金、技术、装备等方面拥有丰富经验和优势。双方要不断挖掘合作潜力，创新合作模式，拓展在电力互联互通、金融、能源等领域务实合作，促进老挝农业、水利、交通、通信等基础设施建设，给两国人民带来实实在在的好处。, ——我们要扩大人文交流，打造互学互鉴的命运共同体。我们要加强文化、科技、青年、地方等领域交流合作，让中老友好薪火相传。欢迎更多的老挝朋友到中国留学、旅游、工作，成为继承和发扬中老传统友谊的使者。中国将积极支持老挝举办2018旅游年，鼓励更多中国游客来到老挝观光旅游，感受老挝历史文化的独特魅力。, 中老同为澜沧江－湄公河合作机制重要成员。澜湄合作机制自2016年正式启动以来取得了丰硕成果，体现了“澜湄速度”和“澜湄效率”，培育了平等相待、真诚互助、亲如一家的澜湄文化。老挝明年将担任澜湄合作共同主席国。中国愿同老挝一道努力，推动澜湄合作取得更多成果，落实老方提出的早期收获项目，带动次区域发展，为地区国家人民带来更多福祉。, 老挝人常说“一根柴棍烧不成旺火，一根木棍围不成篱笆”，中国人讲“众志成城”、“众人拾柴火焰高”。我坚信，只要中老彼此信任，携手合作，必将开创两国关系更加美好的明天。（新华社北京11月13日电）, ]
title: 习近平在老挝媒体发表署名文章

eng: [, November 10, President Xi Jinping was invited to attend the APEC Business Leaders Summit in Da Nang, Vietnam, and delivered a keynote speech entitled "Seizing the Opportunities of World Economic Transformation and Seeking Greater Development in the Asia-Pacific". Xinhua News Agency reporter Li Tao, on November 10, State President Xi Jinping attended the 25th APEC Economic Leaders’ Meeting, Economic Leaders, Representatives, and Spouses of Vietnam’s State President Chen Daguang and his wife in Da Nang, Vietnam Welcome dinner. This is a group photo before the dinner. Xinhua News Agency reporter Li Tao, People's Daily News, Da Nang, Vietnam, November 10 (Reporter Du Shangze, Zhang Zhiwen) State President Xi Jinping was invited to attend the APEC Business Leaders Summit in Da Nang, Vietnam on the 10th and published a title entitled "Capturing the World Economy" The keynote speech of "Transformation Opportunities and Seeking Greater Development in the Asia-Pacific" emphasizes that the world is in a rapidly changing historical process and that the world economy is undergoing deeper changes. We must conform to the general trend, be brave in our responsibilities, and jointly open up a bright future for Asia-Pacific development and prosperity. (For the full text of the speech, see the second edition), At 2:15 pm local time, Xi Jinping, who arrived in Da Nang, came to the Ariana Convention and Exhibition Center. In the warm applause, Xi Jinping delivered a keynote speech. , Xi Jinping pointed out that the road to development has no end, only a new starting point. The world is facing a profound transformation of growth momentum, global development methods, the process of economic globalization, and the global economic governance system. Asia-Pacific is the largest sector of the global economy and a major engine of world economic growth. We must have an insight into the development trend of the world economy, find a correct position, grasp the law, and dare to cope with the profound changes in the world economy. First, continue to build an open economy and strive for mutual benefit and win-win results. We must strive to build a regional cooperation framework of equal consultation, wide participation, and universal benefit, work together to build an open Asia-Pacific economy, and promote trade and investment liberalization and facilitation; guide economic globalization towards greater openness, inclusiveness, inclusiveness, balance, and common The development of the direction of winning; actively leading the reshaping of the global value chain; supporting the multilateral trading system and adhering to open regionalism; fully and in-depth implementation of the "APEC’s Beijing Roadmap for the Realization of the Asia-Pacific Free Trade Zone" process towards the completion of the process The goal of the Asia-Pacific Free Trade Area is constantly moving forward. Second, continue to seek innovative growth and tap new development momentum. We must increase investment in innovation, change the development mode, and cultivate new economic growth points; actively promote structural reforms, eliminate all institutional and institutional obstacles that are not conducive to innovation, and stimulate market vitality; implement the Beijing Conference "Economic Innovation Development, Reform and Growth" "Consensus", deepening cooperation between the Internet and the digital economy, leading the direction of global innovation and development. Third, continue to strengthen interconnection and interconnection to achieve joint development. We should use the APEC interconnection blueprint as a guide to establish a comprehensive, multi-level, and complex Asia-Pacific interconnection network, give full play to the radiating and leading role of interconnection in the real economy, and form a coordinated and coordinated development pattern. The core content of China's proposal to jointly build the “Belt and Road” initiative is to promote infrastructure construction and interconnection, strengthen economic policy coordination and development strategy docking, promote coordinated and joint development, and achieve common prosperity. This initiative originated in China and belongs to the world; it is rooted in history and more oriented to the future; it focuses on Asia, Europe and Africa, and is open to all partners. , Fourth, continue to enhance the inclusiveness of economic development and allow the people to share the fruits of development. We must combine the in-depth promotion of regional economic integration, expand the open and inclusive market, and strengthen the chain of benefit sharing; integrate the concept of inclusive sharing into the development strategy, strive to improve the efficiency-oriented, fair-focused institutional mechanisms, and maintain social fairness and justice; Increase investment in the field of people's livelihood, increase support for vulnerable groups, and enhance the ability of workers to adapt to industrial changes, so that everyone has opportunities and enjoys results! Xi Jinping emphasized that as the world's second largest economy, China is well aware of its responsibilities. Over the past five years, we have proactively adapted, grasped, and led the new normal of the economy, pushed forward structural reforms on the supply side, kept the economy stable and improving, and made steady progress, becoming the main source of power for the world economy. We have comprehensively deepened reforms to remove obstacles to institutional mechanisms that hindered development. We comprehensively promote theoretical innovation, practical innovation, institutional innovation, cultural innovation and other aspects of innovation, and constantly release new growth momentum. We deeply implement the people-centered development thinking and strive to enhance the level of inclusiveness and sharing of development. China has made decisive progress in the fight against poverty. Over the past five years, more than 60 million poor people have stably lifted off poverty. This achievement is hard-won, and we are proud of it. , Xi Jinping pointed outQualitative progress. Over the past five years, more than 60 million poor people have stably escaped poverty. This achievement is hard-won, and we are proud of it. Xi Jinping pointed out that the 19th CPC National Congress was successfully held in Beijing last month. The conference focused on the people's longing for a better life, and formulated the action plan and development blueprint for socialism with Chinese characteristics in the new era. Under the leadership of the Communist Party of China, the Chinese people will start a new journey. This is a new journey to deepen reform in an all-round way and continuously release development vitality. Next year, we will commemorate the 40th anniversary of reform and opening up. China's reforms will have wider fields, more initiatives and stronger efforts. This is a new journey of advancing with the times and innovating development methods. We will implement the new development concept, adhere to quality first, benefit first, and build a modern economic system. This is a new journey towards the world and the development of a higher-level open economy. We will further promote the construction of the “Belt and Road”, implement high-level trade and investment liberalization and facilitation policies, and promote the construction of a global free trade zone network. This is a new journey towards a better life centered on the people. We will insist on ensuring and improving people's livelihood during development, and achieve the goal of poverty alleviation for the rural poor under the current standards in my country by 2020. Building a well-off society in an all-round way, there are more than 1.3 billion Chinese people, no one can do less! This is a new journey to promote the construction of a new type of international relations and the construction of a community of shared future for mankind. The dreams of the Chinese people are closely linked to the dreams of people of all countries. We will stick to the path of peaceful development and always be the anchor of peace and stability in the world and the Asia-Pacific region. We will uphold the concept of righteousness and benefit, actively develop global partnership, expand the convergence of interests with other countries, and promote the establishment of a new international relationship of mutual respect, fairness and justice, and win-win cooperation. We will uphold the concept of mutual consultation, joint construction and sharing, actively participate in the reform and construction of the global governance system, and promote the development of the international political and economic order in a more just and reasonable direction. , Xi Jinping announced that in November next year, China will hold the first China International Import Expo in Shanghai, which will build a new platform for all parties to cooperate in opening up the Chinese market. Xi Jinping emphasized that the peace, stability and prosperity of the Asia-Pacific belong to all the people of Asia and the Pacific, and the future of the Asia-Pacific depends on the people of Asia and the Pacific to create together. The partnership of mutual trust, tolerance, cooperation and win-win is the spiritual bond of the Asia-Pacific family and an important guarantee for ensuring that Asia-Pacific cooperation is on the right track. Let us push forward cooperation on a down-to-earth basis and take solid actions to jointly build a better tomorrow for the Asia-Pacific! , Ding Xuexiang, Liu He, Yang Jiechi and others participated in the above activities. After giving a speech, Xi Jinping briefly met with Peruvian President Kuchynski who came to listen to the speech. Xi Jinping pointed out that the friendship between China and Peru has a long history, the development philosophy is the same, and the cooperation potential is huge. I have exchanged visits with Mr. President within one year and reached an important consensus, planning the direction for the development of bilateral relations. China is willing to work with the Peruvian side to translate consensus into reality and promote bilateral relations and pragmatic cooperation in various fields to continuously achieve new results. Kuchynski congratulated the 19th National Congress of the Communist Party of China on its victory, highly appraised Xi Jinping's wonderful speech just delivered at the APEC Business Leaders Summit, expressed that the Peruvian side attaches great importance to the relationship between China and Peru, and hopes to strengthen infrastructure construction, investment, energy and mining with China Mutually beneficial cooperation in various fields. On the same day, Xi Jinping also attended the dialogue between APEC leaders and representatives of the Business Advisory Council. They exchanged views on the new opportunities brought to the Asia-Pacific economies by the 19th CPC National Congress and the construction of the “Belt and Road”. , "People's Daily" (November 11, 2017, 01 edition),]
eng_title: Xi Jinping attended the APEC Business Leaders Summit and delivered a keynote speech
source-date: 来源：人民网－人民日报          发布时间：2017-11-11
text: [, 　　11月10日，国家主席习近平应邀出席在越南岘港举行的亚太经合组织工商领导人峰会并发表题为《抓住世界经济转型机遇 谋求亚太更大发展》的主旨演讲。　　新华社记者 李 涛摄, 　　11月10日，国家主席习近平在越南岘港出席越南国家主席陈大光和夫人为出席亚太经合组织第二十五次领导人非正式会议的各成员经济体领导人、代表及配偶举行的欢迎晚宴。这是晚宴前集体合影。　　新华社记者 李 涛摄, 　　人民网越南岘港11月10日电 （记者杜尚泽、张志文）国家主席习近平10日应邀出席在越南岘港举行的亚太经合组织工商领导人峰会并发表题为《抓住世界经济转型机遇 谋求亚太更大发展》的主旨演讲，强调世界正处在快速变化的历史进程之中，世界经济正在发生更深层次的变化。我们必须顺应大势，勇于担当，共同开辟亚太发展繁荣的光明未来。（演讲全文见第二版）, 　　当地时间下午2时15分许，甫抵岘港的习近平来到阿里亚纳会展中心。在热烈的掌声中，习近平发表主旨演讲。, 　　习近平指出，发展之路没有终点，只有新的起点。世界正面临增长动能、全球发展方式、经济全球化进程、全球经济治理体系的深刻转变。亚太是全球经济最大的板块，也是世界经济增长的一个主要引擎。我们要洞察世界经济发展趋势，找准方位，把握规律，果敢应对世界经济的深刻转变。, 　　第一，继续坚持建设开放型经济，努力实现互利共赢。我们要努力打造平等协商、广泛参与、普遍受益的区域合作框架，合力构建开放型亚太经济，促进贸易和投资自由化便利化；引导经济全球化朝着更加开放、包容、普惠、平衡、共赢的方向发展；积极引领全球价值链重塑；支持多边贸易体制，坚持开放的区域主义；全面深入落实启动亚太自由贸易区进程的《亚太经合组织推动实现亚太自由贸易区北京路线图》，向着建成亚太自由贸易区的目标不断迈进。, 　　第二，继续谋求创新增长，挖掘发展新动能。我们要加大创新投入，转变发展方式，培育新的经济增长点；积极推进结构性改革，消除一切不利于创新的体制机制障碍，激发市场活力；落实好北京会议《经济创新发展、改革与增长共识》，深化互联网和数字经济合作，引领全球创新发展的方向。, 　　第三，继续加强互联互通，实现联动发展。我们要以亚太经合组织互联互通蓝图为指引，建立全方位、多层次、复合型的亚太互联互通网络，充分发挥互联互通对实体经济的辐射和带动作用，形成协调联动发展的格局。中方提出共建“一带一路”倡议的核心内涵，就是促进基础设施建设和互联互通，加强经济政策协调和发展战略对接，促进协同联动发展，实现共同繁荣。这一倡议源自中国，更属于世界；根植于历史，更面向未来；重点面向亚欧非大陆，更向所有伙伴开放。, 　　第四，继续增强经济发展包容性，让民众共享发展成果。我们要结合区域经济一体化的深入推进，做大开放普惠的市场，做强利益共享的链条；把包容共享理念融入发展战略，努力健全讲求效率、注重公平的体制机制，维护社会公平正义；加大民生领域投入，加大对弱势群体扶持力度，增强劳动者适应产业变革的能力，让人人拥有机遇，享有成果！, 　　习近平强调，作为全球第二大经济体，中国深知自身肩负的责任。过去5年，我们主动适应、把握、引领经济新常态，深入推进供给侧结构性改革，保持经济稳中向好、稳中有进，成为世界经济的主要动力源。我们通过全面深化改革破除妨碍发展的体制机制障碍。我们全方位推进理论创新、实践创新、制度创新、文化创新以及其他各方面创新，不断释放增长新动能。我们深入贯彻以人民为中心的发展思想，努力提升发展的包容性和共享水平。中国脱贫攻坚战取得决定性进展，过去5年，6000多万贫困人口稳定脱贫。这一成果来之不易，我们为之感到自豪。, 　　习近平指出，上个月，中共十九大在北京胜利召开。大会聚焦人民对美好生活的向往，制定了新时代中国特色社会主义的行动纲领和发展蓝图。在中国共产党领导下，中国人民将开启新征程。这是全面深化改革、持续释放发展活力的新征程。明年，我们将隆重纪念改革开放40周年。中国改革的领域将更广、举措将更多、力度将更强。这是与时俱进、创新发展方式的新征程。我们将贯彻新发展理念，坚持质量第一、效益优先，建设现代化经济体系。这是进一步走向世界、发展更高层次开放型经济的新征程。我们将深入推进“一带一路”建设，实行高水平的贸易和投资自由化便利化政策，推动构建面向全球的自由贸易区网络。这是以人民为中心、迈向美好生活的新征程。我们将坚持在发展中保障和改善民生， 实现到2020年我国现行标准下农村贫困人口脱贫的目标。全面建成小康社会，13亿多中国人，一个都不能少！这是推动构建新型国际关系、推动构建人类命运共同体的新征程。中国人民的梦想同各国人民的梦想息息相通。我们将坚持走和平发展道路，始终做世界和亚太地区的和平稳定之锚。我们将秉持正确义利观，积极发展全球伙伴关系，扩大同各国的利益汇合点，推动建设相互尊重、公平正义、合作共赢的新型国际关系。我们将秉持共商共建共享理念，积极参与全球治理体系改革和建设，推动国际政治经济秩序朝着更加公正合理的方向发展。, 　　习近平宣布，明年11月，中方将在上海举办首届中国国际进口博览会，这将为各方进行开辟中国市场的合作搭建新平台。, 　　习近平强调，亚太的和平、稳定、繁荣属于全体亚太人民，亚太的未来要靠亚太人民携手创造。互信、包容、合作、共赢的伙伴关系，是亚太大家庭的精神纽带，是确保亚太合作处在正确轨道上的重要保障。让我们脚踏实地推进合作，扎扎实实采取行动，共同建设亚太更加美好的明天！, 　　丁薛祥、刘鹤、杨洁篪等参加上述活动。, 　　发表演讲后，习近平简短会见了专程前来聆听演讲的秘鲁总统库琴斯基。, 　　习近平指出，中秘友谊源远流长，发展理念相通，合作潜力巨大。我同总统先生在一年内实现互访，达成重要共识，为两国关系发展规划了方向。中方愿同秘方一道，将共识转化为现实，推动双边关系和各领域务实合作不断取得新成果。, 　　库琴斯基祝贺中共十九大胜利召开，高度评价习近平刚刚在亚太经合组织工商领导人峰会发表的精彩演讲，表示秘方高度重视秘中关系，希望同中方加强在基础设施建设、投资、能矿等各领域互利合作。, 　　当天，习近平还出席了亚太经合组织领导人同工商咨询理事会代表对话会，同代表们就中共十九大给亚太经济体带来的新机遇、“一带一路”建设等议题交换看法。, 　　《 人民日报 》（ 2017年11月11日 01 版）, ]
title: 习近平出席亚太经合组织工商领导人峰会并发表主旨演讲

eng: [, People's Network Beijing, November 9th-On November 9th, on the eve of a state visit to the Socialist Republic of Vietnam, the General Secretary of the CPC Central Committee and President Xi Jinping published the title of "Creating a New Situation in China-Vietnam Friendship" in the Vietnam People's Daily Signed articles. The article is as follows: To create a new situation in China-Vietnam friendship, General Secretary of the CPC Central Committee and President of the People’s Republic of China Xi Jinping, at the invitation of General Secretary of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China Ruan Fuzhong and President Chen Daguang, I will soon pay a state visit to the Socialist Republic of Vietnam. This is my warmth after I visited Vietnam again at the end of 2015. China and Vietnam are neighbors connected by mountains and rivers. The peoples of the two countries live next to each other, and there has been a mutual understanding since ancient times. Since modern times, in the struggle for national independence and national liberation, the two peoples fought side by side and supported each other, forming a special friendship of "comrades plus brothers." President Ho Chi Minh has been in China for 12 years before and after the revolution, and he has sympathy with Chinese leaders such as Chairman Mao Zedong and Premier Zhou Enlai. The well-known Vietnamese general Flood actively participated in the Chinese revolution and participated in the Long March of the Red Army. He became the only foreign officer awarded by the New China and a rare "two-state general" in the world. The Chinese people have also provided selfless help to the struggle for the national liberation of Vietnam. Chairman Mao Zedong once stated that "700 million Chinese people are a strong backing for the Vietnamese people, and the vast Chinese territory is a reliable rear for the Vietnamese people." Dou Jinbo, the first artillery adviser of China’s military advisory group to Vietnam, named the newly born daughter “Yuehua” after receiving the task of helping Vietnamese comrades. Recalling the years, the friendship created by the older generations of the leaders of the two parties and two countries, and the friendship formed by the people of the two countries with blood, deserves to be remembered and cherished forever. Entering a new era, in advancing reform and innovation and the cause of socialist construction, the peoples of the two countries learn from each other and go hand in hand. We have jointly explored the path of socialist development in line with our national conditions, created their own development miracles, and also promoted the rapid development of relations between the two countries. Mutual political trust between the two countries is becoming stronger and higher-level exchanges are more frequent. My visit this time is the mutual visit of the highest leaders of the two parties and two countries after another lapse of two years. The pragmatic cooperation between the two countries has expanded in depth. China has maintained Vietnam's largest trading partner status for 13 consecutive years. Vietnam has become China's largest trading partner among ASEAN countries, with bilateral trade volume of nearly 100 billion US dollars in 2016. More and more Chinese companies are investing in Viet Nam. Rainbow Group has been operating in Vietnam for more than ten years. The factory built in Quang Ninh Province has created more than 7,000 jobs for the local area and is also a major taxpayer in the province. More than 30 companies have settled in the Longjiang Industrial Park established in Qianjiang by investors mainly Chinese private enterprises. The humanities exchanges between the two countries have become closer. China is the largest source of foreign tourists in Vietnam, and Chinese tourists can be seen everywhere in tourist cities such as Da Nang and Nha Trang. There are more than 300 passenger flights between the two countries every week. Chinese classics such as "The Romance of the Three Kingdoms" and "Water Margin" are highly respected in Vietnam, and contemporary film and television works are also popular among Vietnamese people. Vietnamese singer Du Shiqinghua also won the monthly championship on China Central Television's "Star Walk". Even more commendable is that the two countries have resolved the demarcation of the land and the Beibu Gulf through friendly consultations, properly handled and managed their differences, and created favorable conditions for the common development of the two countries and regional peace and stability. These are the best interpretations of the spiritual core and rich connotation of the comprehensive strategic partnership of cooperation between China and Vietnam. At present, both countries are embarking on a new journey of reform and development, and are advancing bravely towards their respective grand goals. Last month, the Communist Party of China successfully held the 19th National Congress. This conference formulated the overall policy and action plan for the future development of the Chinese party and country. The conference drew a grand blueprint for China's construction and development from now to the middle of this century. By 2020, a moderately prosperous society will be fully built; from 2020 to 2035, socialist modernization will be basically realized; from 2035 to the middle of this century, China will be built into a strong, powerful, democratic, civilized, harmonious, and beautiful socialist modern power. We are capable and confident to lead the Chinese people towards the Chinese dream of realizing the great rejuvenation of the Chinese nation. Vietnam is also in accordance with the guidelines established by the 12th National Congress of the Communist Party of China, comprehensively promoting the cause of innovation, and moving towards the goal of building a modern industrial country that is rich, powerful, democratic, fair, and civilized. More than ever, we need to work together to pursue the dream of strengthening the country and enriching the people. At present, the international and regional situation is changing, and the two parties and two countries of China and Vietnam are facing many new issues and challenges that are the same or similar. As the Chinese saying goes, "difficulties and hardships make you better." There’s a saying in Vietnam, “No one sees the waves high, let go of the paddleThe same or similar new problems and new challenges. As the Chinese saying goes, "difficulties and hardships make you better." There is a saying in Vietnam, "You can't see the high waves, put down your paddles." As good neighbors, good friends, good comrades, and good partners with related futures and common destiny, we must maintain and develop good relations between the two countries, provide assistance for maintaining stability, deepening reform, and improving people's livelihood, and jointly promote the cause of socialism and promote the region. Peaceful, stable and open development. I would like to share a few thoughts on this. , ——To stabilize the direction and seek a new height of strategic mutual trust. We need to maintain regular high-level contacts, exchange views on the relations between the two parties and two countries and issues of common interest in a timely manner, and steer China-Vietnam relations. Actively carry out the exchange of experience in governing and rejuvenating the country, strengthen inter-party exchanges, jointly enrich and develop the theory and practice of socialist construction, and create a community of destiny with strategic significance. , ——Deepen cooperation and build a new pattern of interest integration. We will continue to closely link the development strategies of the two countries, jointly promote the construction of the "Belt and Road" and "two corridors and one circle", and promote substantial progress in cooperation in key areas such as infrastructure construction, economic and trade, production capacity, cross-border economic cooperation zones, and agriculture. To bring more benefits to the people of the two countries. , ——Expand exchanges and build a new foundation for people's blind date. We must carry forward the traditional friendship, promote cultural and cultural exchanges, close cooperation in culture, education, tourism, youth, media, etc., tell Chinese stories and Vietnamese stories, so that the friendship between China and Vietnam will take root in the hearts of the people and spread from generation to generation. , ——Strengthen coordination and create new highlights of multilateral cooperation. We must grasp the general trend of the world and the trend of the times, strengthen coordination and cooperation within the multilateral frameworks such as the United Nations, APEC, China-ASEAN, and Lancang-Mekong cooperation, to jointly lead open and inclusive regional cooperation, and maintain the momentum of regional open development. , ——Look at the big picture and continue writing a new chapter of friendship and good neighborliness We must proceed from the respective reform and development and stability and the overall situation of Sino-Vietnamese friendship, manage contradictions and differences, adhere to friendly consultations, and seek a basic and long-term solution to the maritime issue acceptable to both parties. We must fully and effectively implement the "Declaration on the Conduct of Parties in the South China Sea", actively promote the "South China Sea Code of Conduct" consultations, and jointly safeguard the peace and stability of the South China Sea. , Another important agenda for my visit is to attend the 25th APEC Leaders’ Informal Meeting in Da Nang. China supports the Vietnamese side to hold this conference well and is willing to work with the Vietnamese side and other members to deepen regional economic integration, build the Asia-Pacific free trade zone and strengthen regional interconnection under the theme of "Building a New Momentum and Creating a Shared Future" Promote economic structure reform and innovation, promote inclusive development, plan for a post-2020 cooperation vision, and carry out practical discussions to achieve positive results and make positive contributions to promoting the common development and prosperity of Asia-Pacific. , President Ho Chi Minh called Vietnam's relationship with China "like hands and feet, like pestle and mortar, like roots and stems, like brother and brother." There is an old saying in China, "Brothers are one heart, and their profits are determined by gold." Through this visit, I look forward to in-depth exchanges with Vietnamese leaders and friends from all walks of life, to tap the potential for cooperation, to build friendly friendship, to deepen the special friendship between the two countries, and to jointly create a new situation in China-Vietnam relations. , "People's Daily" (November 10, 2017, 01 edition),]
eng_title: Xi Jinping publishes signed articles in the Vietnamese media to create a new situation in China-Vietnam friendship
source-date: 来源：人民网－人民日报          发布时间：2017-11-10
text: [, 人民网北京11月9日电 11月9日，在对越南社会主义共和国进行国事访问前夕，中共中央总书记、国家主席习近平在越南《人民报》发表题为《开创中越友好新局面》的署名文章。文章如下：, 开创中越友好新局面, 中共中央总书记、中华人民共和国主席 习近平, 应越共中央总书记阮富仲和国家主席陈大光邀请，我即将对越南社会主义共和国进行国事访问。这是我在2015年年底访问越南后，再次踏上这片美丽的土地，感到十分亲切。, 中越是山水相连、唇齿相依的邻邦。两国人民毗邻而居，自古便有互通互鉴之情。, 近代以来，在争取国家独立和民族解放的斗争中，两国人民并肩战斗、彼此支援，结下了“同志加兄弟”的特殊情谊。胡志明主席在中国开展革命的时间前后长达12年，同毛泽东主席、周恩来总理等中国领导人情同手足。越南著名将领洪水积极投身中国革命，参加红军25000里长征，成为新中国授衔的唯一一位外籍军官，也是世界上少有的“两国将军”。中国人民也为越南民族解放斗争提供无私帮助，毛泽东主席曾表示“7亿中国人民是越南人民的坚强后盾，辽阔的中国领土是越南人民的可靠后方”。中国赴越南军事顾问团首任炮兵顾问窦金波，在接到帮助越南同志的任务后，将刚降生的女儿起名为“越华”。忆峥嵘岁月，两党两国老一辈领导人亲手缔造、两国人民用鲜血凝成的情谊值得我们永远铭记和珍惜。, 进入新时期，在推进改革和革新以及社会主义建设事业中，两国人民相互借鉴、携手并进。我们共同探索符合本国国情的社会主义发展道路，创造出各自的发展奇迹，也推动两国关系得到长足发展。两国政治互信日益牢固，高层往来更加频密。我这次访问是两党两国最高领导人时隔两年后再度实现年内互访。两国务实合作深入拓展。中国连续13年保持越南第一大贸易伙伴地位，越南成为东盟国家中中国最大贸易伙伴，2016年双边贸易额近1000亿美元。越来越多的中国企业到越南投资兴业。天虹集团在越南经营十几年，在广宁省兴建的工厂为当地创造了7000多个就业岗位，也是省内纳税大户。以中国民营企业为主的投资商在前江省创建的龙江工业园，已有30多家企业入驻。两国人文交流更加密切。中国是越南第一大外国游客来源地，岘港、芽庄等旅游城市随处可见中国游客。每周往返于两国之间的客运航班有300多趟。中国的《三国演义》《水浒传》等经典名著在越南备受推崇，当代影视作品也深受越南民众喜爱。越南歌手杜氏清花还在中国中央电视台《星光大道》节目中获得月度冠军。更难能可贵的是，两国通过友好协商解决了陆地和北部湾划界问题，妥善处理并管控分歧，为两国共同发展和地区和平稳定创造了有利条件。这些都是对中越全面战略合作伙伴关系精神内核和丰富内涵的最好诠释。, 当前，两国都走在改革发展的新征程上，朝着各自的宏伟目标奋勇前进。上个月，中国共产党成功召开第十九次全国代表大会。这次大会制定了中国党和国家未来发展的总体方针和行动纲领。大会绘制了从现在到本世纪中叶中国建设发展的宏伟蓝图。到2020年，将全面建成小康社会；从2020年到2035年，基本实现社会主义现代化；从2035年到本世纪中叶，把中国建设成为富强民主文明和谐美丽的社会主义现代化强国。我们有能力、有信心带领中国人民朝着实现中华民族伟大复兴的中国梦迈进。越南也正按照越共十二大确定的方针，全面推进革新事业，朝着早日建成民富国强、民主、公平、文明的现代化工业国目标迈进。我们比以往任何时候都需要携手合作，共同追寻强国富民梦。, 当前，国际和地区形势风云变幻，中越两党两国面临许多相同或相似的新问题新挑战。中国俗语称，“艰难困苦，玉汝于成”。越南有句俗语，“莫见浪头高，放下手中桨”。作为前途相关、命运与共的好邻居、好朋友、好同志、好伙伴，我们要维护和发展好两国关系，为各自维护稳定、深化改革、改善民生提供助力，共同推进社会主义事业，促进地区和平稳定和开放发展。我愿就此分享几点想法。, ——把稳方向，谋求战略互信新高度。我们要保持高层经常接触，及时就两党两国关系及共同关心的问题交换意见，为中越关系掌好舵。积极开展执政兴国经验交流，加强党际交往，共同丰富和发展社会主义建设理论和实践，打造具有战略意义的命运共同体。, ——深化合作，构建利益融合新格局。我们要继续把两国发展战略紧密对接起来，共同推进“一带一路”和“两廊一圈”建设，推动基础设施建设、经贸、产能、跨境经济合作区、农业等重点领域合作取得实质进展，给两国人民带来更多实惠。, ——扩大交流，筑就民心相亲新基础。我们要把传统友谊发扬光大，促进人文交流，密切文化、教育、旅游、青年、媒体等合作，讲好中国故事和越南故事，让中越友好扎根人民心间、代代薪火相传。, ——加强协调，打造多边合作新亮点。我们要把握世界大势和时代潮流，加强在联合国、亚太经合组织、中国—东盟、澜沧江—湄公河合作等多边框架内的协调和配合，共同引领开放包容的区域合作，维护地区开放发展势头。, ——着眼大局，续写敦亲睦邻新篇章。我们要从各自改革发展稳定和中越友好大局出发，管控矛盾分歧，坚持友好协商，寻求双方均能接受的海上问题基本和长久解决办法。我们要全面有效落实《南海各方行为宣言》，积极推进“南海行为准则”磋商，共同维护南海和平稳定。, 我这次访问还有一个重要日程，就是出席在岘港举行的亚太经合组织第二十五次领导人非正式会议。中方支持越方办好这次会议，愿同越方和其他成员一道，在“打造全新动力，开创共享未来”的主题下，就深化区域经济一体化、建设亚太自由贸易区、加强地区互联互通、推进经济结构改革创新、促进包容性发展、规划2020年后合作愿景等方面开展务实讨论，取得积极成果，为推动亚太共同发展繁荣作出积极贡献。, 胡志明主席称越南同中国的关系“如手和足，如杵和臼，如根和茎，如兄和弟”。中国有句古话，“兄弟同心，其利断金”。我期待通过这次访问，同越南领导人以及各界朋友深入交流，共挖合作潜力，厚植友好情谊，深化两国特殊友好，携手开创中越关系新局面。, 《 人民日报 》（ 2017年11月10日 01 版）, ]
title: 习近平在越南媒体发表署名文章 开创中越友好新局面

eng: [, colleagues, ladies and gentlemen, friends: Good morning! Now, I announce the beginning of the dialogue between emerging market countries and developing countries. , Warmly welcome everyone to attend the dialogue between emerging market countries and developing countries. During the leaders' meeting, the BRICS countries focused on communicating with other emerging market countries and developing countries. China has made innovations this year and invited representative countries from different regions to participate in today's dialogue. I believe this dialogue will help strengthen solidarity and cooperation between emerging market countries and developing countries, as well as the BRICS' own development. , Today, it is very rare for everyone to get together. Many colleagues came from afar, and some have adjusted their schedules specifically for attending the dialogue, and I am grateful for this. I look forward to working with you on the theme of "Deepening Mutually Beneficial Cooperation and Promoting Common Development" to discuss development cooperation plans and inject strong momentum into deepening South-South cooperation and implementing the 2030 Agenda for Sustainable Development. Since the beginning of the new century, the collective rise of emerging market countries and developing countries has become an irreversible trend of the times. In recent years, the contribution rate of these countries to world economic growth has been steadily high, reaching 80% in 2016, and is the well-deserved main engine. Recently, the world economy is showing signs of improvement, international trade and investment are picking up, a new round of technology and industrial revolution is poised to take off, and new industries, new technologies, and new business forms are emerging in endlessly. In this sense, emerging market countries and developing countries face rare development opportunities. At the same time, we must also see that the downside risks and uncertainties of the world economy are rising simultaneously, multilateral trade negotiations are struggling, and the implementation of the Paris Agreement has encountered resistance. In some countries, the tendency of internal supervision has increased, and the willingness to participate in international development cooperation has declined. The spillover effect of policy adjustment is still fermenting. The world economy has entered a critical period of accelerating the conversion of old and new kinetic energy. The game between the parties around interests and rules is becoming increasingly fierce. The external environment of emerging market countries and developing countries is more complicated and grim. , Sailing against the current, retreating if not advancing. Facing the new situation, emerging market countries and developing countries need to work together to strengthen their confidence, join hands in creating a favorable development environment, strive to achieve greater development, and make greater contributions to world economic growth. (1) Strengthen unity and cooperation and jointly build an open world economy. In today's era, all countries are interdependent and integrated communities of interests. Openness, tolerance, and win-win cooperation are the only correct choices. Enthusiastic neighbors and zero-sum games will not help world economic growth. Emerging market countries and developing countries will be the first victims. We must advocate for an open world economy, firmly support the multilateral trading system, oppose protectionism, and guide economic globalization to achieve an inclusive and inclusive rebalancing. It is necessary to strengthen the coordination of positions, promote positive results of the 11th Ministerial Conference of the World Trade Organization, promote the remaining issues of the Doha Development Round, and clarify the direction for the development of the multilateral trading system. Efforts should be made to enhance the representation and voice of emerging market countries and developing countries in global economic governance, and promote the formation of a more just and reasonable international economic order. (2) Strengthen solidarity and cooperation to jointly implement the 2030 Agenda for Sustainable Development. Development is the first priority of emerging market countries and developing countries. Based on our own national conditions, we must effectively link the sustainable development agenda with our national development strategies, promote it persistently, and explore a road of sustainable development in which economic, social, and environmental coordination goes hand in hand. We must call on the international community to place development at an important position in macro policy coordination, play the role of the United Nations, make good use of the high-level political forum on sustainable development, and accelerate the implementation of the sustainable development agenda. It is necessary to urge developed countries to keep their promises and increase their support for developing countries in accordance with the principles of common but differentiated responsibilities. Recently, the United Nations development system is brewing reforms. We must promote reforms to focus on development, increase investment, and truly serve the needs of developing countries. (3) Strengthen solidarity and cooperation, and jointly grasp the historical opportunities of world economic restructuring. The new round of technology and industrial revolution has spawned new momentum for development, and has also brought rare development opportunities. Seizing this opportunity, emerging market countries and developing countries may achieve "overtaking in corners". Without this opportunity, the North-South divide and the imbalance in development will further expand. Therefore, we must have the courage to innovate and dare to reform, drastically advance the adjustment of the economic structure, and tap the endogenous driving force for development. At the same time, it is necessary to solve the problem of underpinning social policies and pay attention to ensuring and improving people's livelihood. We should focus on infrastructure construction, science and technology, education, industry and other fields, strengthen development strategy docking, experience exchange, and capacity building cooperation to help each other's economic development. (4) Strengthen solidarity and cooperationFocus on the field, strengthen development strategy docking, experience exchange, and capacity building cooperation to help each other's economic development. (4) Strengthen unity and cooperation and jointly build a wide range of development partnerships. A flower is not spring, so lone geese are difficult to travel. Emerging market countries and developing countries face similar development tasks, deepen pragmatic cooperation, and give play to complementary advantages, which can produce a positive effect of "one plus one is greater than two." We must make good use of the BRICS and the Group of 77 and other mechanisms to carry out South-South cooperation in a wider and wider field, work together to meet various global challenges, cultivate a joint development chain, and achieve joint self-reliance. This year, China invited representative developing countries to attend this dialogue, the purpose of which is to build a network of partners and a development community and a community of shared destiny among nations. , Colleagues! , China attaches great importance to the 2030 Agenda for Sustainable Development, has formulated country-level plans to implement the agenda, established sustainable development innovation demonstration zones, and achieved many early gains in the economic, social, and environmental fields. To promote international development cooperation, China will use the South-South Cooperation Assistance Fund, China-United Nations Peace and Development Fund, Climate Change South-South Cooperation Fund and other mechanisms to actively help other developing countries implement the sustainable development agenda. , I would like to take this opportunity to announce that China will provide $500 million in aid under the South-South Cooperation Assistance Fund to help other developing countries cope with the challenges of famine, refugees, climate change, and public health. China will also use platforms such as the International Development Knowledge Center and the South-South Cooperation and Development Institute to strengthen development experience exchange and capacity-building cooperation with other countries and provide 40,000 training places for other developing countries to China in the coming year. 4 years ago, I proposed the initiative to jointly build the “Belt and Road” initiative, which received a warm response from the international community. In May this year, China successfully hosted the “Belt and Road” International Cooperation Summit Forum, worked with relevant countries and international organizations to outline the “Belt and Road” construction cooperation vision, and proposed a series of pragmatic measures to support the sustainable development of countries along the Belt and Road. All parties believe that the concept and direction of the joint construction of the “Belt and Road” initiative, including policy communication, facility connectivity, unimpeded trade, capital and financial connectivity, and people’s hearts, are highly compatible with the 2030 Agenda for Sustainable Development, and are fully capable of strengthening docking and mutual promotion . "The Belt and Road Initiative" is a road to cooperation, but also a road to hope and a win-win situation. China will combine the achievements of the “Belt and Road” International Cooperation Summit Forum and cooperate with relevant countries in the areas of infrastructure interconnection, capacity cooperation, technological innovation and other fields. The ancient Chinese said: "Is it easy to do things in the world? For those who are difficult, it is easy to carry on; if not, it is easy to be easy." Emerging market countries and developing countries represent the future of world development. It is our due responsibility to promote international development cooperation and implement the sustainable development agenda. Let us join hands to open up a fair, open, comprehensive and innovative development path. , thank you all. , (Xinhua News Agency, Xiamen, September 5th), "People's Daily" (September 06, 2017, 03 edition),]
eng_title: Xi Jinping: Deepen mutually beneficial cooperation and promote common development
source-date: 来源：人民网－人民日报          发布时间：2017-09-06
text: [, 各位同事，, 女士们，先生们，朋友们：, 　　上午好！现在，我宣布新兴市场国家与发展中国家对话会开始。, 　　热烈欢迎大家出席新兴市场国家与发展中国家对话会。金砖国家在领导人会晤期间，注重同其他新兴市场国家和发展中国家进行沟通交流。中方今年有所创新，邀请了来自不同地区有代表性的国家出席今天的对话会，相信这种对话有利于新兴市场国家和发展中国家加强团结合作，有利于金砖机制自身发展。, 　　今天，大家能够聚到一起非常难得。很多同事是远道而来，有的还专门为出席对话会调整了日程安排，我对此表示感谢。我期待同大家围绕“深化互利合作，促进共同发展”的主题，共商发展合作大计，为深化南南合作、落实2030年可持续发展议程注入强劲动力。, 　　进入新世纪以来，新兴市场国家和发展中国家群体性崛起，成为不可逆转的时代潮流。近几年，这些国家对世界经济增长的贡献率稳居高位，2016年达到80%，是当之无愧的主引擎。近期，世界经济呈现向好态势，国际贸易和投资回升，新一轮科技和工业革命蓄势待发，新产业、新技术、新业态层出不穷。从这个意义上讲，新兴市场国家和发展中国家面临难得的发展机遇。, 　　同时，我们也要看到，世界经济下行风险和不确定性在同步上升，多边贸易谈判举步维艰，《巴黎协定》落实遭遇阻力。部分国家内顾倾向加重，参与国际发展合作意愿减退，其政策调整的外溢效应仍在发酵。世界经济进入新旧动能加速转换的关键期，各方围绕利益、规则的博弈日益激烈，新兴市场国家和发展中国家所处的外部环境更加复杂严峻。, 　　逆水行舟，不进则退。面对新的形势，新兴市场国家和发展中国家需要同舟共济，坚定信心，联手营造有利发展环境，努力实现更大发展，为世界经济增长作出更大贡献。, 　　（一）加强团结协作，共同构建开放型世界经济。当今时代，各国是相互依存、彼此融合的利益共同体，开放包容、合作共赢是唯一正确的选择。搞以邻为壑、零和游戏无助于世界经济增长，新兴市场国家和发展中国家将是首当其冲的受害者。我们要为开放型世界经济鼓与呼，坚定支持多边贸易体制，反对保护主义，引导经济全球化实现包容、普惠的再平衡。要加强立场协调，推动世界贸易组织第十一届部长级会议取得积极成果，推进多哈发展回合剩余议题，并为多边贸易体制发展明确方向。要努力提升新兴市场国家和发展中国家在全球经济治理中的代表性和发言权，推动形成更加公正合理的国际经济秩序。, 　　（二）加强团结协作，共同落实2030年可持续发展议程。发展是新兴市场国家和发展中国家的第一要务。我们要立足自身国情，把可持续发展议程同本国发展战略有效对接，持之以恒加以推进，探索出一条经济、社会、环境协调并进的可持续发展之路。要呼吁国际社会把发展置于宏观政策协调的重要位置，发挥联合国作用，利用好可持续发展高级别政治论坛，加快落实可持续发展议程。要敦促发达国家信守承诺，根据共同但有区别的责任等原则，增加对发展中国家支持力度。近期，联合国发展系统酝酿改革，我们要推动改革聚焦发展，增加投入，真正服务广大发展中国家需要。, 　　（三）加强团结协作，共同把握世界经济结构调整的历史机遇。新一轮科技和工业革命催生新的发展动能，也带来千载难逢的发展机遇。抓住这个机遇，新兴市场国家和发展中国家就可能实现“弯道超车”。失去这个机遇，南北鸿沟、发展失衡将进一步扩大。因此，我们必须勇于创新、敢于改革，大刀阔斧推进经济结构调整，挖掘发展内生动力。同时，要解决好社会政策托底问题，重视保障和改善民生。我们应该相互以基础设施建设、科技、教育、工业等领域为重点，加强发展战略对接、经验交流、能力建设合作，助力彼此经济发展。, 　　（四）加强团结协作，共同建设广泛的发展伙伴关系。一花不是春，孤雁难成行。新兴市场国家和发展中国家面临相似的发展任务，深化务实合作，发挥互补优势，能产生“一加一大于二”的积极效应。我们要利用好金砖国家、七十七国集团等机制，在更大范围、更广领域开展南南合作，携手应对各种全球性挑战，培育联动发展链条，实现联合自强。今年，中方邀请有代表性的发展中国家出席这次对话会，目的就在于构建伙伴网络，建设各国发展共同体、命运共同体。, 　　各位同事！, 　　中国高度重视2030年可持续发展议程，制定了落实议程的国别方案，建立了可持续发展创新示范区，在经济、社会、环境等领域取得多项早期收获。为推动国际发展合作，中方将利用南南合作援助基金、中国—联合国和平与发展基金、气候变化南南合作基金等机制，积极助力其他发展中国家落实可持续发展议程。, 　　我愿借此机会宣布，中国将在南南合作援助基金项下提供5亿美元援助，帮助其他发展中国家应对饥荒、难民、气候变化、公共卫生等挑战。中方还将利用国际发展知识中心、南南合作与发展学院等平台，同各国加强发展经验交流和能力建设合作，并在未来1年为其他发展中国家提供4万个来华培训名额。, 　　4年前，我提出共建“一带一路”倡议，得到国际社会热烈响应。今年5月，中国成功主办“一带一路”国际合作高峰论坛，同有关国家和国际组织一道勾画“一带一路”建设合作愿景，提出一系列支持沿线国家可持续发展的务实举措。各方都认为，共建“一带一路”倡议的理念和方向，包括政策沟通、设施联通、贸易畅通、资金融通、民心相通，同2030年可持续发展议程高度契合，完全能够加强对接，相互促进。, 　　“一带一路”是一条合作之路，更是一条希望之路、共赢之路。中方将结合“一带一路”国际合作高峰论坛成果落实，同有关国家在基础设施互联互通、产能合作、科技创新等领域开展合作。, 　　中国古人说：“天下事有难易乎？为之，则难者亦易矣；不为，则易者亦难矣。”新兴市场国家和发展中国家代表着世界发展的未来。促进国际发展合作、落实可持续发展议程是我们应有的担当。让我们携起手来，一起开辟一条公平、开放、全面、创新的发展之路。, 　　谢谢大家。, 　　（新华社厦门9月5日电） , 　　《 人民日报 》（ 2017年09月06日 03 版）, ]
title: 习近平：深化互利合作 促进共同发展

eng: [, journalist friends, ladies and gentlemen: Good afternoon! It is a pleasure to meet you and introduce you to the BRICS leaders' meeting and the dialogue between emerging market countries and developing countries. , Yesterday, the meeting of leaders of the BRICS countries in Xiamen ended successfully. The leaders of our five countries exchanged in-depth views on the current international situation, global governance, and BRICS cooperation, and reached broad consensus on the theme of "deepening the BRICS partnership and opening up a brighter future." The Xiamen meeting adopted the "Brazil Declaration of Leaders of BRICS Countries", reaffirming the BRICS spirit of openness, inclusiveness and win-win cooperation, comprehensively summarizing the successful experience of BRICS cooperation in the past 10 years, in order to strengthen the BRICS partnership and deepen practical cooperation in various fields A new blueprint was planned. During the meeting, China held a dialogue meeting between emerging market countries and developing countries. The leaders of the BRICS countries, Egypt, Mexico, Thailand, Tajikistan and Guinea were invited to attend. Leaders of various countries combined the theme of the "Deepening Mutually Beneficial Cooperation and Promoting Common Development" theme, discussed international development cooperation plans, and agreed to establish a wide range of development partnerships, accelerate the implementation of the 2030 sustainable development agenda, and promote common development of all countries. 10 years ago, the BRIC cooperation emerged at a time when the world pattern was profoundly adjusted and reformed, which aroused great concern from the international community. Tested by major challenges such as the international financial crisis, the BRICS countries have explored a new path for unity, cooperation and mutual benefit between emerging market countries and developing countries. Leaders of various countries are determined to take the Xiamen meeting as a new starting point, strengthen their convictions, and make persistent efforts to jointly build a closer, broader, and more comprehensive strategic partnership and create the second "Golden Decade" of BRICS cooperation. The leaders of our five countries believe that the world today is undergoing profound and complex changes, and the prospects for world economic growth are improving, but various global challenges are emerging. The BRICS countries are all countries with important influence. They should deepen communication and coordination on major issues and promote the establishment of a more just and reasonable international order; they should play a constructive role, defend the basic norms of international relations, and safeguard international fairness and justice; they should cooperate Respond to various global challenges, promote open, inclusive, inclusive, balanced, and win-win economic globalization, accelerate global economic governance reform, increase the representation and voice of emerging market countries and developing countries, and create a good externality for the development of all countries surroundings. The leaders of our five countries believe that pragmatic cooperation is the foundation of BRICS cooperation, and that deep roots can only be luxuriant. Based on the principle of mutual benefit and win-win results, we should strengthen macro-policy coordination, connect development strategies, and comprehensively deepen cooperation in various fields such as economy, trade, finance, industry, and sustainable development to form a joint development pattern. This year, the BRICS has made new progress in pragmatic cooperation, and the gold content has been further improved. We have planned a cooperation roadmap in the areas of trade facilitation, service trade, currency swap, local currency settlement, government and social capital cooperation, established the New Development Bank Africa Regional Center, and formulated the BRICS Innovation Cooperation Action Plan. After a year of work, the BRICS countries have taken new steps towards the goals of a large market for trade and investment, a large circulation of money and finance, and a major infrastructure connection. We all emphasize that we must pay more attention to the role of innovation, seize the historical opportunities of the new industrial revolution, accelerate the optimization of the economic structure, and jointly achieve higher quality, more resilient and more sustainable growth. Our leaders of the five countries believe that deepening political and security cooperation and enhancing strategic mutual trust are in line with the common interests of the five countries and the expectations of the international community. Since this year, we have exchanged in-depth views on the international situation, global governance, international and regional hotspots, national security and development, and reached important consensus. We successfully held a meeting of high-level representatives of security affairs and the first formal meeting of foreign ministers this year, which injected new impetus into deepening BRICS political and security cooperation. We have established a regular consultation mechanism with permanent representatives in New York, Geneva, and Vienna to coordinate positions on major issues of common concern. Our cooperation in the areas of anti-terrorism, cybersecurity, peacekeeping, and Middle East issues has advanced smoothly. These have increased the influence of the BRICS countries. We support the continuation of good momentum in political and security cooperation, play our due role, and make greater contributions to maintaining global peace and stability.
