We believe that despite all the differences and contradictions among countries in the world, it is inevitable that such bumps and bumps will occur, but people of all countries in the world live under the same blue sky and own the same home, and should be a family. People of all countries in the world should uphold the concept of "one family in the world", open arms, understand each other, seek common ground while reserving differences, and work together to build a community of shared future for mankind. , 　　 In 2013, I first proposed an initiative to build a community of human destiny. I am glad to see that the friendly cooperation between China and other countries in the world continues to expand, and the concept of a community of shared future for mankind has received more and more support and approval from people. , 　　 I put forward the "Belt and Road" initiative, is to implement the concept of the community of human destiny. Over the past four years, the joint construction of the “Belt and Road” has become a huge cooperation platform for all countries to achieve common development. The trickle flows into the sea, and a little star lights up the galaxy. I am convinced that as long as all parties establish the concept of a community of human destiny, plan together, and practice together, bit by bit, persevere and work tirelessly, the goal of building a community of human destiny will be achieved. , 　　 ladies, gentlemen, friends!　　Community of human destiny, as the name implies, is that the future and destiny of each nation and country are closely linked, and we should work together in the same wind and rain, and work together to make the planet we were born in and grow in a harmonious family. Turn people's longing for a better life into reality. , 　　——We must work hard to build a world that is free from fear and generally safe. Throughout the development of human civilization, although mankind has been hoping for permanent peace for thousands of years, war has never been far away, and mankind has always faced the threat of war. Human beings live on the same earth, the security of one country cannot be built on the insecurity of other countriesHowever, war has never been far away, and mankind has always faced the threat of war. Human beings live on the same earth. The security of one country cannot be built on the insecurity of other countries. The threats faced by other countries may also become challenges for their own countries. In the face of increasingly complex and comprehensive security threats, it is impossible to fight alone, and superstition is not enough. We should adhere to a new security concept that is common, comprehensive, cooperative and sustainable, create a fair and just security, build a shared security pattern, jointly eliminate the root causes of war, jointly rescue the people driven by guns, and jointly protect women who are burned by war Children, let the sun shine on the earth, let everyone enjoy peace and tranquility. , 　　——We must strive to build a world free from poverty and common prosperity. In today’s world, the level of material technology has developed to a point unimaginable by the ancients, but the problem of imbalanced development is still widespread, the gap between North and South development is still huge, poverty and hunger are still serious, a new digital divide is forming, and there are still many in the world. People in many countries live in predicament. If you follow the old logic of losing and winning, and the winner-take-all, if you adopt the old method of cheating and taking advantage of your neighbors, the result will inevitably be to close the door of others and to block your own way, eroding the foundation of your own development, What harms the future of all mankind. We should adhere to the concept of hello, hello, everyone, and promote open, inclusive, inclusive, balanced, and win-win economic globalization, create good conditions for the common development of all mankind, jointly promote the development and prosperity of all countries in the world, and eliminate the people of many countries. Still facing poverty and backwardness, we work together to create a carefree life for children around the world, let the fruits of development benefit all countries in the world, and let everyone enjoy prosperity and well-being. , 　　-We must strive to build a world that is far from closed, open and inclusive. There is an old Chinese saying: "Everything is bred without harming each other, and the ways are parallel but not contradictory." The prosperity of civilization and the progress of mankind are inseparable from seeking common ground while reserving differences, being open and inclusive, and inseparable from civilization exchange and mutual learning. History calls for the glory of human civilization. Different civilizations should coexist in harmony and complement each other to provide spiritual power for human development. We should adhere to the idea that the world is rich and colorful and civilizations are diverse, let the various civilizations created by human beings shine together, weave colorful pictures, and jointly eliminate the cultural barriers in real life, and jointly resist the concept of hindering the interaction of human souls. To jointly break down the spiritual barriers that hinder human interaction, allow various civilizations to coexist in harmony, and let everyone enjoy cultural nourishment. , 　　——We must strive to build a beautiful, clean and beautiful world. The earth is the common home of mankind and the only home of mankind so far. Now, someone is looking for a new home for humanity in outer space, but this is still a distant dream. In the foreseeable future, humanity will all live on earth. This is an immutable fact. We should take good care of the earth homeland for ourselves and for future generations. We should adhere to the concept of symbiosis and coexistence between man and nature, treat the ecological environment like life, respect the nature, respect nature, adapt to nature, protect nature, jointly protect the irreplaceable home of the earth, and heal the scars of the ecological environment. Together to create a harmonious and livable human home, let the natural ecology rest and rejuvenate, let everyone enjoy the green water and green mountains. , 　　 ladies, gentlemen, friends! At present, the world pattern is changing and the development pattern is changing. All political parties must follow the trend of the times, grasp the trend of human progress, meet the common expectations of the people, and closely integrate their own development with the development of the country, nation, and humanity. We should be ambitious, dare to take responsibility, focus on our country and the world, focus on the overall situation and long-term, and consciously shoulder the mission of the times. We should deeply understand the people's sentiments, transform the needs of the people into the party's ideas, objectives, and goals, and formulate practical implementation plans. Building a community with a shared future for mankind requires universal participation of people from all over the world. We should gather the consensus of people of different nationalities, different beliefs, different cultures, and different regions, and work together to build the great cause of a community of shared future for mankind. , 　　Realize the great dream requires all aspects of wisdom and strength. We should brainstorm ideas from all angles, levels, and angles, sum up experience from practice, seek ideas, sublimate ideas, and gain motivation. Political parties in different countries should increase mutual trust, strengthen communication, and cooperate closely, explore the establishment of a new type of political party relationship that seeks common ground while reserving differences, respects, and learns from each other on the basis of a new type of international relations, and builds various forms and levels of international political party exchanges and cooperation The network brings together a powerful force that builds a community of human destiny. , 　　 things must be done in order to achieve a career, the road must go to open the way. Building a community of human destiny is a historical process. It cannot be accomplished overnight or smoothly, and it requires long and arduous efforts. In order to construct. Building a community of human destiny is a historical process. It cannot be accomplished overnight or smoothly, and it requires long and arduous efforts. In order to build a community with a shared future for mankind, we should persevere and work hard. We must not give up our dreams because of the complexity of reality, nor can we give up our pursuits because of distant ideals. , 　　 ladies, gentlemen, friends! , 　　 The Communist Party of China is a party that seeks happiness for the Chinese people and a party striving for human progress. The Communist Party of China is the largest political party in the world. As I said, big is like big. All the Chinese Communist Party does is to seek happiness for the Chinese people, to revive the Chinese nation, and to seek peace and development for mankind. We need to do our own thing well, which itself is a contribution to building a community of shared future for mankind. We must also create more opportunities for the world by promoting China's development, explore the laws of human social development by deepening our own practices, and share them with other countries in the world. We do not "import" the foreign model, nor "export" the Chinese model, and will not require other countries to "copy" China's practice. The Communist Party of China will always do the following. , 　　 First, as always, contribute to the world and peace. Nearly 100 years ago, the Communist Party of China was born in the turmoil of Chinese society. One of its tasks at the time of its establishment was to end the tragic situation of frequent wars and people’s lack of livelihood in China since the mid-19th century. From 1921 to 1949, in order to achieve peace and stability in China and live and work in peace and contentment for the Chinese people, the Communist Party of China led the Chinese people in armed struggle for 28 years and made tremendous sacrifices. Therefore, the Chinese Communists know the value of peace and have the firm determination to maintain peace. China will hold high the banner of peace, development, cooperation, and win-win results, will continue to pursue the path of peaceful development, actively promote the construction of global partnerships, and actively participate in the political resolution process of international hot and difficult issues. At present, China has accumulatively sent more than 36,000 peacekeepers to become the main troop-contributing country and capital-contributing country to UN peacekeeping operations. At this moment, more than 2,500 Chinese officers and soldiers are in the 8 peacekeeping mission areas, defying hardship and danger, and maintaining local peace and tranquility. China will actively participate in the reform and construction of the global governance system and promote the development of the international political and economic order in a more just and reasonable direction. No matter how far China develops, it will never dominate and never expand. We propose that political parties from all over the world join us in being a builder of world peace, a contributor to global development, and a defender of the international order. , 　　 Second, as always, contribute to the common development of the world. The Communist Party of China has come from the people and relied on the development and growth of the people. It has always had a deep feeling for the people, not only for the Chinese people, but also for the people of all countries in the world. It is not only willing to benefit the Chinese people, but also for the people of the world. benefit. For a long time, China has provided a large amount of free assistance, preferential loans, a large number of technical support, personnel support, and intellectual support for developing countries, and has built a large number of economic and social development and livelihood improvement projects for the developing countries. Today, thousands of Chinese scientists, engineers, entrepreneurs, technicians, medical staff, teachers, ordinary employees, volunteers, etc. are struggling hand in hand with the local people on the vast land of many developing countries. Help them change their destiny. According to the arrangements of the 19th National Congress of the Communist Party of China, China will fully build a moderately prosperous society by 2020, by 2035 China will basically realize socialist modernization, and by the middle of this century, China will be a prosperous, powerful, democratic, civilized, harmonious and beautiful socialist modern power. This will benefit the Chinese people as well as the people of all countries in the world. We propose that political parties from all over the world join us to create more opportunities for cooperation in the world and strive to promote the common development and prosperity of all countries in the world. , 　　 Third, as always, contribute to the exchange of mutual knowledge between the civilizations of the world. Stones from other hills, can learn. The Communist Party of China has always emphasized setting a world perspective, actively learning from the civilization achievements created by the people of all countries in the world, and applying them in light of China's reality. Marxism is the scientific truth learned by Chinese Communists from abroad. Combining with China's reality, we continue to advance the popularization of Marxism in China and make it a scientific theory that guides the Communist Party of China to lead the Chinese people to continue to advance. The Communist Party of China will treat the civilization and creation of the people of all countries in the world with an open mind and an open mind. It is willing to carry out dialogue, exchanges and cooperation with people and political parties of all countries in the world, and supports people of all countries to strengthen humanistic exchanges and non-governmental friendship. In the next five years, the Communist Party of China will provide political parties from all over the world with an opportunity to communicate with 15,000 people in China. We propose to institutionalize the high-level dialogue between the Chinese Communist Party and the world’s political parties to make it a high-end political dialogue platform with broad representation and international influence. ,   LadiesThe high-level dialogue between the Communist Party and the world's political parties has been institutionalized, making it a high-end political dialogue platform with broad representation and international influence. , 　　 ladies, gentlemen, friends! , 　　 More than 2000 years ago, ancient Chinese thinker Confucius said that the three friends of the beneficiary are straight, friendly and understandable. The Chinese Communist Party is willing to make friends all over the world. For a long time, the Communist Party of China has maintained regular contacts with more than 400 political parties and political organizations in more than 160 countries and regions in the world, and the "friend circle" has been continuously expanding. Facing the future, the Communist Party of China is willing to strengthen contacts with political parties around the world, share the experience of ruling the party and the country, carry out civilized exchanges and dialogues, enhance mutual strategic trust, work with people around the world to promote the construction of a community of shared future for mankind, and build a better world together! , 　　 Finally, I wish the high-level dialogue between the Chinese Communist Party and the world's political parties a complete success! ,   thank you all. , 　　 (Xinhua News Agency, Beijing, December 1st), 　　 "People's Daily" (December 02, 2017, 02 edition),]
eng_title: Xi Jinping's keynote speech at the high-level dialogue between the Chinese Communist Party and the world's political parties
source-date: 来源：人民网－人民日报          发布时间：2017-12-02
text: [, 尊敬的各国政党领导人，, 女士们，先生们，朋友们：, 　　大家下午好！今天，有机会同来自世界各国的政党和政治组织领导人一起出席中国共产党与世界政党高层对话会，我感到十分高兴。年终岁末，大家工作都很繁忙，仍抽出宝贵时间齐聚北京，共商合作大计，充分体现了大家对人类发展和世界前途的关心。, 　　在这里，我谨代表中国共产党，并以我个人的名义，向远道而来的各国朋友表示热烈的欢迎！中共十九大召开时，很多政党和政治组织及其领导人来信来电表示祝贺，我愿利用今天的机会，向大家表示衷心的感谢！, 　　中共十九大规划了中国从现在到本世纪中叶的发展蓝图，宣示了中方愿同各方推动构建人类命运共同体的真诚愿望。政党在国家政治生活中发挥着重要作用，也是推动人类文明进步的重要力量。在座各位是来自世界各国近300个政党和政治组织的领导人。我愿同大家分享我们的心得。, 　　女士们、先生们、朋友们！, 　　古往今来，过上幸福美好生活始终是人类孜孜以求的梦想。在几千年文明发展史上，人类创造了灿烂的文明成果，但战争和冲突从未间断，加上各种自然灾害、疾病瘟疫，人类经历了无数的苦难，付出了惨痛的代价。今天，互联网、大数据、云计算、量子卫星、人工智能迅猛发展，人类生活的关联前所未有，同时人类面临的全球性问题数量之多、规模之大、程度之深也前所未有。世界各国人民前途命运越来越紧密地联系在一起。, 　　面对这种局势，人类有两种选择。一种是，人们为了争权夺利恶性竞争甚至兵戎相见，这很可能带来灾难性危机。另一种是，人们顺应时代发展潮流，齐心协力应对挑战，开展全球性协作，这就将为构建人类命运共同体创造有利条件。我们要抓住历史机遇，作出正确选择，共同开创人类更加光明的未来。, 　　中华民族拥有悠久历史和灿烂文明，但近代以后历经血与火的磨难。中国人民没有向命运屈服，而是奋起抗争、自强不息，经过长期奋斗，而今走上了实现中华民族伟大复兴的康庄大道。回顾历史，支撑我们这个古老民族走到今天的，支撑5000多年中华文明延绵至今的，是植根于中华民族血脉深处的文化基因。中华民族历来讲求“天下一家”，主张民胞物与、协和万邦、天下大同，憧憬“大道之行，天下为公”的美好世界。我们认为，世界各国尽管有这样那样的分歧矛盾，也免不了产生这样那样的磕磕碰碰，但世界各国人民都生活在同一片蓝天下、拥有同一个家园，应该是一家人。世界各国人民应该秉持“天下一家”理念，张开怀抱，彼此理解，求同存异，共同为构建人类命运共同体而努力。, 　　2013年，我首次提出构建人类命运共同体的倡议。我高兴地看到，中国同世界各国的友好合作不断拓展，人类命运共同体理念得到越来越多人的支持和赞同，这一倡议正在从理念转化为行动。, 　　我提出“一带一路”倡议，就是要实践人类命运共同体理念。4年来，共建“一带一路”已成为有关各国实现共同发展的巨大合作平台。涓涓细流汇成大海，点点星光点亮银河。我深信，只要各方树立人类命运共同体理念，一起来规划，一起来实践，一点一滴坚持努力，日积月累不懈奋斗，构建人类命运共同体的目标就一定能够实现。, 　　女士们、先生们、朋友们！, 　　人类命运共同体，顾名思义，就是每个民族、每个国家的前途命运都紧紧联系在一起，应该风雨同舟，荣辱与共，努力把我们生于斯、长于斯的这个星球建成一个和睦的大家庭，把世界各国人民对美好生活的向往变成现实。, 　　——我们要努力建设一个远离恐惧、普遍安全的世界。纵观人类文明发展进程，尽管千百年来人类一直期盼永久和平，但战争从未远离，人类始终面临着战火的威胁。人类生存在同一个地球上，一国安全不能建立在别国不安全之上，别国面临的威胁也可能成为本国的挑战。面对日益复杂化、综合化的安全威胁，单打独斗不行，迷信武力更不行。我们应该坚持共同、综合、合作、可持续的新安全观，营造公平正义、共建共享的安全格局，共同消除引发战争的根源，共同解救被枪炮驱赶的民众，共同保护被战火烧灼的妇女儿童，让和平的阳光普照大地，让人人享有安宁祥和。, 　　——我们要努力建设一个远离贫困、共同繁荣的世界。今天的世界，物质技术水平已经发展到古人难以想象的地步，但发展不平衡不充分问题仍然普遍存在，南北发展差距依然巨大，贫困和饥饿依然严重，新的数字鸿沟正在形成，世界上还有很多国家的民众生活在困境之中。如果奉行你输我赢、赢者通吃的老一套逻辑，如果采取尔虞我诈、以邻为壑的老一套办法，结果必然是封上了别人的门，也堵上了自己的路，侵蚀的是自己发展的根基，损害的是全人类的未来。我们应该坚持你好我好大家好的理念，推进开放、包容、普惠、平衡、共赢的经济全球化，创造全人类共同发展的良好条件，共同推动世界各国发展繁荣，共同消除许多国家民众依然面临的贫穷落后，共同为全球的孩子们营造衣食无忧的生活，让发展成果惠及世界各国，让人人享有富足安康。, 　　——我们要努力建设一个远离封闭、开放包容的世界。中国有句古话：“万物并育而不相害，道并行而不相悖。”文明的繁盛、人类的进步，离不开求同存异、开放包容，离不开文明交流、互学互鉴。历史呼唤着人类文明同放异彩，不同文明应该和谐共生、相得益彰，共同为人类发展提供精神力量。我们应该坚持世界是丰富多彩的、文明是多样的理念，让人类创造的各种文明交相辉映，编织出斑斓绚丽的图画，共同消除现实生活中的文化壁垒，共同抵制妨碍人类心灵互动的观念纰缪，共同打破阻碍人类交往的精神隔阂，让各种文明和谐共存，让人人享有文化滋养。, 　　——我们要努力建设一个山清水秀、清洁美丽的世界。地球是人类的共同家园，也是人类到目前为止唯一的家园。现在，有人正在外太空为人类寻找新的家园，但这还是一个遥远的梦想。在可预见的将来，人类都要生活在地球之上。这是一个不可改变的事实。我们应该共同呵护好地球家园，为了我们自己，也为了子孙后代。我们应该坚持人与自然共生共存的理念，像对待生命一样对待生态环境，对自然心存敬畏，尊重自然、顺应自然、保护自然，共同保护不可替代的地球家园，共同医治生态环境的累累伤痕，共同营造和谐宜居的人类家园，让自然生态休养生息，让人人都享有绿水青山。, 　　女士们、先生们、朋友们！, 　　当前，世界格局在变，发展格局在变，各个政党都要顺应时代发展潮流、把握人类进步大势、顺应人民共同期待，把自身发展同国家、民族、人类的发展紧密结合在一起。我们应该志存高远、敢于担当，着眼本国和世界，着眼全局和长远，自觉担负起时代使命。我们应该深入体察民情，把民众需求转化为政党的理念、宗旨、目标，制定符合实际的实施方案。构建人类命运共同体，需要世界各国人民普遍参与。我们应该凝聚不同民族、不同信仰、不同文化、不同地域人民的共识，共襄构建人类命运共同体的伟业。, 　　实现伟大梦想需要各方面智慧和力量。我们应该全方位、多层次、多角度集思广益，从实践中总结经验、寻找思路、升华思想、获取动力。不同国家的政党应该增进互信、加强沟通、密切协作，探索在新型国际关系的基础上建立求同存异、相互尊重、互学互鉴的新型政党关系，搭建多种形式、多种层次的国际政党交流合作网络，汇聚构建人类命运共同体的强大力量。, 　　事要去做才能成就事业，路要去走才能开辟通途。构建人类命运共同体是一个历史过程，不可能一蹴而就，也不可能一帆风顺，需要付出长期艰苦的努力。为了构建人类命运共同体，我们应该锲而不舍、驰而不息进行努力，不能因现实复杂而放弃梦想，也不能因理想遥远而放弃追求。, 　　女士们、先生们、朋友们！, 　　中国共产党是为中国人民谋幸福的党，也是为人类进步事业而奋斗的党。中国共产党是世界上最大的政党。我说过，大就要有大的样子。中国共产党所做的一切，就是为中国人民谋幸福、为中华民族谋复兴、为人类谋和平与发展。我们要把自己的事情做好，这本身就是对构建人类命运共同体的贡献。我们也要通过推动中国发展给世界创造更多机遇，通过深化自身实践探索人类社会发展规律并同世界各国分享。我们不“输入”外国模式，也不“输出”中国模式，不会要求别国“复制”中国的做法。中国共产党将始终做到以下几条。, 　　第一，一如既往为世界和平安宁作贡献。将近100年前，中国共产党在中国社会的剧烈动荡中诞生，成立时的任务之一就是结束中国从19世纪中叶起陷入的战乱频仍、民不聊生的悲惨境地。从1921年到1949年，为实现中国和平稳定、中国人民安居乐业，中国共产党团结带领中国人民进行了长达28年的武装斗争，付出了巨大牺牲。所以，中国共产党人深知和平的可贵，也具有维护和平的坚定决心。中国将高举和平、发展、合作、共赢的旗帜，始终不渝走和平发展道路，积极推进全球伙伴关系建设，主动参与国际热点难点问题的政治解决进程。目前，中国累计派出3.6万余人次维和人员，成为联合国维和行动的主要出兵国和出资国。此时此刻，2500多名中国官兵正在8个维和任务区不畏艰苦和危险，维护着当地和平安宁。中国将积极参与全球治理体系改革和建设，推动国际政治经济秩序朝着更加公正合理的方向发展。中国无论发展到什么程度，都永远不称霸，永远不搞扩张。我们倡议世界各国政党同我们一道，做世界和平的建设者、全球发展的贡献者、国际秩序的维护者。, 　　第二，一如既往为世界共同发展作贡献。中国共产党从人民中走来、依靠人民发展壮大，历来有着深厚的人民情怀，不仅对中国人民有着深厚情怀，而且对世界各国人民有着深厚情怀，不仅愿意为中国人民造福，也愿意为世界各国人民造福。长期以来，中国为广大发展中国家提供了大量无偿援助、优惠贷款，提供了大量技术支持、人员支持、智力支持，为广大发展中国家建成了大批经济社会发展和民生改善项目。今天，成千上万的中国科学家、工程师、企业家、技术人员、医务人员、教师、普通职工、志愿者等正奋斗在众多发展中国家广阔的土地上，同当地民众手拉手、肩并肩，帮助他们改变命运。根据中共十九大的安排，到2020年中国将全面建成小康社会，到2035年中国将基本实现社会主义现代化，到本世纪中叶中国将建成富强民主文明和谐美丽的社会主义现代化强国。这将造福中国人民，也将造福世界各国人民。我们倡议世界各国政党同我们一道，为世界创造更多合作机会，努力推动世界各国共同发展繁荣。, 　　第三，一如既往为世界文明交流互鉴作贡献。他山之石，可以攻玉。中国共产党历来强调树立世界眼光，积极学习借鉴世界各国人民创造的文明成果，并结合中国实际加以运用。马克思主义就是中国共产党人从国外学来的科学真理。我们结合中国实际，不断推进马克思主义中国化时代化大众化，使之成为指导中国共产党领导中国人民不断前进的科学理论。中国共产党将以开放的眼光、开阔的胸怀对待世界各国人民的文明创造，愿意同世界各国人民和各国政党开展对话和交流合作，支持各国人民加强人文往来和民间友好。未来5年，中国共产党将向世界各国政党提供1.5万名人员来华交流的机会。我们倡议将中国共产党与世界政党高层对话会机制化，使之成为具有广泛代表性和国际影响力的高端政治对话平台。, 　　女士们、先生们、朋友们！, 　　2000多年前，中国古代思想家孔子就说，益者三友，友直、友谅、友多闻。中国共产党愿广交天下朋友。长期以来，中国共产党同世界上160多个国家和地区的400多个政党和政治组织保持着经常性联系，“朋友圈”不断扩大。面向未来，中国共产党愿同世界各国政党加强往来，分享治党治国经验，开展文明交流对话，增进彼此战略信任，同世界各国人民一道，推动构建人类命运共同体，携手建设更加美好的世界！, 　　最后，祝中国共产党与世界政党高层对话会圆满成功！, 　　谢谢大家。, 　　（新华社北京12月1日电） , 　　《 人民日报 》（ 2017年12月02日 02 版）, ]
title: 习近平在中国共产党与世界政党高层对话会上的主旨讲话

eng: [, 　　 On November 10, President Xi Jinping was invited to attend the APEC Business Leaders Summit held in Da Nang, Vietnam and delivered a keynote speech entitled "Seizing the Opportunities of World Economic Transformation and Seeking Greater Development in the Asia-Pacific".　　 Xinhua News Agency reporter Wang Yeshe, Mr. Wu Jinlu,, representatives of the Asia-Pacific industry and commerce, ladies and gentlemen, friends:, 　　 Hello everyone! It is a pleasure to come to Da Nang and meet again with friends from the Asia-Pacific business community. , 　　 Asia-Pacific is the largest sector of the global economy and a major engine of world economic growth. The business community is a new force promoting economic growth and an explorer and practitioner of new development concepts. In the past few years, every time I attended the APEC Leaders’ Informal Meeting, I took the time to meet friends from the business community to discuss ideas and measures to deal with current challenges. , 　　 In the 10 years since the international financial crisis, the international community has worked together to push the world economy back to recovery. Today, we are ushering in a gradual improvement in the world economy. Although still facing risks and uncertainties, global trade and investment are picking up, financial markets are expected to improve, and the confidence of all parties has increased significantly. , 　　The road to development has no end, only a new starting point. "The past can't be admired, but the comer can still be chased." The world is in a rapidly changing historical process, and the world economy is undergoing deeper changes. We must have an insight into the development trend of the world economy, find a correct position, grasp the law, and dare to respond. , 　　——We are facing a profound transformation of growth momentum. At present, reform and innovation have become the direction for all countries to resolve challenges and seek development. The positive effects and potential of structural reforms have been continuously released, and the promotion of economic growth in various countries has become more apparent. A new round of technology and industrial revolutions is gaining momentum, the digital economy and the sharing economy are accelerating, new industries, new models, and new formats are emerging, and new growth momentum is constantly accumulating. , 　　——We are facing a profound transformation of the global development mode. With the progress of the times, the connotation of development is undergoing profound changes. The development concept of innovation, coordination, greenness, openness and sharing is gaining popularity among the people, and achieving more comprehensive, more quality and more sustainable development is the goal pursued by the international community. Implementing the 2030 Agenda for Sustainable Development and addressing global challenges such as climate change has become an important consensus of the international community. , 　　——We are facing a profound transformation in the process of economic globalization. Over the past few decades, economic globalization has made important contributions to world economic development and has become an irreversible trend of the times. At the same time, in the face of developments and changes in the situation, economic globalization is facing new adjustments in form and content. The concept should focus more on openness and tolerance, the direction should pay more attention to inclusive balance, and the effect should pay more attention to fair and win-win. , 　　——We are facing a profound transformation of the global economic governance system. The evolution of the world economic pattern has put forward higher requirements for the global economic governance system. Adhering to multilateralism, seeking mutual consultation, joint construction and sharing, establishing close partnerships, and building a community of shared future for mankind are inevitable trends in global economic governance under the new situation. , 　　 ladies, gentlemen, friends! , 　　 Faced with the profound changes in the world economy, is Asia-Pacific courageously standing in the tide of reform and innovation, or is hesitant to hover? Should we take the initiative to guide economic globalization to move forward, or hesitate in the face of challenges? Should we work together to open up new prospects for regional cooperation, or should we move away from each other? , 　　 The answer is clear. We must follow the general trend, be courageous, and work together to open up a bright future for Asia-Pacific development and prosperity. , 　　 First, continue to build an open economy and strive to achieve mutual benefit and win-win results. Openness brings progress, and closure is bound to lag behind. Asia-Pacific economies have a profound experience of this through their own development practices. We must work hard to create a regional cooperation framework of equal consultation, broad participation, and universal benefit, work together to build an open Asia-Pacific economy, and promote trade and investment liberalization and facilitation. We must guide economic globalization in a direction that is more open, inclusive, inclusive, balanced, and mutually beneficial, benefiting different countries, different strata, and different people. We must take the initiative to adapt to changes in the global industrial division of labor, actively lead the reshaping of the global value chain, establish a new positioning, and build new advantages. We must support the multilateral trading system, adhere to open regionalism, and help developing members benefit more from international trade and investment. , 　　 The establishment of the Asia-Pacific Free Trade Area is the dream of the Asia-Pacific business community for many years. In 2006, precisely at the appeal of the business community, the leaders of APEC members established the vision of building the Asia-Pacific free trade zone for the first time in Hanoi. In 2014, we launched the Asia-Pacific Free Trade Zone process in Beijing. We should actFor the first time, the establishment of the Asia-Pacific Free Trade Zone was established as a long-term goal. In 2014, we launched the Asia-Pacific Free Trade Zone process in Beijing. We should take action to fully implement the Beijing road map in an in-depth manner, and continue to move towards the goal of establishing an Asia-Pacific free trade zone, so as to provide institutional guarantee for an open Asia-Pacific economy. , 　　 Second, continue to seek innovative growth and tap new development momentum. At present, the world economy is stabilizing, cyclical factors have played a large role, and the persistent illness with insufficient internal energy has not been eliminated. The world economy is completely free from the risks of "new mediocrity" and can only ask for innovation. , 　　 We are ushering in a new round of technological and industrial revolution, the digital economy and the sharing economy are setting off a wave worldwide, and new technologies such as artificial intelligence and quantum science are constantly making breakthroughs. Asia-Pacific cannot wait and see. We should seize opportunities, increase investment in innovation, change the mode of development, and cultivate new economic growth points. It is necessary to actively promote structural reforms, eliminate all institutional and institutional obstacles that are not conducive to innovation, and stimulate market vitality. It is necessary to implement the "Consensus of Economic Innovation Development, Reform and Growth" of the Beijing Conference, deepen cooperation between the Internet and the digital economy, and lead the direction of global innovation and development. , 　　 Third, continue to strengthen interconnection and interconnection to achieve joint development. Linked development is the best interpretation of the concept of mutual benefit and win-win. The interests of Asia-Pacific economies are blended and closely linked. Adhering to joint development can not only provide development momentum for partners, but also create greater development space for itself. In 2014, we formulated the APEC Connectivity Blueprint. We must use the blueprint as a guide to establish a comprehensive, multi-level, and complex Asia-Pacific interconnection network. It is necessary to give full play to the radiating and leading role of interconnection in the real economy, break the development bottleneck, release the development potential, and form a coordinated and coordinated development pattern. , 　　 In May this year, the “Belt and Road” International Cooperation Summit Forum was successfully held in Beijing. The core connotation of the joint construction of the “Belt and Road” initiative is to promote infrastructure construction and interconnection, strengthen economic policy coordination and development strategy docking, promote coordinated and joint development, and achieve common prosperity. This initiative originated in China and belongs to the world; it is rooted in history and more oriented to the future; it focuses on Asia, Europe and Africa, and is open to all partners. I believe that the in-depth advancement of the "Belt and Road" initiative will provide a broader and more dynamic platform for cooperation among all parties in the Asia-Pacific region! , 　　 Fourth, continue to enhance the inclusiveness of economic development and allow the people to share development achievements. At present, the process of economic globalization is facing headwinds. An important reason is the lack of tolerance for development. To enable different countries and different strata to enjoy the development dividend and make a beautiful vision a reality, we still need to make unremitting efforts. , 　　 In the past few years, we have actively explored inclusive development and have a solid consensus basis. We must combine the in-depth advancement of regional economic integration, expand the open and inclusive market, and strengthen the chain of benefit sharing. We must integrate the concept of inclusiveness and sharing into our development strategy, strive to improve the efficiency-oriented, fair-focused systems and mechanisms, and maintain social fairness and justice. We must increase investment in the areas of people's livelihood, such as education, medical care, and employment, to solve problems such as poverty and widening income gap. We must increase support for vulnerable groups, improve the development environment for small and medium-sized enterprises, and enhance the ability of workers to adapt to industrial changes, so that everyone has opportunities and enjoys results! , 　　 ladies, gentlemen, friends! , 　　The ancient Chinese said, "It must be said in words." To achieve greater development in the Asia-Pacific region, every member needs to take action in a down-to-earth manner. As the second largest economy in the world, China is well aware of its responsibilities. In the past five years, we have actively adapted, grasped, and led the new normal of the economy, deepened the supply-side structural reforms, maintained the stability of the economy, progressed steadily, and promoted China’s development towards higher quality, efficiency, and fairness. And move towards a more sustainable direction. In the past four years, the average growth rate of the Chinese economy has been 7.2%, and the average contribution rate to the world economic growth has exceeded 30%, becoming the main source of power for the world economy. , 　　Through comprehensively deepening reforms, we broke through the obstacles to institutional mechanisms that hindered development, launched 360 major reform programs, and more than 1,500 reform measures. A number of important areas and key links have achieved breakthrough progress in reform, and the main framework for reform in the main areas has been basically established. We accelerate the construction of a new open economic system, transform foreign trade and investment methods, and continue to promote the expansion of foreign trade from quantitative expansion to qualitative improvement. , 　　 We comprehensively promote theoretical innovation, practical innovation, institutional innovation, cultural innovation and other aspects of innovation, and constantly release new growth momentum. China is becoming a broad platform for various innovation factors to exert their agglomeration effect, regardless of infrastructure or economic format, regardless of business model or consumption mode, they are bursting with surging momentum of innovation. , 　　 We deeply implement the people as the centerInfrastructure or economic format, regardless of business model or consumption mode, burst out surging momentum of innovation. , 　　 We deeply implement the people-centered development thinking and strive to enhance the inclusiveness and sharing level of development. Residents' income continued to grow rapidly and outperformed the GDP of the same period for many years. The income distribution gap between urban and rural areas has continued to narrow, the middle-income group has continued to expand, and the Gini coefficient has declined. The annual increase in urban employment has remained above 13 million for four consecutive years. Significant results have been achieved in green development, the intensity of energy resource consumption has dropped significantly, and ecological environment governance has been significantly strengthened. , 　　Getting all poor people out of poverty is a commitment made by the Chinese government to the people, and it is also the thing I care about the most and spend the most energy. In the past five years, I have visited many poor areas of the country, with the aim of identifying the root causes of poverty and proposing effective measures. China has made decisive progress in the fight against poverty. In the past five years, more than 60 million poor people have stably lifted out of poverty, the incidence of poverty has continued to decline, and the per capita income of rural residents in poor areas has maintained double-digit growth. This achievement is hard-won, and we are proud of it. , 　　 ladies, gentlemen, friends! , 　　 China's development is a historical process. Last month, the 19th National Congress of the Communist Party of China was successfully held in Beijing. The conference focused on the people's longing for a better life, and formulated the action plan and development blueprint for socialism with Chinese characteristics in the new era. In 2020, China will fully build a well-off society. By 2035, China will basically realize socialist modernization. By the middle of this century, China will become a powerful modern socialist country with prosperity, democracy, civilization, harmony, and beauty. Under the leadership of the Communist Party of China, the Chinese people will start a new journey. , 　　 First, this is a new journey to comprehensively deepen reform and continuously release development vitality. The key to solving the difficulties and problems on the way forward lies in comprehensively deepening reform. We will strengthen problem orientation, resolutely eliminate all untimely ideological concepts and institutional defects, break through the barriers of solidified interests, and stimulate the creativity and development vitality of the whole society. We will build a system with complete systems, scientific norms, and effective operation, and continuously promote the modernization of the national governance system and governance capabilities. Next year, we will commemorate the 40th anniversary of reform and opening up. China's reforms will have wider fields, more initiatives and stronger efforts. , 　　 Second, this is a new journey of advancing with the times and innovating the development mode. The Chinese economy has shifted from a stage of rapid growth to a stage of high-quality development. We will implement the new development concept, adhere to quality first, benefit first, and build a modern economic system. We will focus on supply-side structural reforms, promote economic development quality reforms, efficiency reforms, and power reforms, improve total factor productivity, focus on accelerating the construction of an industrial system with real economy, technological innovation, modern finance, and human resources coordinated development, and focus on building An economic system with an effective market mechanism, a viable micro-subject, and a moderate macro-control system has continuously enhanced economic innovation and competitiveness. We will promote the in-depth integration of the Internet, big data, artificial intelligence and the real economy, and foster new growth momentum in the digital economy, sharing economy, clean energy and other fields. We will continue to explore new mechanisms and new paths for regional coordinated development, vigorously promote the coordinated development of Beijing-Tianjin-Hebei, and the development of the Yangtze River Economic Belt, build the Xiong'an New District, the Guangdong-Hong Kong-Macao Greater Bay Area, build a world-class urban agglomeration, and create a new economic growth pole. , 　　 A country with a faster pace of innovation and better quality of development, new economic formats are constantly emerging, innovation results are accelerated and applied, and the coordinated development of regional economies will produce a broader and stronger radiation effect, bring more opportunities for cooperation, let More countries take the express train developed by China.　　Third, this is a new journey towards the world and the development of a higher level of open economy. The pace of China's opening up will not stop. We will work with other countries to further advance the construction of the “Belt and Road” and add new momentum for common development. We will implement a high-level trade and investment liberalization and facilitation policy, fully implement the pre-access national treatment plus negative list management system, substantially relax market access, expand the opening up of the service industry, and protect the legitimate rights and interests of foreign investment. All companies registered in China will be treated equally and equally. We will give the free trade pilot zone greater autonomy to reform and explore the construction of a free trade port. We will accelerate the signing of free trade agreements and investment agreements with relevant countries, promote the construction of the Asia-Pacific free trade zone, and promote the conclusion of negotiations on regional comprehensive economic partnership agreements as soon as possible, and build a global free trade zone network. , 　　 In the next 15 years, the Chinese market will further expand and development will be more comprehensive. It is estimated that 24 trillion US dollars of commodities will be imported and 2 trillion US dollars of foreign direct investment will be absorbed, and the total foreign investment will reach 2 trillion US dollars. In November next year, we will hold the first edition in ShanghaiFor US dollar commodities, foreign direct investment of 2 trillion US dollars will be absorbed, and the total foreign investment will reach 2 trillion US dollars. In November next year, we will hold the first China International Import Expo in Shanghai, which will build a new platform for all parties to cooperate in opening up the Chinese market. , 　　 Fourth, this is a new journey towards a better life with the people at the center. Letting the people live a good life is the starting point and ending point of all our work. We will insist on ensuring and improving people's livelihood during development, continuously satisfying the people's growing needs for a better life, and constantly promoting social fairness and justice, so that people's sense of well-being, happiness, and security will be more complete, more secure, and more sustainable. We will continue to promote targeted poverty alleviation and targeted poverty alleviation to achieve the goal of poverty alleviation by the rural poor under the current standards in my country by 2020. Building a well-off society in an all-round way, there are more than 1.3 billion Chinese people, no one can do less! , 　　 We will accelerate the reform of the ecological civilization system, adhere to the path of green, low-carbon and sustainable development, and implement the strictest ecological environmental protection system. By 2035, China's ecological environment will fundamentally improve, and the goal of beautiful China will basically be achieved. We will actively respond to climate change and protect the common homeland on which humanity depends. China's carbon dioxide emissions will peak around 2030 and strive to reach the peak as soon as possible. Non-fossil energy will account for about 20% of primary energy consumption. As long as it is the right thing, we will continue to work tirelessly!　　 Fifth, this is a new journey to promote the construction of a new type of international relations and a community of shared future for mankind. The dreams of the Chinese people are closely linked to the dreams of people of all countries. The world today is full of challenges, and the road ahead will not be smooth, but we will not give up our ideal pursuit, and will work together with all parties to build a world of lasting peace, universal security, common prosperity, openness, inclusiveness, cleanliness and beauty. , 　　 The Chinese people stress peace and harmony. We will stick to the path of peaceful development and always be the anchor of peace and stability in the world and the Asia-Pacific region. We will uphold the concept of righteousness and benefit, actively develop global partnership, expand the convergence of interests with other countries, and promote the establishment of a new international relationship of mutual respect, fairness and justice, and win-win cooperation. We will uphold the concept of mutual consultation, joint construction and sharing, actively participate in the reform and construction of the global governance system, and promote the development of the international political and economic order in a more just and reasonable direction. , 　　 ladies, gentlemen, friends!　　Peace, stability and prosperity of the Asia-Pacific belong to all the people of Asia-Pacific, and the future of Asia-Pacific depends on the people of Asia-Pacific to create together. The partnership of mutual trust, tolerance, cooperation and win-win is the spiritual bond of the Asia-Pacific family and an important guarantee for ensuring that Asia-Pacific cooperation is on the right track. Let us push forward cooperation on a down-to-earth basis and take solid actions to jointly build a better tomorrow for the Asia-Pacific! ,   thank you all. , 　　 (Xinhua News Agency, Da Nang, Vietnam, November 10th), 　　 "People's Daily" (November 11, 2017, 02 edition),]
eng_title: Seize the opportunity of world economic transformation and seek greater development in Asia-Pacific
source-date: 来源：人民网－人民日报          发布时间：2017-11-11
text: [, 　　11月10日，国家主席习近平应邀出席在越南岘港举行的亚太经合组织工商领导人峰会并发表题为《抓住世界经济转型机遇 谋求亚太更大发展》的主旨演讲。　　新华社记者 王 晔摄, 武进禄主席先生，, 亚太工商界各位代表，, 女士们，先生们，朋友们：, 　　大家好！很高兴来到岘港，再次同亚太工商界的朋友见面。, 　　亚太是全球经济最大的板块，也是世界经济增长的一个主要引擎。工商界是促进经济增长的生力军，是新发展理念的探索者、实践者。这几年，每次出席亚太经合组织领导人非正式会议，我都抽出时间同工商界的朋友见面，共同探讨应对当前挑战的思路和举措。, 　　国际金融危机发生10年来，国际社会一起努力，推动世界经济逐步回到复苏的轨道。今天，我们迎来了世界经济逐步向好的局面。尽管仍然面临风险和不确定性，但全球贸易和投资回暖，金融市场预期向好，各方信心显著增强。, 　　发展之路没有终点，只有新的起点。“往者不可谏，来者犹可追。”世界正处在快速变化的历史进程之中，世界经济正在发生更深层次的变化。我们要洞察世界经济发展趋势，找准方位，把握规律，果敢应对。, 　　——我们正面临增长动能的深刻转变。当前，改革创新成为各国化解挑战、谋求发展的方向。结构性改革的正面效应和潜能持续释放，对各国经济增长的促进作用进一步显现。新一轮科技和产业革命形成势头，数字经济、共享经济加速发展，新产业、新模式、新业态层出不穷，新的增长动能不断积聚。, 　　——我们正面临全球发展方式的深刻转变。随着时代进步，发展的内涵正在发生深刻变化。创新、协调、绿色、开放、共享的发展理念日益深入人心，实现更加全面、更有质量、更可持续的发展，是国际社会共同追求的目标。落实2030年可持续发展议程，应对气候变化等全球性挑战，成为国际社会重要共识。, 　　——我们正面临经济全球化进程的深刻转变。过去数十年，经济全球化对世界经济发展作出了重要贡献，已成为不可逆转的时代潮流。同时，面对形势的发展变化，经济全球化在形式和内容上面临新的调整，理念上应该更加注重开放包容，方向上应该更加注重普惠平衡，效应上应该更加注重公正共赢。, 　　——我们正面临全球经济治理体系的深刻转变。世界经济格局的演变对全球经济治理体系提出了更高要求。坚持多边主义，谋求共商共建共享，建立紧密伙伴关系，构建人类命运共同体，是新形势下全球经济治理的必然趋势。, 　　女士们、先生们、朋友们！, 　　面对世界经济的深刻转变，亚太在改革创新大潮中是勇立潮头，还是迟疑徘徊？是主动引导经济全球化继续前行，还是在挑战面前犹豫不定？是携手开辟区域合作新局面，还是各自渐行渐远？, 　　答案是清楚的，我们必须顺应大势，勇于担当，共同开辟亚太发展繁荣的光明未来。, 　　第一，继续坚持建设开放型经济，努力实现互利共赢。开放带来进步，封闭必然落后。亚太经济体通过自身发展实践，对这一点有着深刻体会。我们要努力打造平等协商、广泛参与、普遍受益的区域合作框架，合力构建开放型亚太经济，促进贸易和投资自由化便利化。我们要引导经济全球化朝着更加开放、包容、普惠、平衡、共赢的方向发展，造福不同国家、不同阶层、不同人群。我们要主动适应全球产业分工调整变化，积极引领全球价值链重塑，确立新定位，构筑新优势。我们要支持多边贸易体制，坚持开放的区域主义，帮助发展中成员更多从国际贸易和投资中受益。, 　　建成亚太自由贸易区是亚太工商界多年的梦想。2006年，正是在工商界呼吁下，亚太经合组织成员领导人在河内首次把建设亚太自由贸易区确立为远景目标。2014年，我们在北京启动亚太自由贸易区进程。我们应该行动起来，全面深入落实北京路线图，向着建成亚太自由贸易区的目标不断迈进，为开放型亚太经济提供机制保障。, 　　第二，继续谋求创新增长，挖掘发展新动能。当前，世界经济回稳，周期性因素发挥了很大的作用，内生动能不足的顽疾并未消除。世界经济彻底摆脱“新平庸”的风险，只能向创新要动力。, 　　我们正迎来新一轮科技和产业革命，数字经济、共享经济在全球范围内掀起浪潮，人工智能、量子科学等新技术不断取得突破，亚太不能等待和观望。我们应该抢抓机遇，加大创新投入，转变发展方式，培育新的经济增长点。要积极推进结构性改革，消除一切不利于创新的体制机制障碍，激发市场活力。要落实好北京会议《经济创新发展、改革与增长共识》，深化互联网和数字经济合作，引领全球创新发展的方向。, 　　第三，继续加强互联互通，实现联动发展。联动发展是对互利共赢理念的最好诠释。亚太经济体利益交融，联系紧密。坚持联动发展，既能为伙伴提供发展动力，也能为自身创造更大发展空间。2014年，我们制定完成了亚太经合组织互联互通蓝图。我们要以蓝图为指引，建立全方位、多层次、复合型的亚太互联互通网络。要充分发挥互联互通对实体经济的辐射和带动作用，打破发展瓶颈，释放发展潜力，形成协调联动发展的格局。, 　　今年5月，“一带一路”国际合作高峰论坛在北京成功举办。共建“一带一路”倡议的核心内涵，就是促进基础设施建设和互联互通，加强经济政策协调和发展战略对接，促进协同联动发展，实现共同繁荣。这一倡议源自中国，更属于世界；根植于历史，更面向未来；重点面向亚欧非大陆，更向所有伙伴开放。我相信，共建“一带一路”倡议的深入推进，将为亚太各方提供更加广阔、更有活力的合作平台！, 　　第四，继续增强经济发展包容性，让民众共享发展成果。当前，经济全球化进程遭遇逆风，一个重要原因是发展的包容性不足。让不同国家、不同阶层都能享受发展红利，让美好的愿景变为现实，仍需要作出不懈努力。, 　　过去几年，我们围绕包容发展进行了积极探索，有了坚实的共识基础。我们要结合区域经济一体化的深入推进，做大开放普惠的市场，做强利益共享的链条。我们要把包容共享理念融入发展战略，努力健全讲求效率、注重公平的体制机制，维护社会公平正义。我们要在教育、医疗、就业等民生领域加大投入，解决好贫困、收入差距拉大等问题。我们要加大对弱势群体的扶持力度，改善中小微企业发展环境，增强劳动者适应产业变革的能力，让人人拥有机遇，享有成果！, 　　女士们、先生们、朋友们！, 　　中国古人说：“口言之，身必行之。”实现亚太更大发展，需要每个成员脚踏实地拿出行动。作为全球第二大经济体，中国深知自身肩负的责任。过去5年，我们主动适应、把握、引领经济新常态，深入推进供给侧结构性改革，保持经济稳中向好、稳中有进，推动中国发展不断向着更高质量、更有效率、更加公平、更可持续的方向迈进。过去4年，中国经济平均增长率为7.2%，对世界经济增长的平均贡献率超过30%，成为世界经济的主要动力源。, 　　我们通过全面深化改革破除妨碍发展的体制机制障碍，推出360个重大改革方案、1500多项改革举措，一批重要领域和关键环节改革取得突破性进展，主要领域改革主体框架基本确立。我们加快构建开放型经济新体制，转变对外贸易和投资方式，继续推动对外贸易由量的扩张转向质的提升。, 　　我们全方位推进理论创新、实践创新、制度创新、文化创新以及其他各方面创新，不断释放增长新动能。中国正成为各种创新要素发挥集聚效应的广阔平台，不论基础设施还是经济业态，不论商业模式还是消费方式，都迸发出创新的澎湃动能。, 　　我们深入贯彻以人民为中心的发展思想，努力提升发展的包容性和共享水平。居民收入持续较快增长，连续多年跑赢同期国内生产总值。城乡区域收入分配差距持续缩小，中等收入群体持续扩大，基尼系数下降，每年新增城镇就业已连续4年保持1300万人以上。绿色发展取得显著成效，能源资源消耗强度大幅下降，生态环境治理明显加强。, 　　让所有贫困人口脱贫，是中国政府对人民作出的承诺，也是我牵挂最多、花精力最多的一件事情。过去5年，我走访了全国很多贫困地区，目的是找准致贫的根源，提出管用的举措。中国脱贫攻坚战取得决定性进展。5年来，又有6000多万贫困人口稳定脱贫，贫困发生率持续下降，贫困地区农村居民人均收入保持两位数增长。这一成果来之不易，我们为之感到自豪。, 　　女士们、先生们、朋友们！, 　　中国的发展是一个历史进程。上个月，中国共产党第十九次全国代表大会在北京胜利召开。大会聚焦人民对美好生活的向往，制定了新时代中国特色社会主义的行动纲领和发展蓝图。2020年，中国将全面建成小康社会。到2035年，中国将基本实现社会主义现代化。到本世纪中叶，中国将建成富强民主文明和谐美丽的社会主义现代化强国。在中国共产党领导下，中国人民将开启新征程。, 　　第一，这是全面深化改革、持续释放发展活力的新征程。解决前进道路上的困难和问题，关键在于全面深化改革。我们将强化问题导向，坚决破除一切不合时宜的思想观念和体制机制弊端，突破利益固化的藩篱，激发全社会创造力和发展活力。我们将构建系统完备、科学规范、运行有效的制度体系，不断推进国家治理体系和治理能力现代化。明年，我们将隆重纪念改革开放40周年。中国改革的领域将更广、举措将更多、力度将更强。, 　　第二，这是与时俱进、创新发展方式的新征程。中国经济已经由高速增长阶段转向高质量发展阶段。我们将贯彻新发展理念，坚持质量第一、效益优先，建设现代化经济体系。我们将以供给侧结构性改革为主线，推动经济发展质量变革、效率变革、动力变革，提高全要素生产率，着力加快建设实体经济、科技创新、现代金融、人力资源协同发展的产业体系，着力构建市场机制有效、微观主体有活力、宏观调控有度的经济体制，不断增强经济创新力和竞争力。我们将推动互联网、大数据、人工智能和实体经济深入融合，在数字经济、共享经济、清洁能源等领域培育新的增长动能。我们将不断探索区域协调发展新机制新路径，大力推动京津冀协同发展、长江经济带发展，建设雄安新区、粤港澳大湾区，建设世界级城市群，打造新的经济增长极。, 　　一个创新步伐加快、发展质量更优的中国，经济新业态不断涌现，创新成果加快转化应用，区域经济实现协同发展，将产生更广泛、更强大的辐射效应，带来更多合作机会，让更多国家搭乘中国发展的快车。, 　　第三，这是进一步走向世界、发展更高层次开放型经济的新征程。中国对外开放的脚步不会停滞。我们将同各国一道，深入推进“一带一路”建设，增添共同发展新动力。我们将实行高水平的贸易和投资自由化便利化政策，全面实行准入前国民待遇加负面清单管理制度，大幅度放宽市场准入，扩大服务业对外开放，保护外商投资合法权益。凡是在中国境内注册的企业，我们都会一视同仁、平等对待。我们将赋予自由贸易试验区更大改革自主权，探索建设自由贸易港。我们将加快同有关国家商签自由贸易协定和投资协定，推动建设亚太自由贸易区，推动区域全面经济伙伴关系协定谈判尽早结束，构建面向全球的自由贸易区网络。, 　　未来15年，中国市场将进一步扩大，发展将更加全面。预计将进口24万亿美元商品，吸收2万亿美元境外直接投资，对外投资总额将达到2万亿美元。明年11月，我们将在上海举办首届中国国际进口博览会，这将为各方进行开辟中国市场的合作搭建新平台。, 　　第四，这是以人民为中心、迈向美好生活的新征程。让人民过上好日子，是我们一切工作的出发点和落脚点。我们将坚持在发展中保障和改善民生，不断满足人民日益增长的美好生活需要，不断促进社会公平正义，使人民获得感、幸福感、安全感更加完善、更有保障、更可持续。我们将持续推进精准扶贫、精准脱贫，实现到2020年我国现行标准下农村贫困人口脱贫的目标。全面建成小康社会，13亿多中国人，一个都不能少！, 　　我们将加快生态文明体制改革，坚持走绿色、低碳、可持续发展之路，实行最严格的生态环境保护制度。到2035年，中国的生态环境将根本好转，美丽中国目标将基本实现。我们将积极应对气候变化，保护好人类赖以生存的共同家园。中国二氧化碳排放将于2030年左右达到峰值并争取尽早达峰，非化石能源占一次能源消费比重将达到20%左右。只要是认准了的事情，我们都会坚持不懈做下去！, 　　第五，这是推动构建新型国际关系、推动构建人类命运共同体的新征程。中国人民的梦想同各国人民的梦想息息相通。当今世界充满挑战，前面的道路不会平坦，但我们不会放弃理想追求，将以更大的作为，同各方携手建设持久和平、普遍安全、共同繁荣、开放包容、清洁美丽的世界。, 　　中国人民讲求以和为贵、协和万邦。我们将坚持走和平发展道路，始终做世界和亚太地区的和平稳定之锚。我们将秉持正确义利观，积极发展全球伙伴关系，扩大同各国的利益汇合点，推动建设相互尊重、公平正义、合作共赢的新型国际关系。我们将秉持共商共建共享理念，积极参与全球治理体系改革和建设，推动国际政治经济秩序朝着更加公正合理的方向发展。, 　　女士们、先生们、朋友们！, 　　亚太的和平、稳定、繁荣属于全体亚太人民，亚太的未来要靠亚太人民携手创造。互信、包容、合作、共赢的伙伴关系，是亚太大家庭的精神纽带，是确保亚太合作处在正确轨道上的重要保障。让我们脚踏实地推进合作，扎扎实实采取行动，共同建设亚太更加美好的明天！, 　　谢谢大家。, 　　（新华社越南岘港11月10日电） , 　　《 人民日报 》（ 2017年11月11日 02 版）, ]
title: 抓住世界经济转型机遇 谋求亚太更大发展

eng: [, Dear President Temer, President Zuma, Dear representatives of industry and commerce,, Ladies and gentlemen, friends: Good afternoon! 　　I am very happy to be here with you in Xiamen, a scenic "Lulu Island". Tomorrow, the meeting of BRICS leaders will begin. On behalf of the Chinese government and the Chinese people, on behalf of the citizens of Xiamen, and in my own name, I would like to extend a warm welcome to all the guests who attended the meeting! , 　　 Since ancient times, Xiamen has been a port of trade and affluence, and it is also a gateway to open cooperation. I came to Fujian to work in 1985, Xiamen was the first stop. At the time, Xiamen was at the forefront of China's reform and opening up. It was a special economic zone that was first tried, and it was also a hot spot for development. After more than 30 years of spring and rain, Xiamen today has developed into a city of high-quality innovation and entrepreneurship. The new economy and new industries are developing rapidly. Today's Xiamen is also a high-value ecological garden city, where people and nature live in harmony. , 　　The people of southern Fujian often say, "Love will win". This contains a spirit of determination and forging ahead. The successful practice of this city of Xiamen reflects the history of more than 1.3 billion Chinese people striving for self-improvement. In the past 40 years of reform and opening up, under the leadership of the Communist Party of China, the Chinese people have successfully embarked on a path of socialism with Chinese characteristics, with their enthusiasm for opening roads in the mountains and bridging water and bridging water. We have encountered difficulties, we have encountered challenges, but we have worked tirelessly, advancing with the times, and used hard work, bravery, and wisdom to write the story of the development and progress of contemporary China. , 　　 ladies, gentlemen, friends! , 　　 BRICS cooperation is at the key node of succession and succession. Observing the BRICS cooperation and development, two dimensions are very important. One is to put BRIC cooperation in the historical process of world development and the evolution of the international landscape. The second is to put BRIC cooperation in the historical process of the five countries' respective and common development. , 　　 Now, we are in an era of great development, big change and big adjustment. Although conflicts and poverty have not been eradicated globally, the era of peace and development has become stronger. World multi-polarization, economic globalization, cultural diversity, and social informatization have developed in depth. The jungle rule of weak meat and strong food, the zero-sum game of winning and losing is no longer in line with the logic of the times. Peace, development, cooperation, and win-win situation have become common for all peoples. voice. Under such a large background, a large number of emerging market countries and developing countries have sprung up, playing an increasingly important role in international affairs. BRICS cooperation also came into being, and our five countries came together with the common desire to pursue peace and development. In the past 10 years, BRICS countries have joined hands to grow into a new bright spot in the world economy. , 　　——In the past 10 years, the BRICS countries have explored progress and sought common development. The sudden international financial crisis that broke out in 2008 directly caused the world economy to brake, which has not been able to get back on track. In the face of sudden changes in the external environment, our five nations have set foot in the country and concentrated on developing the economy and improving people's livelihood. In the past 10 years, the total economic growth of the five countries has increased by 179%, the total trade volume has increased by 94%, and the urbanization population has increased by 28%. It has made outstanding contributions to the stabilization and recovery of the world economy, and has given more than 3 billion people a real sense of gain. , 　　 ——In the past 10 years, the BRICS countries have been pragmatic and promote mutually beneficial cooperation. Our five countries have leveraged their complementary advantages, tightened their interest ties, established a comprehensive and multi-level cooperation framework led by leaders, and a number of cooperation projects have emerged that are in line with the development strategies of the five countries and in the interests of the people of the five countries. In particular, the establishment of the New Development Bank and emergency reserve arrangements have provided financing support for infrastructure construction and sustainable development in the BRICS countries, and have made useful explorations for improving global economic governance and building an international financial safety net. , 　　——In the past 10 years, the BRICS countries have dared to act and strive to make a difference on the international stage. Our five countries uphold multilateralism, advocate fairness and justice, and speak out and propose proposals on major international and regional issues. Our five countries have actively promoted global economic governance reforms to enhance the representation and voice of emerging market countries and developing countries. Our five countries hold high the banner of development, take the lead in implementing the Millennium Development Goals and Sustainable Development Goals, strengthen dialogue and cooperation with the vast number of developing countries, and seek joint self-improvement. , 　　The high-rise building rises to the ground. Nowadays, the foundation of BRICS cooperation has been laid, and the outline of the overall architecture is emerging. Looking back on the future, I think three revelations are very important and should be carried forward in future cooperation. , 　　 First, treat each other as equals, seek common ground while reserving differences. The BRICS countries don't make a speech, and everyone discusses everything. Five of usCarry forward in future cooperation. , 　　 First, treat each other as equals, seek common ground while reserving differences. The BRICS countries don't make a speech, and everyone discusses everything. Our five countries respect each other's development path and model, care for each other's concerns, and are committed to enhancing strategic communication and political mutual trust. Our five countries have differences in national conditions, history, culture and other aspects. It is inevitable that we will encounter some differences in cooperation. However, as long as we are firm in our belief in cooperation and persist in increasing trust and dispelling doubts, we will become more stable on the road of cooperation. , 　　 Second is pragmatic innovation, win-win cooperation. The BRICS countries are not a busy talk hall, but an action team that unites knowledge and action. Our five countries are pursuing pragmatic cooperation in various fields with the goal of large trade and investment markets, large circulation of money and finance, large-scale infrastructure connectivity, and exchanges between people and culture. At present, they have covered dozens of fields such as economy and trade, finance, science, education, culture and health. The new-type international relations of win-win cooperation make a vivid interpretation. , 　　 The third is to be a world-minded person. The BRICS countries have come step by step on the road of development, and we feel the same with those people who are in war and poverty. From the beginning, our five nations have adopted the principle of "dialogue without confrontation, partnership without alliance" as a guideline, advocating to follow the purposes and principles of the Charter of the United Nations and the basic principles of international law and international relations in dealing with relations between countries. Other countries share development opportunities. Nowadays, the BRICS cooperation concept is more and more understood and recognized, and has become a positive energy in the international community. , 　　 These are the concrete manifestations of the BRICS spirit, and the common value pursuit of our five countries after 10 years of cooperation and cohesion. This spirit is constantly sublimating in practice, bringing well-being to the people of the five countries, and making the world different because of BRICS cooperation. , 　　 ladies, gentlemen, friends! , 　　Looking back in the past is to find out the way forward. Looking at the world, we see that the world economy has resumed growth, and emerging market countries and developing countries have performed well. A new round of scientific and technological revolution and industrial transformation are poised to take off, and the trend of reform and innovation is surging forward. We have every reason to believe that this world will be better. At the same time, we also see that more than 700 million people worldwide are still starving, tens of millions of refugees are displaced, and countless people, including innocent children, have been killed. The world economy has not yet stepped out of the adjustment period for sub-health and weak growth, and new kinetic energy is still gestating. Economic globalization has encountered more uncertainty, and the external environment for the development of emerging market countries and developing countries has become more complicated. The road to world peace and development is still very long, and it will not be smooth. , 　　 Now, when someone sees the ups and downs of growth in emerging market countries such as the BRICS countries and developing countries, they assert that "the BRICS are dying and fading." Needless to say, affected by the complex internal and external environment, the development of BRICS countries will inevitably encounter headwinds of varying degrees. However, the potential and trends of the BRICS countries for continuous development have not changed. We are full of confidence in this. , 　　 Thousand years of tide has not fallen, the wind rises before sailing. Facing the future, the BRICS countries are faced with the important task of developing the economy and strengthening cooperation. We need to sum up successful experiences, sketch a vision for cooperation, embark on a new journey, and jointly create the second "Golden Decade" of BRICS cooperation. , 　　 First, deepen BRICS cooperation to boost the economic growth of the five countries. In recent years, the BRICS countries have led the world economic growth with the advantages of commodity supply, human resource costs, and international market demand. With the continuous development of the economies of the five countries, issues such as resource allocation and industrial structure have become increasingly prominent. At the same time, the world economic structure has undergone profound adjustments, international market demand has shrunk, and financial risks have accumulated. The traditional economic advantages of the BRICS countries are changing, entering the critical stage of rolling stones uphill and climbing hills. , 　　How to cross this stage? The answer is not one-sided pursuit of growth rate, but to stand on one's own, look at the long-term, promote structural reforms, and explore new growth drivers and development paths. We must seize the opportunities of the new industrial revolution, promote growth and transformation with innovation, actively participate in the wave of innovation and development brought about by intelligent manufacturing, the Internet+, the digital economy, and the sharing economy, and strive to lead the trend and accelerate the conversion of old and new kinetic energy. It is necessary to break the barriers restricting economic development through reforms, remove unreasonable institutional barriers, stimulate market and social vitality, and achieve higher quality, more resilient and more sustainable growth. , 　　 Although the BRICS countries have different national conditions, they are at a similar stage of development and have the same development goals. We should jointly explore ways of economic innovation and growth, strengthen macro-policy coordination and development strategy docking, give play to the complementary advantages of industrial structure and resource endowments, cultivate value chains and large markets for shared benefits, and form a coordinated development pattern. We must use the practical experience of reform and innovation to break new paths for other emerging market countries and developing countries to seize opportunities and respond to challenges. , 　　 economic cooperation is the foundation of the BRICS mechanism. We should focus on this main line and implement the "BRICS"Encounter and cope with challenges to break a new path. , 　　 economic cooperation is the foundation of the BRICS mechanism. We should focus on this main line, implement the "BRICS Economic Partnership Strategy", promote the institutionalization and solidification of cooperation in various fields, and continuously increase the gold content of BRICS cooperation. This year, we have achieved a series of results in the fields of new development banks and emergency reserve arrangements, e-commerce, trade and investment facilitation, service trade, local currency bonds, technological innovation, industrial cooperation, government and social capital cooperation, and expanded our economy. The breadth and depth of cooperation. We must continue to work hard to implement past achievements and consensus, let the existing mechanisms work, and actively explore new ways and new connotations of pragmatic cooperation, tighten links, and make the BRICS cooperation stable and far-reaching. , 　　 Second, bravely assume the BRICS responsibilities and safeguard the world and peace. Peace and development are the foundation and premise of each other. It is the common wish of the peoples of the world to want peace without conflict and cooperation without confrontation. Thanks to the concerted efforts of all countries, overall world peace has been maintained for more than half a century. However, the world is still not peaceful, and regional conflicts and hotspot issues are unprecedented and rising again. Terrorism, cyber security and other threats are intertwined, casting a shadow on the world. , 　　 The BRICS countries are defenders of world peace and builders of the international security order. This year, we held a meeting of high-level representatives of security affairs and a formal meeting of foreign ministers, established a regular consultation mechanism for representatives of multilateral agencies, and convened foreign policy consultations, counter-terrorism working groups, cybersecurity working groups, and peacekeeping consultations. Communicate and coordinate on major regional issues and bring together the BRICS. We must safeguard the purposes and principles of the UN Charter and the basic norms of international relations, firmly safeguard multilateralism, promote the democratization of international relations, and oppose hegemonism and power politics. It is necessary to advocate a common, comprehensive, cooperative and sustainable security concept, constructively participate in the geopolitical hotspot problem resolution process, and play its due role. , 　　 I believe that as long as we adhere to comprehensive measures, treat both the symptoms and the root cause, and resolutely combat all forms of terrorism, terrorists will have nowhere to hide. As long as dialogue, consultation and negotiation are adhered to and conditions are created for the political settlement of the Syria, Libya, Palestine and Israel issues, the war will eventually subside and the displaced refugees will be able to return to their homes. , 　　 Third, play the role of BRICS and improve global economic governance. Only openness can make progress, and only tolerance can make progress last. As the world economy is in a weak period in recent years, problems such as development imbalances, governance dilemmas, and fair deficits have become more prominent, and protectionism and internal trends have increased. The world economy and the global economic governance system have entered a period of adjustment and are facing new challenges. , 　　 We cannot ignore the problems that arise in the process of economic globalization, nor can we blame others, but we must work together to come up with solutions. We must work with the international community to strengthen dialogue, coordination and cooperation, and make positive contributions to maintaining and promoting the stability and growth of the world economy. To this end, we should promote the construction of an open world economy, promote trade and investment liberalization and facilitation, work together to create a new global value chain, and realize the rebalancing of economic globalization so that it benefits the peoples of all countries. Our five countries should increase the level of opening up to each other, expand their common interests in opening up, seek opportunities to share in tolerance, and open up a wider space for the economic development of the five countries. , 　　 The development of emerging market countries and developing countries is not about whose cheese they want to move, but to strive to make the world economic cake bigger. We must work together to guide the direction of economic globalization, provide more advanced concepts and public products, promote the establishment of a more balanced and inclusive governance model and rules, and promote the optimization and reshaping of the international division of labor system and the global value chain. It is necessary to promote the reform of the global economic governance system, reflect the reality of the world economic structure, and improve the governance rules of the deep sea, polar regions, outer space, networks and other Xinjiang domains to ensure the sharing of rights and responsibilities of all countries. , 　　 Fourth, expand the BRICS influence and build a broad partnership. As a cooperation platform with global influence, the significance of BRICS cooperation has exceeded the scope of the five countries, carrying the expectations of emerging market countries, developing countries and the entire international community. The BRICS countries adhere to the concept of open and inclusive cooperation, attach great importance to cooperation with other emerging market countries and developing countries, and establish effective dialogue mechanisms. , 　　 One arrow is easy to break, ten arrows are hard to break. We should give full play to our own advantages and influence, promote South-South cooperation and North-South dialogue, gather the collective strength of all countries, and work together to meet risk challenges. We should expand the scope and benefits of BRICS cooperation, promote the "BRICS+" cooperation model, create an open and diversified network of development partners, and allow more emerging market countries and developing countries to participate in the cause of unity and cooperation for mutual benefit and win-win results. Come. , 　　 During the Xiamen meeting, China will hold a dialogue between emerging market countries and developing countries, inviting five leaders from countries in different regions of the world, 　　 During the Xiamen meeting, China will hold a dialogue meeting between emerging market countries and developing countries, inviting five leaders from countries in different regions of the world to discuss international development cooperation and South-South cooperation plans to promote the implementation of the 2030 sustainable development agenda. , 　　Whether it is to deepen BRICS' own cooperation or to build a broad partnership, mutual understanding, understanding, and friendship between the people are indispensable cornerstones. We should play the role of cultural exchange links, bring people from all walks of life into the BRICS cooperation cause, create more activities like cultural festivals, film festivals, sports meets that benefit the people's livelihood, and let the BRICS stories spread all over the streets. This will allow the exchanges and friendships of the people of the five countries to converge into a torrential river, injecting endless impetus into BRICS cooperation. , 　　 ladies, gentlemen, friends! 10 years of continuous deepening of the BRICS cooperation mechanism is also the 10 years of China's comprehensive promotion of reform and opening up and rapid economic and social development. In the past 10 years, China’s total economic growth has grown by 239%, and the total volume of imports and exports has increased by 73%. It has become the world’s second largest economy. The living standards of more than 1.3 billion Chinese people have achieved a major leap. It is also getting bigger.　　 It is undeniable that as China's reform enters a period of tough times and deep-water areas, some deep-seated contradictions and problems are highlighted, which requires great determination and great efforts to resolve them. There is a saying in China that good medicine is bitter. We have adopted a recipe for comprehensively deepening reform. Over the past five years, we have adopted more than 1,500 reform measures to promote the reform to show full force, multi-point breakthroughs, and in-depth advancement. The pace of economic restructuring and industrial upgrading has continued to accelerate, and the economic stability has continued to consolidate and the economy has continued to strengthen. New kinetic energy for development is constantly accumulating. In the first half of this year, China's economy grew by 6.9%, the added value of the tertiary industry accounted for 54.1% of GDP, and there were 7.35 million new urban jobs. Facts have proved that the way to comprehensively deepen reform is on the right track, and we must continue on a big step. , 　　 Facing the future, China will deeply implement the development concept of innovation, coordination, green, openness and sharing, constantly adapt, grasp and lead the new normal of economic development, promote the supply-side structural reform, accelerate the construction of a new open economic system, and lead by innovation Economic development to achieve sustainable development. China will unswervingly follow the path of peaceful development and make new and greater contributions to world peace and development. , 　　 In May this year, China successfully hosted the “Belt and Road” International Cooperation Summit Forum. The heads of state and government of 29 countries, more than 1,600 representatives from more than 140 countries and more than 80 international organizations attended, marking the joint construction of the “Belt and Road” The initiative has entered a new stage from concept to action, from planning to implementation. At the meeting, representatives from various countries discussed plans for cooperation, sought common development strategies, and reached broad consensus. It should be pointed out that the joint construction of the “Belt and Road” initiative is not a geopolitical tool, but a pragmatic platform for cooperation; it is not a foreign aid plan, but a joint development initiative of consultation, construction, and sharing. I believe that the joint construction of the “Belt and Road” initiative will build a new platform for countries to achieve win-win cooperation and create new opportunities for the implementation of the 2030 sustainable development agenda. , 　　 The business community is the main force in the economic development of the BRICS countries. Over the past 10 years, people in the business community have integrated enterprise development into BRICS cooperation and made important contributions to building a BRICS economic partnership. The purpose of arranging the Business Forum on the eve of the leaders' meeting is to listen to the opinions and suggestions of the business community, jointly manage the Xiamen meeting and build the BRICS cooperation. I hope you can make use of the advantages of industry and commerce in information, technology, capital, etc., carry out more mutually beneficial and win-win, pragmatic cooperation projects that benefit the country and the people, and make greater contributions to the promotion of economic and social development and the well-being of the people. The Chinese government will continue to encourage Chinese companies to take root in other countries, and warmly welcomes companies from other countries to invest in China. , 　　 ladies, gentlemen, friends! , 　　 The BRICS countries will usher in a more dynamic second decade, let us work together with the international community to make the fruits of our cooperation benefit the people of the five countries, and the welfare of world peace and development to the people of all countries. , 　　 Finally, I wish this business forum a complete success! ,   thank you all. , 　　 (Xinhua News Agency, Xiamen, September 3rd), 　　 "People's Daily" (September 04, 2017, 02 edition),]
eng_title: Xi Jinping: jointly creating the second "Golden Decade" of BRICS cooperation
source-date: 来源：人民网－人民日报          发布时间：2017-09-04
text: [, 尊敬的特梅尔总统、尊敬的祖马总统，, 各位工商界代表，, 女士们，先生们，朋友们：, 　　下午好！很高兴同大家相聚在风景怡人的“鹭岛”厦门。明天，金砖国家领导人会晤就要拉开帷幕。我谨代表中国政府和中国人民、代表厦门市民，并以我个人的名义，向参加会议的各位嘉宾表示热烈的欢迎！, 　　厦门自古就是通商裕国的口岸，也是开放合作的门户，正所谓“厦庇五洲客，门纳万顷涛”。1985年我来到福建工作，厦门是第一站。当时的厦门身处中国改革开放前沿，是先行先试的经济特区，也是一片发展的热土。30多载春风化雨，今天的厦门已经发展成一座高素质的创新创业之城，新经济新产业快速发展，贸易投资并驾齐驱，海运、陆运、空运通达五洲。今天的厦门也是一座高颜值的生态花园之城，人与自然和谐共生。, 　　闽南民众常说，“爱拼才会赢”。这其中蕴含着一种锐意进取的精神。厦门这座城市的成功实践，折射着13亿多中国人民自强不息的奋斗史。改革开放近40年来，在中国共产党领导下，中国人民凭着一股逢山开路、遇水架桥的闯劲，凭着一股滴水穿石的韧劲，成功走出一条中国特色社会主义道路。我们遇到过困难，我们遇到过挑战，但我们不懈奋斗、与时俱进，用勤劳、勇敢、智慧书写着当代中国发展进步的故事。, 　　女士们、先生们、朋友们！, 　　金砖合作正处在承前启后的关键节点上。观察金砖合作发展，有两个维度十分重要。一是要把金砖合作放在世界发展和国际格局演变的历史进程中来看。二是要把金砖合作放在五国各自和共同发展的历史进程中来看。, 　　现在，我们正处在一个大发展大变革大调整的时代。虽然全球范围内冲突和贫困尚未根除，但和平与发展的时代潮流愈发强劲。世界多极化、经济全球化、文化多样化、社会信息化深入发展，弱肉强食的丛林法则、你输我赢的零和游戏不再符合时代逻辑，和平、发展、合作、共赢成为各国人民共同呼声。, 　　在这样的大背景下，一大批新兴市场国家和发展中国家异军突起，在国际事务中发挥着日益重要的作用。金砖合作也应运而生，我们五国怀着追求和平与发展的共同愿望走到一起。在过去10年中，金砖国家携手同行，成长为世界经济的新亮点。, 　　——10年中，金砖国家探索进取，谋求共同发展。2008年爆发的国际金融危机突如其来，直接导致世界经济急刹车，至今未能重回正轨。面对外部环境突然变化，我们五国立足国内，集中精力发展经济、改善民生。10年间，五国经济总量增长179%，贸易总额增长94%，城镇化人口增长28%，为世界经济企稳复苏作出突出贡献，也让30多亿人民有了实实在在的获得感。, 　　——10年中，金砖国家务实为先，推进互利合作。我们五国发挥互补优势，拉紧利益纽带，建立起领导人引领的全方位、多层次合作架构，涌现出一批契合五国发展战略、符合五国人民利益的合作项目。特别是新开发银行和应急储备安排的建立，为金砖国家基础设施建设和可持续发展提供了融资支持，为完善全球经济治理、构建国际金融安全网作出了有益探索。, 　　——10年中，金砖国家敢于担当，力求在国际舞台上有所作为。我们五国秉持多边主义，倡导公平正义，就国际和地区重大问题发出声音、提出方案。我们五国积极推动全球经济治理改革，提升新兴市场国家和发展中国家代表性和发言权。我们五国高举发展旗帜，带头落实千年发展目标和可持续发展目标，加强同广大发展中国家对话合作，谋求联合自强。, 　　万丈高楼平地起。如今，金砖合作基础已经打下，整体架构轮廓初现。回望来时路，我认为有3条启示十分重要，应该在今后的合作中发扬光大。, 　　一是平等相待、求同存异。金砖国家不搞一言堂，凡事大家商量着来。我们五国尊重彼此发展道路和模式，相互照顾关切，致力于增进战略沟通和政治互信。我们五国在国情、历史、文化等方面存在差异，合作中难免遇到一些分歧，但只要坚定合作信念、坚持增信释疑，就能在合作道路上越走越稳。, 　　二是务实创新、合作共赢。金砖国家不是碌碌无为的清谈馆，而是知行合一的行动队。我们五国以贸易投资大市场、货币金融大流通、基础设施大联通、人文大交流为目标，推进各领域务实合作，目前已经涵盖经贸、财金、科教、文卫等数十个领域，对合作共赢的新型国际关系作出生动诠释。, 　　三是胸怀天下、立己达人。金砖国家都是在发展道路上一步一步走过来的，对那些身处战乱和贫困的百姓，我们感同身受。我们五国从发起之初便以“对话而不对抗，结伴而不结盟”为准则，倡导遵循联合国宪章宗旨和原则以及国际法和国际关系基本准则处理国家间关系，愿在实现自身发展的同时同其他国家共享发展机遇。如今，金砖合作理念得到越来越多理解和认同，成为国际社会的一股正能量。, 　　这些都是金砖精神的具体体现，是我们五国历经10年合作凝聚的共同价值追求。这种精神在实践中不断升华，为五国人民带来福祉，也让世界因金砖合作而有所不同。, 　　女士们、先生们、朋友们！, 　　回首过去，是为了找准前进方向。放眼世界，我们看到世界经济重新恢复增长，新兴市场国家和发展中国家表现突出。新一轮科技革命和产业变革蓄势待发，改革创新潮流奔腾向前。我们有足够的理由相信，这个世界会更好。, 　　同时，我们也看到，全球7亿多人口还在忍饥挨饿，数以千万的难民颠沛流离，无数民众包括无辜的孩子丧身炮火。世界经济尚未走出亚健康和弱增长的调整期，新动能仍在孕育。经济全球化遭遇更多不确定性，新兴市场国家和发展中国家发展的外部环境更趋复杂。世界和平与发展之路还很长，前行不会一路坦途。, 　　现在，有人看到金砖国家等新兴市场国家和发展中国家的增长出现起伏，就断言“金砖失色、褪色”。毋庸讳言，受内外复杂环境影响，金砖国家发展难免遭遇不同程度的逆风。但是，金砖国家不断向前发展的潜力和趋势没有改变。我们对此充满信心。, 　　千年潮未落，风起再扬帆。面向未来，金砖国家面临着发展经济、加强合作的重要任务。我们要总结成功经验，勾画合作愿景，踏上新的征程，共同开创金砖合作第二个“金色十年”。, 　　第一，深化金砖合作，助推五国经济增加动力。近年来，金砖国家凭借大宗商品供给、人力资源成本、国际市场需求等优势，引领世界经济增长。随着五国经济不断发展，资源要素配置、产业结构等问题日渐突出。同时，世界经济结构经历深刻调整，国际市场需求萎缩，金融风险积聚。金砖国家经济传统优势在发生变化，进入到滚石上山、爬坡过坎的关键阶段。, 　　如何跨越这一阶段？答案是不能片面追求增长速度，而是要立足自身、放眼长远，推进结构性改革，探寻新的增长动力和发展路径。要把握新工业革命的机遇，以创新促增长、促转型，积极投身智能制造、互联网+、数字经济、共享经济等带来的创新发展浪潮，努力领风气之先，加快新旧动能转换。要通过改革打破制约经济发展的藩篱，扫清不合理的体制机制障碍，激发市场和社会活力，实现更高质量、更具韧性、更可持续的增长。, 　　金砖国家虽然国情不同，但处于相近发展阶段，具有相同发展目标。我们应该共同探索经济创新增长之道，加强宏观政策协调和发展战略对接，发挥产业结构和资源禀赋互补优势，培育利益共享的价值链和大市场，形成联动发展格局。我们要用改革创新的实践经验，为其他新兴市场国家和发展中国家抢抓机遇、应对挑战闯出一条新路。, 　　经济合作是金砖机制的根基。我们应该紧紧围绕这条主线，落实《金砖国家经济伙伴战略》，推动各领域合作机制化、实心化，不断提升金砖合作含金量。今年，我们在新开发银行和应急储备安排建设、电子商务、贸易和投资便利化、服务贸易、本币债券、科技创新、工业合作、政府和社会资本合作等领域取得了一系列成果，拓展了经济合作广度和深度。我们要继续努力，落实以往的成果和共识，让现有机制发挥作用，同时积极探索务实合作新方式新内涵，拉紧联系纽带，让金砖合作行稳致远。, 　　第二，勇担金砖责任，维护世界和平安宁。和平与发展互为基础和前提。要和平不要冲突、要合作不要对抗是世界各国人民共同愿望。在各国一道努力下，世界总体和平得以保持半个多世纪。但是，世界仍不太平，地区冲突和热点问题一波未平、一波又起。恐怖主义、网络安全等威胁相互交织，为世界蒙上一层阴影。, 　　金砖国家是世界和平的维护者、国际安全秩序的建设者。今年，我们举行安全事务高级代表会议和外长正式会晤，建立常驻多边机构代表定期磋商机制，召开外交政策磋商、反恐工作组、网络安全工作组、维和事务磋商等会议，就是要加强在国际和地区重大问题上的沟通和协调，汇聚金砖合力。我们要维护联合国宪章宗旨和原则以及国际关系基本准则，坚定维护多边主义，推动国际关系民主化，反对霸权主义和强权政治。要倡导共同、综合、合作、可持续的安全观，建设性参与地缘政治热点问题解决进程，发挥应有作用。, 　　我相信，只要坚持综合施策、标本兼治，坚决打击一切形式的恐怖主义，恐怖分子终将无处容身。只要坚持对话协商谈判，为叙利亚、利比亚、巴以等问题的政治解决创造条件，战火终将平息，流离失所的难民定能重返家园。, 　　第三，发挥金砖作用，完善全球经济治理。唯有开放才能进步，唯有包容才能让进步持久。由于近年来世界经济处于疲弱期，发展失衡、治理困境、公平赤字等问题显得更加突出，保护主义和内顾倾向有所上升。世界经济和全球经济治理体系进入调整期，面临新的挑战。, 　　对经济全球化进程中出现的问题，我们不能视而不见，也不能怨天尤人，而是要齐心协力拿出解决方案。我们要同国际社会一道，加强对话、协调、合作，为维护和促进世界经济稳定和增长作出积极贡献。为此，我们应该推动建设开放型世界经济，促进贸易和投资自由化便利化，合力打造新的全球价值链，实现经济全球化再平衡，使之惠及各国人民。我们五国要相互提高开放水平，在开放中做大共同利益，在包容中谋求机遇共享，为五国经济发展开辟更加广阔的空间。, 　　新兴市场国家和发展中国家的发展，不是要动谁的奶酪，而是要努力把世界经济的蛋糕做大。我们要合力引导好经济全球化走向，提供更多先进理念和公共产品，推动建立更加均衡普惠的治理模式和规则，促进国际分工体系和全球价值链优化重塑。要推动全球经济治理体系变革，反映世界经济格局现实，并且完善深海、极地、外空、网络等新疆域的治理规则，确保各国权利共享、责任共担。, 　　第四，拓展金砖影响，构建广泛伙伴关系。作为具有全球影响力的合作平台，金砖合作的意义已超出五国范畴，承载着新兴市场国家和发展中国家乃至整个国际社会的期望。金砖国家奉行开放包容的合作理念，高度重视同其他新兴市场国家和发展中国家合作，建立起行之有效的对话机制。, 　　一箭易断，十箭难折。我们应该发挥自身优势和影响力，促进南南合作和南北对话，汇聚各国集体力量，联手应对风险挑战。我们应该扩大金砖合作的辐射和受益范围，推动“金砖+”合作模式，打造开放多元的发展伙伴网络，让更多新兴市场国家和发展中国家参与到团结合作、互利共赢的事业中来。, 　　厦门会晤期间，中方将举行新兴市场国家与发展中国家对话会，邀请来自全球不同地区国家的5位领导人共商国际发展合作和南南合作大计，推动落实2030年可持续发展议程。, 　　无论是深化金砖自身合作，还是构建广泛的伙伴关系，人民相互了解、理解、友谊都是不可或缺的基石。我们应该发挥人文交流纽带作用，把各界人士汇聚到金砖合作事业中来，打造更多像文化节、电影节、运动会这样接地气、惠民生的活动，让金砖故事传遍大街小巷，让我们五国人民的交往和情谊汇成滔滔江河，为金砖合作注入绵绵不绝的动力。, 　　女士们、先生们、朋友们！, 　　金砖合作机制不断走深走实的10年，也是中国全面推进改革开放、经济社会实现快速发展的10年。10年中，中国经济总量增长239%，货物进出口总额增长73%，成为世界第二大经济体，13亿多中国人民的生活水平实现大幅飞跃，中国为世界和地区经济发展作出的贡献也越来越大。,
