　　不可否认的是，随着中国改革进入攻坚期和深水区，一些深层次的矛盾和问题凸显出来，需要下大决心、花大气力加以破解。中国有句话叫良药苦口。我们采用的是全面深化改革这剂良方。这5年来，我们采取了1500多项改革举措，推动改革呈现全面发力、多点突破、纵深推进的局面，经济结构调整和产业升级步伐不断加快，经济稳中向好态势不断巩固，经济持续发展的新动能不断积聚。今年上半年，中国经济增长6.9%，第三产业增加值占国内生产总值的54.1%，新增城镇就业735万人。事实证明，全面深化改革的路走对了，还要大步走下去。, 　　面向未来，中国将深入贯彻创新、协调、绿色、开放、共享的发展理念，不断适应、把握、引领经济发展新常态，推进供给侧结构性改革，加快构建开放型经济新体制，以创新引领经济发展，实现可持续发展。中国将坚定不移走和平发展道路，为世界和平与发展作出新的更大贡献。, 　　今年5月，中方成功主办“一带一路”国际合作高峰论坛，29个国家的元首和政府首脑，140多个国家、80多个国际组织的1600多名代表出席，标志着共建“一带一路”倡议已经进入从理念到行动、从规划到实施的新阶段。各国代表在会上共商合作大计，共谋发展良策，达成广泛共识。需要指出的是，共建“一带一路”倡议不是地缘政治工具，而是务实合作平台；不是对外援助计划，而是共商共建共享的联动发展倡议。我相信，共建“一带一路”倡议将为各国实现合作共赢搭建起新的平台，为落实2030年可持续发展议程创造新的机遇。, 　　工商界是金砖国家经济发展的主力军。10年来，工商界人士将企业发展融入金砖合作，为构建金砖经济伙伴关系作出重要贡献。把工商论坛安排在领导人会晤前夕举行，就是为了听取工商界的意见和建议，共同把厦门会晤办好，把金砖合作建设好。希望你们发挥工商界在信息、技术、资金等方面的优势，开展更多互利共赢、利国利民的务实合作项目，为促进经济社会发展、增进人民福祉作出更大贡献。中国政府将继续鼓励中国企业到其他国家落地扎根，也热忱欢迎其他国家的企业来中国投资兴业。, 　　女士们、先生们、朋友们！, 　　金砖国家将迎来更富活力的第二个十年，让我们同国际社会一道努力，让我们的合作成果惠及五国人民，让世界和平与发展的福祉惠及各国民众。, 　　最后，我预祝这次工商论坛取得圆满成功！, 　　谢谢大家。, 　　（新华社厦门9月3日电） , 　　《 人民日报 》（ 2017年09月04日 02 版）, ]
title: 习近平：共同开创金砖合作第二个“金色十年”

eng: [, July 3, on a state visit to the Russian Federation, President Xi Jinping was interviewed by mainstream Russian media. The full text is as follows: 1. Q: You have repeatedly stated that Sino-Russian relations are at the best period in history. What aspects do you think this reflects? What is the significance of the timely dialogue and consultation between Russia and China on major international issues for global and regional peace, stability, development and prosperity? A: At present, China-Russia comprehensive strategic partnership of cooperation is at the best period in history. I think it is mainly reflected in the following aspects. First, a high level of political and strategic mutual trust has been established. The two sides have completely resolved the border issue left over by history, and the common border of more than 4,300 kilometers has become a link connecting the friendship between the two peoples. The two sides signed the "China-Russia Good-Neighborly Friendship and Cooperation Treaty", which established the concept of friendship between generations in legal form. The two sides reached a consensus of "four mutual support", that is, they firmly support each other's efforts to safeguard their core interests such as sovereignty, security, and territorial integrity. Manage your own affairs. China and Russia are each other's most reliable strategic partners. Second, the mechanism for high-level exchanges and cooperation in various fields is perfect. I have established a close working relationship and good personal friendship with President Putin, maintaining the frequency of 5 meetings per year, and jointly leading and planning the development of relations between the two countries. At the invitation of President Putin, I am about to pay a state visit to Russia. I believe this visit will inject new impetus into the development of Sino-Russian relations. The exchange and consultation mechanisms at all levels, departments and localities of the two countries are complete. The development of Sino-Russian relations is guaranteed by a solid mechanism. 3. The third is to actively connect with their respective development strategies. President Putin and I have reached an important consensus on the integration of the “Belt and Road” construction with the Eurasian Economic Union. The cooperation between the two countries in the fields of energy, trade, investment, high technology, finance, infrastructure construction, agriculture and other fields has developed rapidly, with modernization and technological innovation content. constantly improving. The Tianwan Nuclear Power Station has become a model project for Sino-Russian nuclear energy cooperation, and the Sino-Russian Eastern Natural Gas Pipeline Project is progressing smoothly. Both sides are actively carrying out joint development of strategic large-scale projects such as long-range wide-body passenger aircraft and heavy helicopters, and are committed to enhancing the comprehensive national strength and international competitiveness of the two countries. The two sides also agreed to develop cooperation in emerging fields such as innovation and e-commerce, and tap new growth points and potential for cooperation. The vigorous development of pragmatic cooperation has become the engine of continuous development of Sino-Russian relations. Fourth, the foundation of society and public opinion is solid and firm. This year is the 20th anniversary of the establishment of the China-Russia Friendship, Peace and Development Committee and the 60th anniversary of the establishment of the Russia-China Friendship Association. There are more than 3 million person-to-person exchanges between the two countries each year, and China has maintained Russia's status as the largest source of foreign tourists for many years. The two sides set up cultural centers and set up a joint university, and set a goal of reaching 100,000 international students by 2020. The people of the two countries love the language and culture of each other's country, and their mutual understanding and friendship are increasing day by day. The development of Sino-Russian friendly and cooperative relations has become the common aspiration and aspiration of the two peoples. Fifth, maintain close strategic coordination in international and regional affairs. Both China and Russia are major world powers, permanent members of the UN Security Council, and emerging market countries. They all uphold the basic principles of international relations based on the purposes and principles of the UN Charter, advocate world multipolarization and democratization of international relations, and firmly defend the second The victory of World War II and international fairness and justice. The two sides have closely coordinated and cooperated within the international multilateral frameworks of the United Nations, the G20, APEC and other international frameworks, and jointly advocated the establishment of multilateral mechanisms such as the Shanghai Cooperation Organization and BRICS cooperation and strived to promote their development, safeguarding the commonness of Central Asia and Northeast Asia. The surrounding area is peaceful and stable. The cooperation between the two countries in international affairs has effectively maintained regional and world peace, security and stability, played a role of stabilizer in the volatile international situation, and embodies the responsibility of China and Russia for world peace and development. Looking ahead, we have full confidence in the development of China-Russia comprehensive strategic partnership of cooperation. I would like to continue to work with President Putin to lead and promote the healthy development of relations between the two countries along the established track, better promote the respective development and revitalization of the two countries, and better promote world prosperity and stability. 2. Q: Some people think that the current level of development of Russia-China political relations is much higher than that of economic and trade relations. What measures do you think should be taken to improve bilateral economic and trade relations between Russia and China? Which directions and major projects have priority? A: President Putin and I attach great importance to and actively promote Sino-Russian economic and trade cooperation. Economic and trade cooperation is the most extensive in China-Russia pragmatic cooperation and has huge cooperation potential. Therefore, we must take a comprehensive view of the development of economic and trade cooperation between the two countries. China maintains Russia for 7 consecutive yearsIn China-Russia pragmatic cooperation, the foundation field is the broadest and the cooperation potential is huge. Therefore, we must take a comprehensive view of the development of economic and trade cooperation between the two countries. China has maintained Russia's largest trading partner status for seven consecutive years. Last year, Sino-Russian economic and trade cooperation overcome the adverse effects of the world economic downturn, crude oil and other commodity price fluctuations and other factors, and achieved a stop-and-fall recovery. The bilateral trade volume reached 69.53 billion US dollars, an increase of 2.2% year-on-year. In the first five months of this year, bilateral trade has further accelerated, with an increase of 26%. The annual trade volume is expected to exceed 80 billion US dollars. , In particular, the structure of economic and trade cooperation between the two countries has been continuously optimized, showing many new growth points. First, electromechanical and high-tech products maintained rapid growth. The growth rates in the first quarter of this year were 20.8% and 19.4%, respectively. Second, the effect of investment cooperation is gradually appearing. The investment cooperation committees of the two governments have determined a new batch of 73 cooperation projects this year, and some projects are being implemented as planned. The third is to promote financial cooperation in depth. The Russian Central Bank established the first overseas representative office in China. Russian companies became the first companies along the “Belt and Road” to successfully issue panda bonds in China. China announced the establishment of a Sino-Russian regional cooperation and development investment fund with a total scale of 100 billion yuan to promote cooperation between Northeast China and the Russian Far East. The fourth is the rapid development of agricultural trade. China welcomes more Russian high-quality agricultural products to enter the Chinese market. Fifth, the development cooperation of the Far East has been accelerated. China has become the largest trading partner in the Russian Far East, and the two parties have actively promoted a number of potential cooperation projects in areas such as deep processing of resources, port logistics, modern agriculture, and infrastructure construction. Sixth, strategic major projects in China, Russia, energy, nuclear energy, aviation, aerospace, cross-border infrastructure construction and other fields are steadily advancing. For example, the construction of the East Line natural gas pipeline is progressing smoothly, and Chinese companies are actively participating in the construction of the Yamal LPG project. The passenger aircraft joint venture company was established in Shanghai in May this year. Of course, the scale of mutual investment between China and Russia needs to be expanded, and the development of cooperation between small and medium-sized enterprises needs to be accelerated. Both parties need to work together. Both sides should strengthen traditional economic and trade cooperation, including Chinese imports of commodities such as oil and gas, coal, electricity, sawn timber from Russia, expand bilateral local currency settlement, implement agreed investment projects, and make full use of the China-Russia Expo, St. Petersburg International Economic Forum, and the Oriental Economic Forum And other exhibition platforms, and tap the potential for economic and trade cooperation between China and Russia, such as the "Yangtze River-Volga River", "Northeast China-Far East" and other border areas The development of China and Russia is inseparable from the development of Eurasia, and will also promote the development of Eurasia with its own development. In May this year, President Putin expressed his support and willingness to actively participate in the construction of the “Belt and Road” during his participation in the Belt and Road Forum for International Cooperation. China and Russia are actively promoting the construction of the “Belt and Road” and cooperation with the Eurasian Economic Union. Within the framework of docking cooperation, the two sides are actively discussing the economic and trade cooperation agreement between China and the Eurasian Economic Union and the list of docking cooperation projects. This will open up a broader space for development of economic and trade cooperation between the two countries, help to enhance the level of trade and investment facilitation between the two countries, create more new cooperation opportunities for entrepreneurs of the two countries, and achieve effective industries, technologies, capital, and markets. Circulation enables the countries of Eurasia to share benefits in the process of economic globalization and regional integration. At the level of bilateral large-scale project cooperation, the two sides must insist on the integration of upstream and downstream integration in the energy field. Strategic major projects are the cornerstone of the economic and trade cooperation between the two countries. Its comprehensive benefits and strategic effects cannot be reflected and measured by simple figures. The two sides should carry out more joint research and development, joint production, promotion and application and other cooperation. At the level of connectivity, we welcome and are willing to actively participate in the Russian proposal for the joint development and construction of the Binhai International Transportation Corridor. We hope that the two sides will soon complete major cross-border infrastructure such as the Tongjiang Railway Bridge and the Heihe Highway Bridge, and jointly develop and utilize the marine channel. Especially the Arctic waterway, to create the "Silk Road on Ice". Cooperation in these interconnected areas will provide new momentum for the further development of bilateral economic and trade cooperation. , Small and medium-sized enterprises are an important support for national economic growth, as well as a positive element to promote social innovation and create a large number of jobs. The governments of the two countries should create favorable conditions for the cooperation of small and medium-sized enterprises, mobilize their enthusiasm for cooperation, enable large enterprises and small and medium-sized enterprises to develop synchronously, promote each other, and jointly develop markets in third countries. In short, President Putin and I believe that China and Russia should deepen economic and trade cooperation and build a bond of common interests. At the same time, we must focus on the long-term, promote the spirit of mutual expansion of opening up and mutually beneficial cooperation, and focus on enhancing the comprehensive national strength and international competitiveness of the two countries. So that the results of the cooperation will benefit the people of both countries. 3. Q: You successfully hosted the “Belt and Road” International Cooperation Summit Forum in May this year. What's your comment on the results of this summit forum? What do you expect of the future development prospects of the “Belt and Road” construction? How do you rate Russia in the "Belt and Road"What is your comment on the results of this summit forum? What do you expect of the future development prospects of the “Belt and Road” construction? How do you evaluate Russia's role in the construction of the "Belt and Road"? A: The “Belt and Road” initiative was proposed by me during my visit to Central and Southeast Asia in 2013. The purpose is to strengthen international cooperation, connect with each other’s development strategies, achieve complementary advantages, and promote common development. In the past four years, the cooperation on the “Belt and Road” has been steadily advancing. It has been generally welcomed and actively participated by all parties, and has achieved a number of important early gains. Against this background, we successfully held the “Belt and Road” International Cooperation Summit Forum in Beijing in May this year, mainly to summarize the past and plan for the future. Leaders from 29 countries and heads of the United Nations, the World Bank, and the International Monetary Fund, and more than 1,600 representatives from more than 140 countries and more than 80 international organizations participated. Regarding the theme of "strengthening international cooperation, jointly building the "Belt and Road" and achieving win-win development", all parties exchanged in-depth views on such topics as strengthening policy coordination and development strategy docking, deepening partnerships, promoting interconnection, and promoting cultural exchanges. The meeting summarized the progress of the “Belt and Road” cooperation and reached a broad consensus. All parties formed 5 major categories, 76 major projects, and more than 270 specific results. They passed on the parties to build a cooperation platform, seek momentum for world economic growth, and promote economic globalization Develop positive signals that boost confidence. , We will take this as an opportunity to use the principles of mutual consultation, joint construction, and sharing to promote policy communication, facility connectivity, trade smoothness, capital and financial connectivity, and popular support among countries. Strengthen policy coordination and development strategy docking, take interconnection as a key area of ​​cooperation, support the acceleration of economic corridor construction, promote international production capacity and equipment manufacturing cooperation, promote cooperation in education, science and technology, culture, health care and other fields, and jointly explore new drivers of economic growth, Achieve the common development of all countries and strive to build a community with a shared future for mankind Russian President Vladimir Putin was the first leader to accept my invitation to participate in the Summit Forum, which exemplifies Russia's important support for China's meeting and the high level of Sino-Russian relations. In May 2015, China and Russia reached an important consensus on docking cooperation with the Eurasian Economic Union on the construction of the “Belt and Road” initiative, which was actively supported by other Eurasian Economic Union members. Over the past two years, docking cooperation has been steadily carried out, with significant progress. China is willing to work with Russia to take the opportunity of advancing the construction of the “Belt and Road” and the Eurasian Economic Union and continue to promote the continuous development of Sino-Russian relations. 4. Q: Can you please briefly introduce the current economic development in China? What do you expect from the upcoming G20 Hamburg Summit? A: Since this year, China's economy has continued its stable development trend since the second half of last year. In the first quarter, China's GDP grew by 6.9%, achieving a good start. As the deep reforms in China's important areas and key links continue to advance and take effect, China's economy will continue to maintain steady and rapid growth as new kinetic energy cultivation and traditional kinetic energy transformation work together. At present, the momentum of world economic growth is further consolidated. The economic situation in developed and emerging market countries is generally improving, but it is also facing some serious challenges. Against this background, the G20 continues to play the role of the main forum for international economic cooperation, implement the consensus of the Hangzhou Summit and previous summits, and lead the direction of the world economy, which is particularly important and in the interest of all parties. China has the following expectations for the Hamburg Summit. First, I hope that the Group of Twenty will continue to uphold the spirit of partnership for win-win cooperation and win-win cooperation. This spirit has guided the G20 through the ups and downs of the international financial crisis and will continue to inspire the G20 to lead the wave of the world economy. As I said in the speech at the welcome dinner of the Hangzhou Summit, "As long as we are tolerant and help each other, we can move forward steadily and reach the other side no matter the weather is good or the rain is strange." Secondly, I hope that the G20 will continue to hold high the banner of the era of building an open world economy. As a leading force in the world economy, the G20 should insist on open development, support the multilateral trading system with the World Trade Organization as its core, and promote trade and investment to continue to play the role of the world’s economic growth engine. Third, it is hoped that the G20 will continue to lead the development path of innovative growth and long-term governance. Countries need to continue to tap the new driving force of world economic growth through innovation, promote the in-depth development of the digital economy and the new industrial revolution, strengthen investment in infrastructure construction, comprehensively use fiscal policy, monetary policy, and structural reforms to promote a strong, sustainable, and balanced world economy And inclusive growth. The "Belt and Road" International Cooperation Summit Forum successfully held in Beijing in May is highly compatible with the theme of this year's Hamburg Summit-"Shaping a Linked World". The Belt and Road Initiative and the G20 cooperation can complement and promote each other and jointly promote world economic growth. China is willing to use the Hamburg Summit as an opportunity to work together with all partiesCooperation with the G20 can complement and promote each other and jointly promote world economic growth. China is willing to use the Hamburg Summit as an opportunity to work with all parties to make positive contributions to promoting world economic growth and improving global economic governance. 5. Q: The tension on the Korean peninsula has not been effectively eased for a long time. The international community pays close attention to the peninsula issue. How does China think this problem should be solved? How does China view the US deployment of the "Sade" anti-missile system in South Korea? A: China pays close attention to the development of the situation on the peninsula, insists on denuclearization of the peninsula, maintains peace and stability on the peninsula, and resolves issues through dialogue and consultation. The peninsula issue has a long history and is intricate and complicated. To solve it, we must adhere to both the symptoms and the root cause, taking into account the reasonable concerns of all parties. To this end, China has proposed the idea of ​​“dual-track parallelism” to realize the denuclearization of the peninsula and the establishment of a peace mechanism on the peninsula, as well as the suspension of nuclear missile activities by North Korea and the suspension of large-scale joint military exercises by the United States and South Korea. The Russian side clearly understands and supports it. Both China and Russia have the same and similar positions, and the international community has increasingly responded positively. It is hoped that the relevant parties on the Korean Peninsula issue will respond to the efforts of both China and Russia to promote peace and talks, take up their respective responsibilities, explain each other's goodwill, and move towards each other, so as to strive to bring the Korean Peninsula issue to the right track of dialogue, consultation and settlement as soon as possible. The deployment of the "Sade" anti-missile system by the United States in South Korea has severely damaged national strategic security interests, including China and Russia, and undermined regional strategic balance. It will not help achieve the goal of denuclearization of the Korean Peninsula and regional peace and stability. China has expressed its firm opposition and solemn concern about this. China and Russia maintain close communication and coordination on the "Sade" issue at all levels. Both sides have a high degree of consensus on the nature and harm of this issue. China and Russia firmly oppose the deployment of the "Sade" anti-missile system by the United States in South Korea and strongly urge the countries concerned to stop and cancel the relevant deployment. The two sides will jointly or individually take necessary measures to maintain the security interests of the two countries and the regional strategic balance. 6. Q: The international community pays close attention to the Syrian issue. How does China think this issue should be resolved? How do you evaluate Russia's role on the Syrian issue? A: The Syrian issue is currently the most complex and difficult-to-understand hot issue in the Middle East. It has caused deep suffering to the Syrian people and severe challenges to regional and world peace and stability. On the Syrian issue, China’s position is consistent. It advocates that Syria’s sovereign independence and territorial integrity should be maintained and respected. The Syrian country should be decided by the Syrian people in the future, and political settlement is the only realistic way out of the Syrian issue. We sincerely hope that the Syrian issue will be properly resolved as soon as possible, and hope that the Syrian people’s aspirations for peace can be realized as soon as possible, and they can return to and rebuild their homes. Recently, the Syrian issue has shown positive momentum. The parties concerned signed a memorandum at the Astana Dialogue and agreed to establish a conflict demotion zone in Syria. The Geneva peace talks hosted by the United Nations continued to advance. China advocates that under the current situation, the international community should maintain the hard-won political resolution of the Syrian issue, support the United Nations to continue to play its role as a main channel of good offices, promote the Syrian government and the opposition to show sincerity and patient consultation, and strive to reach a consensus that takes into account the legitimate concerns of all parties. Political solution. Relevant parties should also strengthen coordination and form a joint force to effectively combat terrorism in Syria within the framework of international law. The Russian side has played an important, positive influence and role in promoting the proper resolution of the Syrian issue. China appreciates this. 7. Question: Terrorism is a real threat to world security and development. How do you evaluate the cooperation between Russia and China in combating the "three forces"? A: Recently, the global anti-terrorism situation has evolved profoundly, and international terrorist activities have continued to be active. Since this year, many countries have suffered severe terrorist attacks in succession, causing a large number of casualties. Various aspects indicate that despite the progress made by the international community in combating terrorism, global terrorist activities will continue to occur frequently, which will continue to impact world peace, stability, and development. Dealing with terrorist threats is still a prominent problem in global security governance. In the face of severe terrorist threats, the consciousness of the community of destiny in the international community is increasing, the consensus on counter-terrorism is increasing, and cooperation in combating terrorism has achieved important results. However, the problem is still outstanding: First, the superimposed resonance of terrorism and hot issues has become an important reason for the "more anti-terrorism" in the international community. Second, international terrorist organizations have called for and planned more terrorist attacks around the world. Third, violent and terrorist thoughts continue to spread through the Internet and social media, and its deep-level influence will continue to emerge. Fourth, some countries still use counter-terrorism as a means to advance their national interests and pursue double standards in counter-terrorism, which has led to instrumentalization and fragmentation of international cooperation in counter-terrorism, making it difficult to achieve joint efforts. , China has always supported the international community's efforts to combat terrorism in a constructive manner. We believe that to carry out international cooperation against terrorism, the first is to abandon the "double, China has always supported the international community's efforts to combat terrorism in a constructive manner. We believe that to carry out international counter-terrorism cooperation, one must abandon the "double standards", give full play to the leading role of the United Nations in the international anti-terrorism struggle, and be determined to form a joint force; second, to properly resolve regional hotspot issues and help Syria and other Middle Eastern countries as soon as possible Restore stability and curb the rampant trend of terrorism; Third, we must focus on the long-term, comprehensive measures, cure both the symptoms and root causes, and take multiple measures in politics, economy, and culture to eliminate the breeding ground for terrorism from the source. Both China and Russia are victims of terrorism. The cooperation between the two countries in the field of anti-terrorism security is an important part of the Sino-Russian comprehensive strategic partnership of cooperation and sets an example for international anti-terrorism cooperation. This is not only in the fundamental interests of the two countries, but also conducive to peace and stability in the region and the world. The two sides have conducted good cooperation in the areas of combating terrorism, separatism, and extremism through the law enforcement and security cooperation mechanism, and played an important and positive role in maintaining the stable development of the two countries and the region. China is willing to deepen bilateral pragmatic cooperation with Russia, increase mutual support in each other’s core concerns about counter-terrorism, and at the same time closely coordinate and cooperate within the multilateral frameworks of the United Nations, the Shanghai Cooperation Organization, etc., uphold the leading role of the United Nations in international cooperation against terrorism and promote Anti-terrorism and security cooperation of the Shanghai Cooperation Organization and other mechanisms have continued to deepen, and jointly promoted greater progress in counter-terrorism international cooperation. (Xinhua News Agency, Beijing, July 3), "People's Daily" (July 04, 2017, 01 edition),]
eng_title: Xi Jinping interviewed by Russian media
source-date: 来源：人民网－人民日报          发布时间：2017-07-04
text: [, 7月3日，在对俄罗斯联邦进行国事访问之际，国家主席习近平接受俄罗斯主流媒体采访。全文如下：, 一、问：您多次提出中俄关系处于历史最好时期，您认为这体现在哪些方面？俄中两国及时就主要国际问题进行对话协商的做法对全球和地区和平稳定和发展繁荣有何重要意义？, 答：当前，中俄全面战略协作伙伴关系处于历史最好时期，我认为主要体现在以下方面。, 一是建立了高水平的政治和战略互信。双方彻底解决了历史遗留的边界问题，4300多公里共同边界成为连接两国人民友谊的纽带。双方签署《中俄睦邻友好合作条约》，将世代友好的理念以法律形式确立下来。双方达成“四个相互坚定支持”共识，即坚定支持对方维护本国主权、安全、领土完整等核心利益的努力，坚定支持对方走符合本国国情的发展道路，坚定支持对方发展振兴，坚定支持对方把自己的事情办好。中俄互为最可信赖的战略伙伴。, 二是高层交往和各领域合作机制健全。我同普京总统建立了密切的工作关系和良好的个人友谊，保持年均5次会晤的频率，共同引领和规划两国关系发展。应普京总统邀请，我即将对俄罗斯进行国事访问，相信这次访问将为中俄关系发展注入新动力。两国各层级、各部门、各地方交往和磋商机制完备。中俄关系发展具有牢固的机制保障。, 三是积极对接各自发展战略。我和普京总统达成“一带一路”建设同欧亚经济联盟对接的重要共识，两国能源、贸易、投资、高技术、金融、基础设施建设、农业等各领域合作发展迅速，现代化和科技创新含量不断提升。田湾核电站成为中俄核能合作的典范项目，中俄东线天然气管道项目进展顺利。双方正在积极开展联合研制远程宽体客机和重型直升机等战略性大项目合作，致力于提升两国综合国力和国际竞争力。双方还商定发展创新、电子商务等新兴领域合作，挖掘新的合作增长点和潜力。蓬勃发展的务实合作成为中俄关系持续发展的引擎。, 四是社会和民意基础坚实牢固。今年是中俄友好、和平与发展委员会成立20周年和俄中友协成立60周年，也是中俄媒体交流年收官之年，双方正在举办一系列丰富多彩的人文交流活动。两国人员往来每年超过300万人次，中国连续多年保持俄罗斯最大外国游客客源国地位。双方互设文化中心，成立联合大学，制定了2020年互派留学生规模达到10万人的目标。两国民众十分喜爱对方国家的语言和文化，相互了解和友谊与日俱增。发展中俄友好合作关系成为两国人民的共同心声和愿望。, 五是在国际和地区事务中保持密切战略协作。中俄同为世界主要大国、联合国安理会常任理事国、新兴市场国家，都主张坚持以联合国宪章宗旨和原则为基石的国际关系基本准则，倡导世界多极化和国际关系民主化，坚决捍卫第二次世界大战胜利成果和国际公平正义。双方在联合国、二十国集团、亚太经合组织等国际多边框架内密切协调和配合，共同倡导建立了上海合作组织、金砖国家合作等多边机制并努力推动其发展，维护中亚、东北亚等共同周边和平稳定。两国在国际事务中的协作有力维护了地区及世界和平、安全、稳定，在动荡多变的国际局势中发挥了稳定器作用，体现了中俄两个大国对世界和平与发展的担当。, 展望未来，我们对中俄全面战略协作伙伴关系发展充满信心。我愿继续同普京总统一道，引领和推动两国关系沿着既定轨道健康发展，更好促进两国各自发展振兴，更好促进世界繁荣稳定。, 二、问：有人认为当前俄中政治关系发展水平远高于经贸关系，您认为应该采取何种措施来改善俄中双边经贸关系，哪些方向和大项目具有优先地位？, 答：我和普京总统都高度重视并积极推动中俄经贸合作。经贸合作在中俄务实合作中基础领域最广，合作潜力巨大。, 我们要全面看待两国经贸合作发展。中国连续7年保持俄罗斯第一大贸易伙伴地位。去年，中俄经贸合作克服世界经济不景气、原油等大宗商品价格波动等不利因素影响，实现止跌回升，双边贸易额达到695.3亿美元、同比增长2.2%。今年前5个月，双边贸易进一步提速，增幅达到26%，全年贸易额有望超过800亿美元。, 尤其是两国经贸合作的结构不断优化，呈现不少新增长点。一是机电和高新技术产品保持快速增长，今年第一季度增幅分别为20.8%和19.4%。二是投资合作效应正在逐步显现。两国政府间投资合作委员会今年确定了新一批73个合作项目清单，部分项目正在按计划实施。三是金融合作深入推进。俄罗斯央行在中国设立首家海外代表处。俄罗斯企业成为“一带一路”沿线首家在中国成功发行熊猫债券的企业。中方宣布设立总规模为1000亿元人民币的中俄地区合作发展投资基金，用于促进中国东北地区和俄罗斯远东地区合作。四是农产品贸易发展迅速。中方欢迎更多俄罗斯优质农产品进入中国市场。五是远东开发合作提速。中国已成为俄罗斯远东地区第一大贸易伙伴，双方在资源深加工、港口物流、现代农业、基础设施建设等领域积极推进一批有潜力的合作项目。六是中俄能源、核能、航空、航天、跨境基础设施建设等领域战略性大项目稳步推进，比如，东线天然气管道建设进展顺利，中国企业积极参与亚马尔液化气项目建设，远程宽体客机合资公司已于今年5月在上海挂牌成立。, 当然，中俄相互投资规模有待扩大、中小企业合作发展还需加快，需要双方共同努力。双方要加强传统经贸合作，包括中方自俄罗斯进口油气、煤炭、电力、锯材等大宗商品，扩大双边本币结算，落实好商定投资项目，充分用好中俄博览会、圣彼得堡国际经济论坛、东方经济论坛等展会平台作用，挖掘中俄“长江—伏尔加河”、“东北—远东”等地方和边境地区经贸合作潜力。, 中俄两国发展离不开欧亚大陆发展，也将以自身发展促进欧亚大陆发展。今年5月，普京总统来华出席“一带一路”国际合作高峰论坛期间表示支持并愿积极参与“一带一路”建设。中俄两国正在积极推进“一带一路”建设同欧亚经济联盟对接合作。在对接合作框架内，双方正在积极商谈中国同欧亚经济联盟经贸合作协议和对接合作项目清单。这将为两国经贸合作开拓更加广阔的发展空间，有助于提升两国贸易和投资便利化水平，为两国企业家创造更多新的合作机遇，实现产业、技术、资本、市场等有效流通，使欧亚各国在经济全球化和区域一体化进程中实现利益共享。, 在双边大项目合作层面，双方要坚持推进能源领域上下游一体化合作。战略性大项目是两国经贸合作的基石，其综合效益和战略效果不能用简单的数字体现和衡量，双方要开展更多联合研制、联合生产、推广应用等合作。, 在互联互通层面，我们欢迎并愿积极参与俄方提出的共同开发建设滨海国际运输走廊建议，希望双方早日建成同江铁路桥、黑河公路桥等重大跨境基础设施，共同开发和利用海上通道特别是北极航道，打造“冰上丝绸之路”。这些互联互通领域的合作将为促进两国经贸合作深入发展提供新动能。, 中小企业是国家经济增长的重要支撑，也是推动社会创新和创造大量就业的积极要素。两国政府要为中小企业合作创造有利条件，调动他们合作的积极性，使大企业和中小企业同步发展、相互促进，并共同开拓第三国市场。, 总之，我和普京总统都认为，中俄两国要深化经贸合作，筑牢共同利益纽带，同时要着眼长远，弘扬相互扩大开放、开展互利合作精神，着眼提升两国综合国力和国际竞争力，使合作成果更多惠及两国人民。, 三、问：今年5月您成功主持召开了“一带一路”国际合作高峰论坛，您对这次高峰论坛成果有何评价？对“一带一路”建设未来发展前景有何期待？您如何评价俄罗斯在“一带一路”建设中的作用？, 答：“一带一路”倡议是我在2013年访问中亚和东南亚时提出来的，目的是通过加强国际合作，对接彼此发展战略，实现优势互补，促进共同发展。近4年来，“一带一路”相关合作稳步推进，受到各方普遍欢迎和积极参与，取得了一批重要早期收获。在这一背景下，我们今年5月在北京成功举办“一带一路”国际合作高峰论坛，主要是总结过去、规划未来。来自29个国家的领导人和联合国、世界银行、国际货币基金组织的负责人，140多个国家和80多个国际组织的1600多名代表参加。各方围绕“加强国际合作，共建‘一带一路’，实现共赢发展”的主题，就加强政策协调和发展战略对接、深化伙伴关系、推动互联互通、促进人文交流等议题深入交换意见。会议总结了“一带一路”合作进展，达成广泛共识，各方形成5大类、76大项、270多项具体成果，传递出各方打造合作平台、为世界经济增长谋求动力、为经济全球化发展提振信心的积极信号。, 我们将以此为契机，以共商、共建、共享为指导原则，推动各国政策沟通、设施联通、贸易畅通、资金融通、民心相通。加强政策协调和发展战略对接，把互联互通作为重点合作领域，支持加快经济走廊建设，推进国际产能和装备制造合作，促进教育、科技、文化、医疗卫生等领域合作，共同挖掘经济增长新动力，实现各国共同发展，努力打造人类命运共同体。, 俄罗斯总统普京是最早接受我邀请参加高峰论坛的领导人，体现了俄方对中方办会的重要支持和中俄关系的高水平。2015年5月，中俄双方就“一带一路”建设同欧亚经济联盟对接合作达成重要共识，得到欧亚经济联盟其他成员国积极响应支持。2年来，对接合作稳步开展，进展显著。中方愿同俄方一道努力，以推进“一带一路”建设同欧亚经济联盟对接为契机，继续推动中俄关系不断向前发展。, 四、问：能否请您简要介绍当前中国经济发展情况？您对即将召开的二十国集团领导人汉堡峰会有何期待？, 答：今年以来，中国经济延续了去年下半年以来稳中向好的发展态势。第一季度，中国国内生产总值增长6.9%，实现了良好开局。随着中国重要领域和关键环节深层次改革持续推进并落地见效，新动能培育和传统动能改造协同发力，中国经济将继续保持平稳较快增长。, 当前，世界经济增长势头进一步巩固，发达国家和新兴市场国家经济形势普遍向好，但也面临一些严峻挑战。在这一背景下，二十国集团继续发挥国际经济合作主要论坛作用、落实杭州峰会及历届峰会共识、引领世界经济前进方向尤为重要，也符合各方利益。中方对汉堡峰会有以下期待。, 一是希望二十国集团继续秉持同舟共济、合作共赢的伙伴精神。这种精神曾指引二十国集团走过国际金融危机风雨，也将继续鼓舞二十国集团引领世界经济浪潮。正如我在杭州峰会欢迎晚宴致辞中讲的，“只要我们彼此包容、守望相助，就能无论晴时好、雨时奇，都坚定前行，共抵彼岸”。, 二是希望二十国集团继续高举建设开放型世界经济的时代旗帜。作为世界经济的引领力量，二十国集团应该坚持开放发展，支持以世界贸易组织为核心的多边贸易体制，推动贸易和投资继续发挥世界经济增长引擎作用。, 三是希望二十国集团继续引领创新增长、长效治理的发展路径。各国需要继续通过创新挖掘世界经济增长新动力，推动数字经济、新工业革命深入发展，加强基础设施建设投资，综合运用财政政策、货币政策、结构性改革，促进世界经济实现强劲、可持续、平衡、包容增长。, 5月在北京成功举行的“一带一路”国际合作高峰论坛，同今年汉堡峰会的主题——“塑造联动世界”高度契合。“一带一路”倡议和二十国集团合作可以相互补充、相互促进，共同促进世界经济增长。中方愿以汉堡峰会为契机，同各方一道努力，为促进世界经济增长、完善全球经济治理作出积极贡献。, 五、问：朝鲜半岛紧张局势长期未能得到有效缓和，国际社会高度关注半岛问题。中国认为应该如何解决这一问题？中国如何看待美国在韩国部署“萨德”反导系统的行动？, 答：中方高度关注半岛局势发展，坚持实现半岛无核化，坚持维护半岛和平稳定，坚持通过对话协商解决问题。半岛问题由来已久，错综复杂，解决起来必须坚持标本兼治，兼顾各方合理关切。为此，中方提出实现半岛无核化和建立半岛和平机制“双轨并行”思路，以及朝鲜暂停核导活动和美韩两国暂停大规模联合军演“双暂停”倡议。俄方明确予以理解和支持，中俄双方有着相同和相近的立场，国际社会也越来越多地作出积极回应。希望半岛问题相关各方呼应中俄双方的劝和促谈努力，负起各自应负责任，互释善意，相向而行，争取早日将半岛问题纳入对话协商解决的正确轨道。, 美国在韩国部署“萨德”反导系统严重损害包括中俄在内域内国家战略安全利益，破坏地区战略平衡，无助于实现朝鲜半岛无核化目标和地区和平稳定。中方已对此表明坚决反对立场和严正关切。中俄在各层级就“萨德”问题保持密切沟通和协调，双方对这一问题本质和危害的认识高度一致。中俄坚决反对美国在韩国部署“萨德”反导系统，强烈敦促有关国家停止并取消相关部署，双方将共同或各自采取必要措施，维护两国安全利益和地区战略平衡。, 六、问：国际社会高度关注叙利亚问题，中方认为应该如何解决这一问题？您如何评价俄方在叙利亚问题上的作用？, 答：叙利亚问题是当前中东最为复杂难解的热点问题，给叙利亚人民带来了深重苦难，也给地区和世界和平稳定带来严峻挑战。, 在叙利亚问题上，中方的立场是一贯的，主张叙利亚主权独立、领土完整应当得到维护和尊重，叙利亚国家未来应该由叙利亚人民自主决定，认为政治解决是叙利亚问题的唯一现实出路。我们真诚希望叙利亚问题尽快得到妥善解决，希望叙利亚人民企盼和平的愿望早日实现，能够重返并重建家园。, 近来，叙利亚问题出现积极势头。有关各方在阿斯塔纳对话会上签署备忘录，同意在叙利亚设立冲突降级区。联合国方面主持的日内瓦和谈持续推进。中方主张，当前形势下，国际社会要维护来之不易的叙利亚问题政治解决势头，支持联合国继续发挥斡旋主渠道作用，推动叙利亚政府和反对派展现诚意、耐心协商，努力达成兼顾各方合理关切的政治解决方案。有关各方还应该加强协调，形成合力，在国际法框架内有效打击叙利亚境内的恐怖主义。, 俄方为推动叙利亚问题妥善解决发挥了重要、积极影响和作用，中方对此表示赞赏。, 七、问：恐怖主义是世界安全和发展的现实威胁。您如何评价俄中两国在打击“三股势力”方面的合作？, 答：近期，全球反恐形势深刻演变，国际恐怖活动持续活跃。今年以来，许多国家接连遭受严重恐怖袭击，造成大量人员伤亡。各方面情况表明，尽管国际社会军事打恐取得一定进展，但全球恐怖活动仍将多发频发，对世界和平、稳定、发展构成持续冲击，应对恐怖主义威胁仍是全球安全治理的一个突出难题。, 面对严峻的恐怖威胁，国际社会命运共同体意识在增强，反恐共识不断增多，合作打击恐怖主义取得重要成效。但是，问题依然突出：一是恐怖主义同热点问题叠加共振，成为国际社会“越反越恐”的重要原因。二是国际恐怖组织号召并策划在全球各地发动更多恐怖袭击。三是暴力恐怖思想通过网络和社交媒体在全球持续蔓延，其深层次影响将不断显现。四是一些国家仍将反恐作为推进本国利益的手段，在反恐上奉行双重标准，导致反恐国际合作工具化、碎片化，难成合力。, 中方一直以建设性方式支持国际社会打击恐怖主义的努力。我们认为，开展反恐国际合作，一是要摒弃“双重标准”，充分发挥联合国在国际反恐斗争中的主导作用，矢志一心，形成合力；二是要妥善解决地区热点问题，帮助叙利亚等中东国家尽快恢复稳定，遏制住恐怖主义蔓延猖獗之势；三是要着眼长远，综合施策，标本兼治，政治、经济、文化等多措并举，从源头肃清恐怖主义滋生的温床。, 中国和俄罗斯都是恐怖主义受害者。两国在反恐安全领域的合作是中俄全面战略协作伙伴关系的重要组成部分，为国际反恐合作树立了典范。这既符合两国根本利益，也有利于本地区乃至世界和平稳定。双方通过执法安全合作机制，在打击恐怖主义、分裂主义、极端主义“三股势力”等领域开展了良好合作，为维护两国和本地区稳定发展发挥了重要积极作用。中方愿同俄方深化双边务实合作，加大在彼此反恐核心关切上的相互支持，同时密切在联合国、上海合作组织等多边框架内协调和配合，坚持联合国在反恐国际合作中的主导作用，推动上海合作组织等机制反恐安全合作不断走向深入，共同推动反恐国际合作取得更大进展。（新华社北京7月3日电）, 《 人民日报 》（ 2017年07月04日 01 版）, ]
title: 习近平接受俄罗斯媒体采访

eng: [, Dear Heads of State, Heads of Government,, Heads of International Organizations,, Ladies, Gentlemen, and Friends:, "Meng Xia Day, All Things Show." At this beautiful time, more than 100 countries Guests from all walks of life gathered in Beijing to discuss the "Belt and Road" construction cooperation plan, which is of great significance. Today, the talents are the best, and the young and the long have gathered. I look forward to everyone's brainstorming and free speech, and suggestions for promoting the construction of the "Belt and Road", so that this century project will benefit the people of all countries. , Ladies, gentlemen, friends! , More than 2000 years ago, our ancestors passed through the grasslands and deserts, opening up the land-based Silk Road connecting Asia, Europe, and Africa; our ancestors sailed through the stormy seas and the sea silk road connecting the East and the West. The ancient Silk Road opened a new window for friendly exchanges between countries and wrote a new chapter in human development and progress. The millennium "gilt bronze silkworm" collected by China's Shaanxi History Museum and the millennium shipwreck "Black Stone" discovered in Indonesia have witnessed this history. The ancient Silk Road stretches for thousands of miles and lasts for thousands of years. It has accumulated the Silk Road spirit centered on peaceful cooperation, openness and tolerance, mutual learning and mutual benefit, and mutual benefit and win-win. This is a precious legacy of human civilization. ,-Peaceful cooperation. In the Han Dynasty of China more than 140 BC, a peace mission from Changan began to open up the road from the east to the west, and completed the "cutting journey". This is the famous Zhang Qian's mission to the Western Region. During the Tang, Song, and Yuan Dynasties of China, the land and sea Silk Road developed simultaneously. Travellers Du Huan, Marco Polo, and Ibn Battuta of China, Italy, and Morocco all stayed on land and the Sea Silk Road. A historical mark. In the early 15th century, the Ming Dynasty, the famous Chinese navigator Zheng He made seven ocean-going voyages, leaving behind the long story. The reason why these pioneering careers became famous is because they did not use war horses and spears, but camel teams and goodwill; they did not rely on strong ships and artillery, but treasure ships and friendship. Generations of "Silk Road People" have built a bond of cooperation and a bridge of peace between East and West. , ——Open and inclusive. The ancient Silk Road spans the Nile River Basin, the Tigris and Euphrates Rivers, the Indus and Ganges River Basins, the Yellow River and the Yangtze River Basin, spans the birthplace of Egyptian civilization, Babylonian civilization, Indian civilization, and Chinese civilization, and spans the congregation of believers in Buddhism, Christianity, and Islam. Place, a settlement that spans people of different countries and colors. Different civilizations, religions, and races seek common ground while reserving differences, and are open and inclusive. They write magnificent poems of mutual respect, and draw together a beautiful picture of common development. Ancient cities such as Jiuquan, Dunhuang, Turpan, Kashgar, Samarkand, Baghdad, Constantinople, and ancient ports in Ningbo, Quanzhou, Guangzhou, Beihai, Colombo, Jeddah, Alexandria, etc. are the “living fossils” that record this history ". History tells us: civilization develops in openness, and nations coexist in integration. , —— mutual learning and mutual learning. The ancient Silk Road is not only a way of trading goods, but also a road of knowledge exchange. Along the ancient Silk Road, China spread silk, porcelain, lacquer, and iron to the West, and also brought pepper, flax, spices, grapes, and pomegranates to China. Along the ancient Silk Road, Buddhism, Islam, and Arabic astronomy, calendar, and medicine were introduced into China, and China's four major inventions and sericulture techniques were also spread to the world. More importantly, the exchange of commodities and knowledge has brought about innovative ideas. For example, Buddhism originated in India, flourished in China, and inherited in Southeast Asia. Confucian culture originated in China and was respected by European thinkers such as Leibniz and Voltaire. This is the result of the charm of exchanges and mutual learning. , —— Mutual benefit and win-win. The ancient Silk Road has witnessed the grandeur of "land envoys looking at the road, business travel is endless" on land, and witnessed the prosperity of "shipping in the sea, and countless" at sea. In this great artery, capital, technology, personnel and other production factors flow freely, and commodities, resources and achievements are shared. Almaty, Samarkand, Chang'an and other important towns and Sur Port, Guangzhou and other good ports are thriving, Rome, Anxi, Guishuang and other ancient countries are flourishing, and Han and Tang Dynasties in China are ushering in a prosperous age. The ancient Silk Road created great development and prosperity in the region. , History is the best teacher. This history shows that no matter how far apart we are, as long as we bravely take the first step and stick to each other, we will be able to walk out of a road of encounter, mutual understanding, and common development, and move towards a happy, peaceful, harmonious and beautiful distance. , Ladies, gentlemen, friends! From a historical perspective, human society is in an era of great development, big changes, and big adjustments. The world's multi-polarization, economic globalization, social informatization, and cultural diversification are developing in depth. The trend of peaceful development is becoming stronger and stronger. The pace of reform and innovation continues to move forward. By countryEconomic globalization, social informatization, and cultural diversification are developing in depth. The trend of peaceful development is becoming stronger and stronger, and the pace of reform and innovation continues to move forward. The connections between countries have never been as close as they are today, the world’s people’s longing for a better life has never been as strong as today, and the means by which humans have overcome difficulties have never been as rich as they are today. From a practical perspective, we are in a world where challenges are frequent. The world's economic growth requires new impetus, development needs a more inclusive balance, and the gap between the rich and the poor needs to be bridged. Regional hotspots continue to be turbulent and terrorism spreads and rages. Peace deficits, development deficits, and governance deficits are serious challenges before all mankind. This is the question I have been thinking about. , In the fall of 2013, I proposed the joint construction of the Silk Road Economic Belt and the 21st Century Maritime Silk Road in Kazakhstan and Indonesia, the “Belt and Road” initiative. "Don't say anything, you will do what you want." Over the past four years, more than 100 countries and international organizations around the world have actively supported and participated in the construction of the "Belt and Road." Important resolutions such as the UN General Assembly and the UN Security Council have also been incorporated into the construction of the "Belt and Road." The construction of the “Belt and Road” has gradually transformed from concept to action, and from vision to reality, with fruitful construction results. -This is the 4 years of continuous deepening of policy communication. I have said many times that the construction of the “Belt and Road” is not a start-up and a comeback, but a strategic integration and complementary advantages. We coordinate policies with relevant countries, including the Eurasian Economic Union proposed by Russia, the Master Plan for Connectivity proposed by ASEAN, the "Light Path" proposed by Kazakhstan, the "Middle Corridor" proposed by Turkey, and the "Development Road" proposed by Mongolia The “two corridors and one circle” proposed by Vietnam, the “Economic Centre of Northern England” proposed by the United Kingdom, and the “Amber Road” proposed by Poland. China's planning and docking work with Laos, Cambodia, Myanmar, Hungary and other countries has also begun. China has signed cooperation agreements with more than 40 countries and international organizations, and cooperated with more than 30 countries on institutionalized production capacity. During this forum, we will also sign a batch of docking cooperation agreements and action plans, and jointly issue more than 60 countries and international organizations to promote the “Belt and Road” trade smooth cooperation initiative. All parties have achieved the effect of "one plus one is greater than two" through policy docking. , ——This is the 4 years of continuous improvement of facility connectivity. "Roads are open, all industries are prosperous." Together with relevant countries, we will accelerate the progress of the Yawan High Speed ​​Rail, the China-Laos Railway, the Yaji Railway, the Hungary-Serbia Railway, etc., and build ports such as Gwadar Port and Piraeus Port. A large number of interconnection projects. At present, a composite infrastructure is led by China-Pakistan, China-Mongolia-Russia, New Asia-Europe Continental Bridge and other economic corridors, with land, sea and air passages and information highways as the skeleton, relying on major projects such as railways, ports, and pipeline networks. The network is forming. -This is the 4 years of uninterrupted and continuous improvement of trade. China and the participating countries along the “Belt and Road” have vigorously promoted trade and investment facilitation, and continuously improved the business environment. I learned that the customs clearance time for agricultural products from Central Asian countries such as Kazakhstan to reach the Chinese market has been shortened by 90%. From 2014 to 2016, China's total trade with countries along the “Belt and Road” exceeded US$3 trillion. China's cumulative investment in countries along the "Belt and Road" has exceeded US$50 billion. Chinese companies have built 56 economic and trade cooperation zones in more than 20 countries, creating nearly US$1.1 billion in taxes and 180,000 jobs for the countries concerned. , ——This is the 4 years of continuous expansion of capital finance. The financing bottleneck is a prominent challenge to achieve interconnection. China has carried out various forms of financial cooperation with participating countries and organizations in the Belt and Road Initiative. The Asian Infrastructure Investment Bank has provided US$1.7 billion in loans to nine projects in the participating countries of the “Belt and Road” initiative. The “Silk Road Fund” has invested US$4 billion. China and Central and Eastern Europe “16+1” financial holding companies have been formally established. These new types of financial mechanisms and the traditional multilateral financial institutions such as the World Bank each have their own emphasis and complement each other, forming a “Belt and Road” financial cooperation network with clear levels and initial scale. , ——This is the 4 years of continuous promotion of people-to-people communication. "The friendship between the nations lies in the mutual friendship between the people, and the mutual friendship lies in the closeness of the hearts." The participating countries in the construction of the "Belt and Road" promote the spirit of the Silk Road, carry out the construction of the intellectual Silk Road and the healthy Silk Road, etc., in science, education, culture, health, folk Extensive cooperation in various fields, such as exchanges, has laid a solid foundation for public opinion for the construction of the “Belt and Road” initiative and laid a solid foundation for society. The Chinese government provides 10,000 government scholarships to relevant countries every year, and local governments have also set up special Silk Road scholarships to encourage international cultural and educational exchanges. Various cultural cooperation projects such as the Silk Road Cultural Year, Tourism Year, Art Festival, Film and Television Bridge, Seminars, Think Tank Dialogue, etc. are full of flowers. People exchange frequently, and the distance between hearts is reduced in the exchange. , FengHumanities cooperation projects such as festivals, film and television bridges, seminars, think tank dialogues, and so on, are full of flowers. People exchange frequently, and the heart-to-heart distance is narrowed in the exchange. The fruitful results show that the “Belt and Road” initiative conforms to the trend of the times, adapts to the development laws, conforms to the interests of people of all countries, and has broad prospects. , Ladies, gentlemen, friends! The Chinese say, "Everything is difficult at first." The "Belt and Road" construction has taken solid steps. We must take advantage of the trend and follow the trend to promote the construction of the “Belt and Road” to a stable future and move towards a better future. Here, I have a few comments. First, we must build the “Belt and Road” into a road of peace. The ancient Silk Road, and fashionable, decline in wartime. The construction of the “Belt and Road” is inseparable from a peaceful environment. We must build a new type of international relations with win-win cooperation as the core, and build partnerships where dialogues are not confrontational and partnerships are not alliances. Countries should respect each other's sovereignty, dignity, territorial integrity, respect each other's development path and social system, and respect each other's core interests and major concerns. The area along the ancient Silk Road used to be "a place where milk and honey flowed", but now many places have become synonymous with conflict and turmoil and crisis challenges. This situation cannot continue. We must establish a common, comprehensive, cooperative, and sustainable view of security, and create a shared and shared security landscape. We must focus on resolving hotspots and insist on political solutions; we must focus on mediating mediation and uphold fairness and justice; we must focus on advancing counter-terrorism, treating both the symptoms and root causes, and eliminating poverty and backwardness and social injustice. Second, we must build the “Belt and Road” into a road of prosperity. Development is the master key to solving all problems. To advance the construction of the “Belt and Road”, we must focus on the fundamental issue of development, unleash the development potential of all countries, and achieve economic integration, development linkage, and results sharing. , Industry is the foundation of the economy. We must carry out in-depth industrial cooperation, promote mutual compatibility and mutual promotion of industrial development plans of various countries, grasp the construction of large projects, strengthen international production capacity and equipment manufacturing cooperation, seize the new development opportunities of the new industrial revolution, cultivate new formats, and maintain economic growth vitality . , Finance is the blood of modern economy. Only when the blood is connected can growth be powerful. We need to establish a stable, sustainable, and risk-controllable financial security system, innovate investment and financing models, promote government and social capital cooperation, build a diversified financing system and multi-level capital market, develop inclusive finance, and improve financial service networks. , Facilities connectivity is the basis for cooperative development. We must focus on promoting the connectivity of land, sea, sky, and the Internet, focusing on key channels, key cities, and key projects, and connecting land roads, railway road networks, and sea port networks. We have established the framework for the construction of six economic corridors under the “Belt and Road” initiative, and we must move forward in a down-to-earth manner. It is necessary to seize the new round of energy structure adjustment and energy technology reform trends, build a global energy Internet, and achieve green and low-carbon development. It is necessary to improve the construction of cross-regional logistics networks. We must also promote the integration of policies, rules, and standards to provide a mechanism guarantee for interconnection. Thirdly, we will build the “Belt and Road” into an open road. Openness brings progress, and closure leads to backwardness. For a country, opening up is like breaking a cocoon into a butterfly. Although it will experience temporary pains, it will bring new life. The construction of the “Belt and Road” should be guided by opening up to solve the problems of economic growth and balance. , We must build an open cooperation platform, maintain and develop an open world economy, jointly create an environment conducive to open development, promote the establishment of a fair, reasonable and transparent international economic and trade investment rules system, and promote the orderly flow of production elements and efficient allocation of resources 3. Deep market integration. We welcome countries to actively develop an open economy based on their own national conditions, participate in global governance and the supply of public products, and work together to build a broad community of interests. , Trade is an important engine of economic growth. We must have a "look out" mind, maintain the multilateral trading system, promote the construction of free trade zones, and promote trade and investment liberalization and facilitation. Of course, we must also focus on solving problems such as development imbalances, governance dilemmas, the digital divide, and distribution gaps, and build an open, inclusive, inclusive, balanced, and win-win economic globalization. Fourth, we must build the “Belt and Road” into a road of innovation. Innovation is an important force driving development. The construction of the “Belt and Road” initiative is a pioneering initiative in itself, and innovation in the construction of the “Belt and Road Initiative” requires innovation. We must insist on innovation-driven development, strengthen cooperation in the frontier fields of digital economy, artificial intelligence, nanotechnology, quantum computers, and promote the construction of big data, cloud computing, and smart cities, and connect into the 21st century digital silk road. We must promote the deep integration of technology and industry, and technology and finance, optimize the innovation environment, and gather innovation resources. We must create entrepreneurial space and entrepreneurial workshops for young people from all countries in the Internet age, and achieve the dreams of the future generation of youth. , we wantGather innovative resources. We must create entrepreneurial space and entrepreneurial workshops for young people from all countries in the Internet age, and achieve the dreams of the future generation of youth. , We must practice the new concept of green development, advocate green, low-carbon, circular and sustainable production and lifestyle, strengthen ecological and environmental protection cooperation, build an ecological civilization, and jointly achieve the 2030 sustainable development goals. Fifth, we must build the “Belt and Road” into a road of civilization. The construction of the "Belt and Road" must use civilization exchange to transcend civilization barriers, mutual civilization mutual learning to transcend civilization conflicts, coexistence of civilizations to transcend civilization superiority, and promote mutual understanding, mutual respect and mutual trust among nations. , We must establish a multi-level humanities cooperation mechanism, build more cooperation platforms, and open up more cooperation channels. It is necessary to promote educational cooperation, expand the scale of exchange of international students, and raise the level of cooperation in running schools. We must play the role of think tanks and build a think tank alliance and cooperation network. In the fields of culture, sports, and health, we must innovate cooperation models and promote pragmatic projects. It is necessary to make good use of historical and cultural heritage and jointly create tourism products and heritage protection with Silk Road characteristics. We need to strengthen exchanges between parliaments, political parties, and non-governmental organizations in various countries, and strengthen communication between groups such as women, youth, and the disabled to promote inclusive development. We must also strengthen international anti-corruption cooperation and make the “Belt and Road” a path of integrity. , Ladies, gentlemen, friends! At present, China's development is at a new starting point. We will deeply implement the innovative, coordinated, green, open and shared development concept, continuously adapt, grasp and lead the new normal of economic development, actively promote the supply-side structural reform, achieve sustainable development, and inject strong power into the “Belt and Road” initiative. World development brings new opportunities. -China is willing to develop friendly cooperation with all participating countries on the Belt and Road Initiative on the basis of the Five Principles of Peaceful Coexistence. China is willing to share development experience with other countries in the world, but it will not interfere in other countries’ internal affairs, export social systems and development models, and will not impose on others. We are advancing the construction of the “Belt and Road” initiative that will not repeat the old geopolitical game, but will create a new model of cooperation and win-win; it will not form a destabilizing small group, but will build a harmonious coexisting family. ——China has reached practical cooperation agreements with many countries on the “Belt and Road”, which includes not only transportation, infrastructure, energy and other hardware connectivity projects, but also communications, customs, inspection and quarantine and other software connectivity projects, as well as economic and trade, Cooperative planning and specific projects in various fields such as industry, e-commerce, ocean and green economy. China and the railway departments of relevant countries will sign an agreement to deepen China-EU train cooperation. We will promote the early start of these cooperative projects and see results early. -China will increase its funding support for the construction of the "Belt and Road", add 100 billion yuan to the Silk Road Fund, and encourage financial institutions to develop RMB overseas fund business. The scale is expected to be about 300 billion yuan. The China Development Bank and the Export-Import Bank will provide RMB 250 billion and 130 billion yuan worth of special loans respectively to support the construction of the “Belt and Road” infrastructure, production capacity and financial cooperation. We will also cooperate with the Asian Infrastructure Investment Bank, the BRICS New Development Bank, the World Bank and other multilateral development agencies to support the “Belt and Road” project, and work with relevant parties to formulate the “Belt and Road” financing guidelines. -China will actively develop mutually beneficial and economic and trade partnerships with participating countries along the "Belt and Road", promote trade and investment facilitation with relevant countries, and build a "Belt and Road" free trade network to help regional and world economic growth. During this forum, China will sign economic and trade cooperation agreements with more than 30 countries and negotiate free trade agreements with relevant countries. China will host the China International Import Expo from 2018. ——China is willing to strengthen innovation cooperation with other countries, launch the “Belt and Road Initiative” scientific and technological innovation action plan, carry out four actions: scientific and technological humanities exchanges, joint construction of joint laboratories, cooperation in science and technology parks, and technology transfer. In the next 5 years, we will arrange 2,500 young scientists to come to China for short-term scientific research, train 5,000 scientific and technical personnel, and put into operation 50 joint laboratories. We will set up an eco-environmental protection big data service platform, propose the establishment of the “Belt and Road” International Alliance for Green Development, and provide assistance to relevant countries in responding to climate change. -China will provide 60 billion yuan in assistance to developing countries and international organizations participating in the construction of the "Belt and Road" in the next three years to build more livelihood projects. We will provide RMB 2 billion in emergency food aid to developing countries along the “Belt and Road”, increase the US$ 1 billion to the South-South Cooperation Assistance Fund, and implement 100 “happy homes” and 100 “love aids” in the countries along the route. 100 "Rehabilitation Aid" and other projects. We will provide relevant international organizationsImplement 100 "Happy Homes", 100 "Love to Help the Poor", 100 "Rehabilitation and Medical Assistance" and other projects. We will provide US$1 billion to relevant international organizations to implement a batch of cooperation projects that benefit countries along the route. -China will set up a follow-up liaison mechanism for the "Belt and Road" International Cooperation Summit Forum, the establishment of the "Belt and Road" financial development research center, the "Belt and Road" construction promotion center, and the multilateral development bank to establish a multilateral development financing cooperation center, with the international The IMF cooperated to establish a capacity building center. We will build a cooperation network of non-governmental organizations along the Silk Road, and build a new platform for news cooperation alliance, music education alliance and other cultural cooperation. The construction of the “Belt and Road” is rooted in the historical soil of the Silk Road, focusing on Asia, Europe and Africa, and is open to all friends. Whether they come from Asia, Europe, Africa, or the Americas, they are all partners in the construction of the “Belt and Road” international cooperation. The construction of the "Belt and Road" will be discussed by everyone, and the achievements of the construction of the "Belt and Road" will be shared by everyone. , Ladies, gentlemen, friends! , An ancient Chinese saying: "No step, no miles." Arabic proverb says, "Pyramids are made of stones." There is also a saying in Europe: "Great cause is not a day's work." The construction of the “Belt and Road” is a great undertaking and requires great practice. Let us advance the implementation step by step, catch the results bit by bit, benefit the world and the people! , I wish this summit forum a complete success! , thank you all. , (Xinhua News Agency, Beijing, May 14th), "People's Daily" (May 15, 2017 version 03),]
eng_title: Xi Jinping's speech at the opening ceremony of the "Belt and Road" International Cooperation Summit Forum
source-date: 来源：人民网－人民日报          发布时间：2017-05-15
text: [, 尊敬的各位国家元首，政府首脑，, 各位国际组织负责人，, 女士们，先生们，朋友们：, “孟夏之日，万物并秀。”在这美好时节，来自100多个国家的各界嘉宾齐聚北京，共商“一带一路”建设合作大计，具有十分重要的意义。今天，群贤毕至，少长咸集，我期待着大家集思广益、畅所欲言，为推动“一带一路”建设献计献策，让这一世纪工程造福各国人民。, 女士们、先生们、朋友们！, 2000多年前，我们的先辈筚路蓝缕，穿越草原沙漠，开辟出联通亚欧非的陆上丝绸之路；我们的先辈扬帆远航，穿越惊涛骇浪，闯荡出连接东西方的海上丝绸之路。古丝绸之路打开了各国友好交往的新窗口，书写了人类发展进步的新篇章。中国陕西历史博物馆珍藏的千年“鎏金铜蚕”，在印度尼西亚发现的千年沉船“黑石号”等，见证了这段历史。, 古丝绸之路绵亘万里，延续千年，积淀了以和平合作、开放包容、互学互鉴、互利共赢为核心的丝路精神。这是人类文明的宝贵遗产。, ——和平合作。公元前140多年的中国汉代，一支从长安出发的和平使团，开始打通东方通往西方的道路，完成了“凿空之旅”，这就是著名的张骞出使西域。中国唐宋元时期，陆上和海上丝绸之路同步发展，中国、意大利、摩洛哥的旅行家杜环、马可·波罗、伊本·白图泰都在陆上和海上丝绸之路留下了历史印记。15世纪初的明代，中国著名航海家郑和七次远洋航海，留下千古佳话。这些开拓事业之所以名垂青史，是因为使用的不是战马和长矛，而是驼队和善意；依靠的不是坚船和利炮，而是宝船和友谊。一代又一代“丝路人”架起了东西方合作的纽带、和平的桥梁。, ——开放包容。古丝绸之路跨越尼罗河流域、底格里斯河和幼发拉底河流域、印度河和恒河流域、黄河和长江流域，跨越埃及文明、巴比伦文明、印度文明、中华文明的发祥地，跨越佛教、基督教、伊斯兰教信众的汇集地，跨越不同国度和肤色人民的聚居地。不同文明、宗教、种族求同存异、开放包容，并肩书写相互尊重的壮丽诗篇，携手绘就共同发展的美好画卷。酒泉、敦煌、吐鲁番、喀什、撒马尔罕、巴格达、君士坦丁堡等古城，宁波、泉州、广州、北海、科伦坡、吉达、亚历山大等地的古港，就是记载这段历史的“活化石”。历史告诉我们：文明在开放中发展，民族在融合中共存。, ——互学互鉴。古丝绸之路不仅是一条通商易货之道，更是一条知识交流之路。沿着古丝绸之路，中国将丝绸、瓷器、漆器、铁器传到西方，也为中国带来了胡椒、亚麻、香料、葡萄、石榴。沿着古丝绸之路，佛教、伊斯兰教及阿拉伯的天文、历法、医药传入中国，中国的四大发明、养蚕技术也由此传向世界。更为重要的是，商品和知识交流带来了观念创新。比如，佛教源自印度，在中国发扬光大，在东南亚得到传承。儒家文化起源中国，受到欧洲莱布尼茨、伏尔泰等思想家的推崇。这是交流的魅力、互鉴的成果。, ——互利共赢。古丝绸之路见证了陆上“使者相望于道，商旅不绝于途”的盛况，也见证了海上“舶交海中，不知其数”的繁华。在这条大动脉上，资金、技术、人员等生产要素自由流动，商品、资源、成果等实现共享。阿拉木图、撒马尔罕、长安等重镇和苏尔港、广州等良港兴旺发达，罗马、安息、贵霜等古国欣欣向荣，中国汉唐迎来盛世。古丝绸之路创造了地区大发展大繁荣。, 历史是最好的老师。这段历史表明，无论相隔多远，只要我们勇敢迈出第一步，坚持相向而行，就能走出一条相遇相知、共同发展之路，走向幸福安宁和谐美好的远方。, 女士们、先生们、朋友们！, 从历史维度看，人类社会正处在一个大发展大变革大调整时代。世界多极化、经济全球化、社会信息化、文化多样化深入发展，和平发展的大势日益强劲，变革创新的步伐持续向前。各国之间的联系从来没有像今天这样紧密，世界人民对美好生活的向往从来没有像今天这样强烈，人类战胜困难的手段从来没有像今天这样丰富。, 从现实维度看，我们正处在一个挑战频发的世界。世界经济增长需要新动力，发展需要更加普惠平衡，贫富差距鸿沟有待弥合。地区热点持续动荡，恐怖主义蔓延肆虐。和平赤字、发展赤字、治理赤字，是摆在全人类面前的严峻挑战。这是我一直思考的问题。, 2013年秋天，我在哈萨克斯坦和印度尼西亚提出共建丝绸之路经济带和21世纪海上丝绸之路，即“一带一路”倡议。“桃李不言，下自成蹊。”4年来，全球100多个国家和国际组织积极支持和参与“一带一路”建设，联合国大会、联合国安理会等重要决议也纳入“一带一路”建设内容。“一带一路”建设逐渐从理念转化为行动，从愿景转变为现实，建设成果丰硕。, ——这是政策沟通不断深化的4年。我多次说过，“一带一路”建设不是另起炉灶、推倒重来，而是实现战略对接、优势互补。我们同有关国家协调政策，包括俄罗斯提出的欧亚经济联盟、东盟提出的互联互通总体规划、哈萨克斯坦提出的“光明之路”、土耳其提出的“中间走廊”、蒙古提出的“发展之路”、越南提出的“两廊一圈”、英国提出的“英格兰北方经济中心”、波兰提出的“琥珀之路”等。中国同老挝、柬埔寨、缅甸、匈牙利等国的规划对接工作也全面展开。中国同40多个国家和国际组织签署了合作协议，同30多个国家开展机制化产能合作。本次论坛期间，我们还将签署一批对接合作协议和行动计划，同60多个国家和国际组织共同发出推进“一带一路”贸易畅通合作倡议。各方通过政策对接，实现了“一加一大于二”的效果。, ——这是设施联通不断加强的4年。“道路通，百业兴。”我们和相关国家一道共同加速推进雅万高铁、中老铁路、亚吉铁路、匈塞铁路等项目，建设瓜达尔港、比雷埃夫斯港等港口，规划实施一大批互联互通项目。目前，以中巴、中蒙俄、新亚欧大陆桥等经济走廊为引领，以陆海空通道和信息高速路为骨架，以铁路、港口、管网等重大工程为依托，一个复合型的基础设施网络正在形成。, ——这是贸易畅通不断提升的4年。中国同“一带一路”参与国大力推动贸易和投资便利化，不断改善营商环境。我了解到，仅哈萨克斯坦等中亚国家农产品到达中国市场的通关时间就缩短了90%。2014年至2016年，中国同“一带一路”沿线国家贸易总额超过3万亿美元。中国对“一带一路”沿线国家投资累计超过500亿美元。中国企业已经在20多个国家建设56个经贸合作区，为有关国家创造近11亿美元税收和18万个就业岗位。, ——这是资金融通不断扩大的4年。融资瓶颈是实现互联互通的突出挑战。中国同“一带一路”建设参与国和组织开展了多种形式的金融合作。亚洲基础设施投资银行已经为“一带一路”建设参与国的9个项目提供17亿美元贷款，“丝路基金”投资达40亿美元，中国同中东欧“16+1”金融控股公司正式成立。这些新型金融机制同世界银行等传统多边金融机构各有侧重、互为补充，形成层次清晰、初具规模的“一带一路”金融合作网络。, ——这是民心相通不断促进的4年。“国之交在于民相亲，民相亲在于心相通。”“一带一路”建设参与国弘扬丝绸之路精神，开展智力丝绸之路、健康丝绸之路等建设，在科学、教育、文化、卫生、民间交往等各领域广泛开展合作，为“一带一路”建设夯实民意基础，筑牢社会根基。中国政府每年向相关国家提供1万个政府奖学金名额，地方政府也设立了丝绸之路专项奖学金，鼓励国际文教交流。各类丝绸之路文化年、旅游年、艺术节、影视桥、研讨会、智库对话等人文合作项目百花纷呈，人们往来频繁，在交流中拉近了心与心的距离。, 丰硕的成果表明，“一带一路”倡议顺应时代潮流，适应发展规律，符合各国人民利益，具有广阔前景。, 女士们、先生们、朋友们！, 中国人说，“万事开头难”。“一带一路”建设已经迈出坚实步伐。我们要乘势而上、顺势而为，推动“一带一路”建设行稳致远，迈向更加美好的未来。这里，我谈几点意见。, 第一，我们要将“一带一路”建成和平之路。古丝绸之路，和时兴，战时衰。“一带一路”建设离不开和平安宁的环境。我们要构建以合作共赢为核心的新型国际关系，打造对话不对抗、结伴不结盟的伙伴关系。各国应该尊重彼此主权、尊严、领土完整，尊重彼此发展道路和社会制度，尊重彼此核心利益和重大关切。, 古丝绸之路沿线地区曾经是“流淌着牛奶与蜂蜜的地方”，如今很多地方却成了冲突动荡和危机挑战的代名词。这种状况不能再持续下去。我们要树立共同、综合、合作、可持续的安全观，营造共建共享的安全格局。要着力化解热点，坚持政治解决；要着力斡旋调解，坚持公道正义；要着力推进反恐，标本兼治，消除贫困落后和社会不公。, 第二，我们要将“一带一路”建成繁荣之路。发展是解决一切问题的总钥匙。推进“一带一路”建设，要聚焦发展这个根本性问题，释放各国发展潜力，实现经济大融合、发展大联动、成果大共享。, 产业是经济之本。我们要深入开展产业合作，推动各国产业发展规划相互兼容、相互促进，抓好大项目建设，加强国际产能和装备制造合作，抓住新工业革命的发展新机遇，培育新业态，保持经济增长活力。, 金融是现代经济的血液。血脉通，增长才有力。我们要建立稳定、可持续、风险可控的金融保障体系，创新投资和融资模式，推广政府和社会资本合作，建设多元化融资体系和多层次资本市场，发展普惠金融，完善金融服务网络。, 设施联通是合作发展的基础。我们要着力推动陆上、海上、天上、网上四位一体的联通，聚焦关键通道、关键城市、关键项目，联结陆上公路、铁路道路网络和海上港口网络。我们已经确立“一带一路”建设六大经济走廊框架，要扎扎实实向前推进。要抓住新一轮能源结构调整和能源技术变革趋势，建设全球能源互联网，实现绿色低碳发展。要完善跨区域物流网建设。我们也要促进政策、规则、标准三位一体的联通，为互联互通提供机制保障。, 第三，我们要将“一带一路”建成开放之路。开放带来进步，封闭导致落后。对一个国家而言，开放如同破茧成蝶，虽会经历一时阵痛，但将换来新生。“一带一路”建设要以开放为导向，解决经济增长和平衡问题。, 我们要打造开放型合作平台，维护和发展开放型世界经济，共同创造有利于开放发展的环境，推动构建公正、合理、透明的国际经贸投资规则体系，促进生产要素有序流动、资源高效配置、市场深度融合。我们欢迎各国结合自身国情，积极发展开放型经济，参与全球治理和公共产品供给，携手构建广泛的利益共同体。, 贸易是经济增长的重要引擎。我们要有“向外看”的胸怀，维护多边贸易体制，推动自由贸易区建设，促进贸易和投资自由化便利化。当然，我们也要着力解决发展失衡、治理困境、数字鸿沟、分配差距等问题，建设开放、包容、普惠、平衡、共赢的经济全球化。, 第四，我们要将“一带一路”建成创新之路。创新是推动发展的重要力量。“一带一路”建设本身就是一个创举，搞好“一带一路”建设也要向创新要动力。, 我们要坚持创新驱动发展，加强在数字经济、人工智能、纳米技术、量子计算机等前沿领域合作，推动大数据、云计算、智慧城市建设，连接成21世纪的数字丝绸之路。我们要促进科技同产业、科技同金融深度融合，优化创新环境，集聚创新资源。我们要为互联网时代的各国青年打造创业空间、创业工场，成就未来一代的青春梦想。, 我们要践行绿色发展的新理念，倡导绿色、低碳、循环、可持续的生产生活方式，加强生态环保合作，建设生态文明，共同实现2030年可持续发展目标。, 第五，我们要将“一带一路”建成文明之路。“一带一路”建设要以文明交流超越文明隔阂、文明互鉴超越文明冲突、文明共存超越文明优越，推动各国相互理解、相互尊重、相互信任。, 我们要建立多层次人文合作机制，搭建更多合作平台，开辟更多合作渠道。要推动教育合作，扩大互派留学生规模，提升合作办学水平。要发挥智库作用，建设好智库联盟和合作网络。在文化、体育、卫生领域，要创新合作模式，推动务实项目。要用好历史文化遗产，联合打造具有丝绸之路特色的旅游产品和遗产保护。我们要加强各国议会、政党、民间组织往来，密切妇女、青年、残疾人等群体交流，促进包容发展。我们也要加强国际反腐合作，让“一带一路”成为廉洁之路。, 女士们、先生们、朋友们！, 当前，中国发展正站在新的起点上。我们将深入贯彻创新、协调、绿色、开放、共享的发展理念，不断适应、把握、引领经济发展新常态，积极推进供给侧结构性改革，实现持续发展，为“一带一路”注入强大动力，为世界发展带来新的机遇。, ——中国愿在和平共处五项原则基础上，发展同所有“一带一路”建设参与国的友好合作。中国愿同世界各国分享发展经验，但不会干涉他国内政，不会输出社会制度和发展模式，更不会强加于人。我们推进“一带一路”建设不会重复地缘博弈的老套路，而将开创合作共赢的新模式；不会形成破坏稳定的小集团，而将建设和谐共存的大家庭。, ——中国已经同很多国家达成了“一带一路”务实合作协议，其中既包括交通运输、基础设施、能源等硬件联通项目，也包括通信、海关、检验检疫等软件联通项目，还包括经贸、产业、电子商务、海洋和绿色经济等多领域的合作规划和具体项目。中国同有关国家的铁路部门将签署深化中欧班列合作协议。我们将推动这些合作项目早日启动、早见成效。, ——中国将加大对“一带一路”建设资金支持，向丝路基金新增资金1000亿元人民币，鼓励金融机构开展人民币海外基金业务，规模预计约3000亿元人民币。中国国家开发银行、进出口银行将分别提供2500亿元和1300亿元等值人民币专项贷款，用于支持“一带一路”基础设施建设、产能、金融合作。我们还将同亚洲基础设施投资银行、金砖国家新开发银行、世界银行及其他多边开发机构合作支持“一带一路”项目，同有关各方共同制定“一带一路”融资指导原则。, ——中国将积极同“一带一路”建设参与国发展互利共赢的经贸伙伴关系，促进同各相关国家贸易和投资便利化，建设“一带一路”自由贸易网络，助力地区和世界经济增长。本届论坛期间，中国将同30多个国家签署经贸合作协议，同有关国家协商自由贸易协定。中国将从2018年起举办中国国际进口博览会。, ——中国愿同各国加强创新合作，启动“一带一路”科技创新行动计划，开展科技人文交流、共建联合实验室、科技园区合作、技术转移4项行动。我们将在未来5年内安排2500人次青年科学家来华从事短期科研工作，培训5000人次科学技术和管理人员，投入运行50家联合实验室。我们将设立生态环保大数据服务平台，倡议建立“一带一路”绿色发展国际联盟，并为相关国家应对气候变化提供援助。, ——中国将在未来3年向参与“一带一路”建设的发展中国家和国际组织提供600亿元人民币援助，建设更多民生项目。我们将向“一带一路”沿线发展中国家提供20亿元人民币紧急粮食援助，向南南合作援助基金增资10亿美元，在沿线国家实施100个“幸福家园”、100个“爱心助困”、100个“康复助医”等项目。我们将向有关国际组织提供10亿美元落实一批惠及沿线国家的合作项目。, ——中国将设立“一带一路”国际合作高峰论坛后续联络机制，成立“一带一路”财经发展研究中心、“一带一路”建设促进中心，同多边开发银行共同设立多边开发融资合作中心，同国际货币基金组织合作建立能力建设中心。我们将建设丝绸之路沿线民间组织合作网络，打造新闻合作联盟、音乐教育联盟以及其他人文合作新平台。, “一带一路”建设植根于丝绸之路的历史土壤，重点面向亚欧非大陆，同时向所有朋友开放。不论来自亚洲、欧洲，还是非洲、美洲，都是“一带一路”建设国际合作的伙伴。“一带一路”建设将由大家共同商量，“一带一路”建设成果将由大家共同分享。, 女士们、先生们、朋友们！, 中国古语讲：“不积跬步，无以至千里。”阿拉伯谚语说，“金字塔是一块块石头垒成的”。欧洲也有句话：“伟业非一日之功”。“一带一路”建设是伟大的事业，需要伟大的实践。让我们一步一个脚印推进实施，一点一滴抓出成果，造福世界，造福人民！, 祝本次高峰论坛圆满成功！, 谢谢大家。, （新华社北京5月14日电） , 《 人民日报 》（ 2017年05月15日 03 版）, ]
title: 习近平在“一带一路”国际合作高峰论坛开幕式上的演讲

eng: [, Dear President of the United Nations General Assembly, Mr. Thomson,, Dear Secretary-General of the United Nations, Mr. Guterres,, Dear Director-General of the United Nations Headquarters in Geneva, Mr. Mueller,, Ladies and gentlemen, friends: Vientiane update. I am very happy to have come to the UN headquarters in Geneva at the beginning of the New Year to discuss with you the proposition of the era of building a community of shared future for mankind. , I just attended the annual meeting of the World Economic Forum. In Davos, the parties generally mentioned in their speeches that the world today is full of uncertainty, and people are both looking forward to and confused about the future. What happened to the world, what should we do? This is a question that the whole world is thinking about, and it is also a question that I have been thinking about. , I think, to answer this question, we must first figure out the most basic question, where are we from, where are we now, and where will we go? Looking back at the recent history of more than 100 years, mankind has experienced bloody hot wars and cold cold wars, and has also made amazing developments and tremendous progress. Before the first half of the last century, mankind suffered two world wars. The most urgent wish of that generation was to avoid war and build peace. In the 1950s and 1960s, the colonial people generally awakened. Their strongest voice was to get rid of the shackles and strive for independence. After the end of the Cold War, the most earnest demands of all parties were to expand cooperation and common development. The common wish of all mankind for more than 100 years is peace and development. However, this task is far from being completed. We must follow the voices of the people, take over the baton of history, and continue to move forward on the marathon track of peace and development. , Human beings are in a period of great development, big changes and big adjustments. World multi-polarization and economic globalization are developing in depth, social informatization and cultural diversification are continuing to advance. A new round of scientific and technological revolution and industrial revolution are gestating and growing. Countries are interconnected and interdependent. The global destiny is related to the common and interrelated. The rise far exceeds the growth of war factors, and the trend of the times of peace, development, cooperation and win-win situation is even stronger. At the same time, human beings are also in an era of endless challenges and increasing risks. The world's economic growth is weak, the financial crisis is overcast, the development gap is becoming increasingly prominent, military encounters occur from time to time, the cold war mentality and power politics are not separated, terrorism, refugee crisis, major infectious diseases, climate change and other non-traditional security threats Continue to spread. , There is only one earth in the universe, and mankind has a home. Mr. Hawking made a conjecture about "parallel universes", hoping to find a planet where the second humanoid can live in peace. When this wish will come true is still unknown. So far, the earth is the only home for mankind to survive, and cherishing and caring for the earth is the only choice for mankind. The dome of the Swiss Federal Building is engraved with the Latin inscription "Everyone is me, I am everyone". We have to be considerate of contemporary people, but also responsible for future generations. , Ladies, gentlemen, friends! It is the expectation of the people of all countries and the due responsibility of our generation of politicians to allow peaceful fires to be passed on from generation to generation, to keep the momentum of development flowing, and to make the light of civilization shine. China's plan is to build a community with a shared future for mankind and achieve win-win sharing. , Idea leads action, direction decides way out. Throughout the history of modern times, the establishment of a fair and reasonable international order is the goal of mankind. From the principles of equality and sovereignty established by the Westphalian Peace Treaty more than 360 years ago, to the international humanitarian spirit established by the Geneva Conventions more than 150 years ago; from the four main purposes and seven principles clearly defined in the UN Charter more than 70 years ago, to The five principles of peaceful coexistence advocated by the Bandung Conference more than 60 years ago and the evolution of international relations have accumulated a series of recognized principles. These principles should become the basic obedience for the construction of a community of human destiny. Sovereignty and equality are the most important norms governing the relationship between nations over the centuries. They are also the primary principles that the United Nations and all agencies and organizations follow together. The true meaning of sovereign equality is that a country is big or small, strong or weak, rich or poor, sovereignty and dignity must be respected, and internal affairs are not allowed to interfere. They all have the right to choose their own social system and development path. In the United Nations, the World Trade Organization, the World Health Organization, the World Intellectual Property Organization, the World Meteorological Organization, the International Telecommunication Union, the Universal Postal Union, the International Organization for Migration, the International Labour Organization and other institutions, countries participate equally in decision-making, which constitutes the importance of improving global governance power. Under the new situation, we must uphold sovereign equality and promote equal rights, opportunities and rules in all countries. , Geneva witnessed the adoption of the final declaration of Indochina peace issue, witnessed the first reconciliation meeting between the leaders of the two confrontation camps during the Cold War, witnessedGeneva witnessed the adoption of the final declaration on the Indochina peace issue, the first reconciliation meeting between the leaders of the two confrontation camps during the Cold War, and the dialogue and negotiations on hot issues such as the Iranian nuclear issue and Syria. The enlightenment from history and reality is that communication and consultation is an effective way to resolve differences, and political negotiation is the fundamental way to resolve conflicts. As long as you have a sincere desire, uphold goodwill and show political wisdom, no matter how big the conflict is, you can resolve it, and no matter how thick the ice is, you can break it. , "The law, the end of governance." In Geneva, based on the UN Charter, countries have reached a series of international conventions and legal instruments in the fields of political security, trade development, social human rights, science and technology, labor rights, culture and sports. The life of the law lies in putting it into practice. It is the responsibility of all countries to maintain the authority of the international rule of law, exercise their rights in accordance with the law, and perform their obligations in good faith. The life of the law also lies in fairness and justice. Countries and international judicial institutions should ensure that international law is applied uniformly and uniformly, without double standards, and if they are used together, they are abandoned. , "Hundreds of rivers, there is room for greatness." Openness and inclusiveness have created the grand stage of Geneva's multilateral diplomacy. We must promote the democratization of international relations, and we must not engage in "one country's hegemony" or "co-governance by several parties." The destiny of the world should be jointly controlled by all countries, international rules should be jointly written by all countries, global affairs should be jointly governed by all countries, and development results should be shared by all countries. , In 1862, Mr. Henry Du Nan asked in "Memories of Shafirillo": Can a humanitarian organization be established? Can a humanitarian convention be formulated? "Question of Du Nan" soon got the answer. The following year, the ICRC came into being. After more than 150 years of development, the Red Cross has become a spirit and a banner. In the face of frequent humanitarian crises, we should promote the spirit of humanity, fraternity, and dedication, and send care and hope to innocent people in trouble; we should uphold the basic principles of neutrality, fairness, and independence, and avoid humanitarian problems.
